Title: Ethiopia yasubitse amatora kubera coronavirus
Body:
Komisiyo ishinzwe amatora muri Ethiopia, yatangaje ko amatora rusange yari ateganyijwe muri Kanama uyu mwaka asubitswe kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Komisiyo ishinzwe amatora muri Ethiopia, yatangaje ko amatora rusange yari ateganyijwe muri Kanama uyu mwaka asubitswe kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Iyo Komisiyo yatangaje ko itariki nshya y’amatora izatangazwa igihe icyorezo cya coronavirus kizaba gicogoye.
Hatangajwe ko ibikorwa byo kwitegura amatora byagiye bigongana n’ingamba zo guhashya coronavirus ku buryo ibikoresho by’amatora bitaraboneka ndetse n’abakorerabushake batahuguwe ku gihe.
Byari biteganyijwe ko abazatora batangira kwiyandikisha mu ntangiriro za Mata, naho amashyaka agatangira kwiyamamaza muri Gicurasi.
Niyo matora ya mbere yari agiye kuba kuva Minisitiri w’Intebe, Abiy Ahmed wanatwaye igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel, agiye ku butegetsi mu 2018.
Nyuma yo kugera ku butegetsi, Abiy yakoze amavugurura atandukanye muri politiki ya Ethiopia.

Title: Bwa mbere mu Burundi hagaragaye abarwayi babiri ba Coronavirus
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima mu Burundi, Ndikumana Thaddée, yatangake ko ku nshuro ya mbere mu gihugu cye hagaragaye abarwayi babiri bafite ubwandu bwa COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima mu Burundi, Ndikumana Thaddée, yatangake ko ku nshuro ya mbere mu gihugu cye hagaragaye abarwayi babiri bafite ubwandu bwa COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus.
U Burundi nicyo gihugu cyo mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba cyari gisigaye kitarabonekamo umurwayi wa Coronavirus.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima mu Burundi, Ndikumana, yavuze ko Abarundi babiri basanganywe Coronavirus barimo uw’imyaka 56 n’uwa 42 binjiye mu gihugu bavuye hanze.
Yagize ati “Ibitaro byo mu Giteranyi byakiriye abantu batatu baje bava muri Tanzania. Muri Buremec naho bari abantu babiri. Ibipimo byerekanye ko abo batatu baje bava muri Tanzania nta Coronavirus barwaye. Mu bitaro bya Buremec hari abantu babiri bagiye kuhivuriza, uwa mbere ni Umurundi w’imyaka 56 uba i Bujumbura akaba yari yatashye avuye mu Rwanda. Undi na we afite imyaka 42 uba i Bujumbura akaba yaherukaga i Dubai anyuze mu Rwanda."
MinisitiriNdikumana yasabye Abarundi kwitwararika isuku no kutegerana mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Mu minsi ishize Tanzania yatangaje ko umwe mu barwayi babonetse ku butaka bwayo ari umushoferi wanyuze mu mu Burundi ariko Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Burundi yahise itangaza ko iperereza ku makuru y’uko uyu murwayi yari aturutse muri icyo gihugu, iyagendera kure.
Abarwayi basanganywe Coronavirus bari bagiye kwivuza bafite ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus, birimo inkorora. Abo bahise bajyanwa mu Bitaro byitiriwe Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore ahateganyijwe kwita ku barwayi ba Coronavirus.
Kuri ubu abarwayi nta kibazo gikomeye bafite. U Burundi bwari bwatangaje ku wa 28 Werurwe 2020 ko bwari bwasuzumye abantu bane ariko bose basanga ari bazima.
U Burundi bwahagaritse ingendo z’indege mu byumweru bibiri ndetse bunafunga imipaka mu gukumira urujya n’uruza rw’abantu bashobora kubwinjizamo Coronavirus.
Umuryango uharanira Uburenganzira bwa Muntu Human Rights Watch uheruka kugaragaza impungenge utewe no kuba mu Burundi hashobora kuba hadatangwa amakuru mpamo kuri Coronavirus, uvuga ko abayobozi gushyira ubuzima bw’abaturage mu kaga.
HRW ivuga ko mu 2019, u Burundi bwanze gutangaza ko Malaria yabwibasiye mu gihe habonetse abantu miliyoni 8,5 bayirwaye mu gihugu gifite miliyoni 11,5 ikica abantu barenga 3,000.
Coronavirus yagaragaye mu Burundi mu gihe muri Gicurasi hitegurwa amatora rusange y’Umukuru w’Igihugu y’ugomba gusimbura Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza ku butegetsi.

Title: Hari ingo zituje n’izatokombeye-Pst Rutayisire yavuze ku isomo ryo ‘kuguma mu rugo’ ku bashakanye
Body:
Iminsi 10 iruzuye hatanzwe ibwiriza ryo kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus.
Iminsi 10 iruzuye hatanzwe ibwiriza ryo kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus.
Ni icyemezo gifatwa nk’izingiro ryo guhangana na Coronavirus yugarije Isi; kuri bamwe ni umuti usharira ariko nanone ugakiza.
Mu mwanya wo kuguma mu rugo hari aho usanga abakibyiruka bahugiye kuri za filime z’uruhererekane, abasoma ibitabo n’abakora ubushakashatsi butandukanye.
Abashakanye na bo bari kumwe isegonda ku rindi, ni ibihe bishobora kurambirana cyangwa bikanyaruka bitewe n’imibanire yabo. Hari abasubiye mu bihe by’ukwezi kwa buki, hari abandi bashaririwe.
Vuba aha abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga babonye Umutaliyani wafashwe na Polisi yavuye mu rugo, agasubiza ko ‘‘Aho kwicwa n’umugore wanjye nicwe na Coronavirus.’’ Ni rumwe mu ngero zerekana ko hari abashegeshwe no kuguma mu rugo.
Pst Dr Antoine Rutayisire uzwi mu nyigisho zubaka umuryango yabwiye IGIHE ko usanga no mu Rwanda hari abashakanye bagiriye umugisha mu kuguma mu rugo, abandi bagasharirirwa.
Yagize ati ‘‘Telefoni nakira hari abavuga ko ubu baruhutse, bicaranye n’ababo, bagafasha abana gusubira mu masomo, bakabona umwanya wo gusenga n’ibindi. Hari abo byabereye ikizamini, babuze icyo bakora, uwo si bibi cyane.’’
‘‘Abandi byabaye umuriro utazima. Hari ingo zatokombeye, hari abantu neza insinga zakoranye. Umugore arakubwira ati ‘umugabo uri hano yanshobeye ntavuga’, iyo abumbuye umunwa aravuga nabi, byadushobeye.’’
Yavuze ko muri iki gihe hari abinangira batagirwa inama; hari uwo yasabye kubaza mugenzi we inyungu yo kuba mu muriro utazima mu byumweru bibiri akamubwira ko ‘‘Ibyo ubaza pasiteri uribeshya kuko ndi mukuru nta muntu wangira inama.’’
 	 Yagereranyije Guma mu rugo n’Umwiherero 
Pasiteri Rutayisire yagaragaje ko kuguma mu rugo bikwiye kugira ingamba nshya bisiga. Kuri we si ubwa mbere abisabwe ariko isomo yakuyemo ni uko yize gutuza muri icyo gihe.
Ati “Hari abantu babifata nabi, ko bafungiye mu rugo, nkababwira nti ‘ntidufunze’, turi mu mwiherero. Iyo ubifashe neza bikorohera kubibamo, kwicara mu rugo nkavuga nti simfunze ahubwo ndi mu mwiherero kuko iyo uwugiyemo hari ibintu uba ugiye kwiga no gukora, wazarangira ukajya kubishyira mu bikorwa.’’
Mu gihe abenshi bari mu ngo, bari kumwe n’imiryango yabo, babonye umwanya wo kuganira no gucoca ibitagenda neza, gufasha abana mu masomo no gusenga ku babyizereramo.
Ati ‘‘Kuguma mu rugo ni inyungu z’ubuzima bwanjye kuko nirinda nkarinda n’abandi. Ni umwanya wo gufata ikibi ukagihindura umwanya wo kunezerwamo.’’
 	Inyungu ya Guma mu rugo ku muryango
Kuva hambere Imana yabaga mu rugo, ababandwaga niho babikoreraga ndetse niho hari intango yo guterekera.
Rutayisire agaragaza ko nubwo atasaba abantu kubisubiramo ariko bikwiye ko bagarura iryo hame ryo kugira Imana mu ngo.
Ati “Ubu twabonye umwanya wo gusengana no kugarura Imana mu rugo. Umugisha urimo ni uko Umuyisilamu ntakijya ku musigiti, umukirisitu na we ntajya ku rusengero, bose bari gusengera mu rugo.’’
Inyungu ya kabiri asanga iri muri gahunda ya ‘Guma mu rugo’ ishingiye ku kubaka urugo rwiza rurimo ubusabane hagati y’ababyeyi n’abana babo. Ati “Ubu abenshi bari kumwe, bafite umwanya wo kuganira kandi bari kumwe.’’
Pasiteri Rutayisire yavuze ko ku bashaka guhinduka, hari isomo bakura muri ibi bihe.
Ati “Ababibonyemo icyiza bazajya babikumbura, gusa bashobora no kubibona ntibafate umwanya nk’uwo gushyiraho igihe cyo kuganira. Hari abazabibona nk’ibisanzwe. Abarambiwe bameze nk’abari mu kizamini kitoroshye, ndizera ko icyumweru cya kabiri bashobora kureba uko bakibyaza umusaruro. Abo babyebereye umuriro utazima na bo bashobora gukuramo amasomo nubwo bigoye. Ikizavamo kizaterwa n’abari mu rugo n’imitekerereze yabo.’’
Minisiteri y’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango iheruka gusaba abashakanye kwirinda ihohoterwa rikorerwa mu ngo no kuzirikana kuboneza urubyaro.
Rev. Rutayisire avuga ko “Ibyo dukora [mu guhangana n’ihohoterwa] ni ubutabazi ariko ubwirinzi bukwiye kuba kwigisha umwana ukiri muto uko umugabo cyangwa umugore ateye no kumenya kumutega amatwi.’’
Mu kwirinda inda z’indahekana, yavuze ko mu byo bigisha abagiye gushyingirwa harimo no kumenya urubyaro rwabo.
Ati “Kubyara si itegeko ni umugisha. Ikibazo ni uko itondaguranshinga ry’umugisha riba mu ntegeko, iyo umuntu akubwiye ngo ‘urye uhage’, ntaba agutegetse guhaga ahubwo aba aguhaye umugisha wo guhaga. Iyo akubwiye ngo ‘ntujye hariya’, biri mu ntegeko kimwe na ‘urye uhage’. Abantu babisomye nabi bibwira ko Imana yategetse abantu ngo ‘mubyare mwororoke mwuzure Isi’ kandi yaratanze umugisha wo kubyara. Biratandukanye. Itegeko uraryumvira ariko umugisha uwufata mu kigero wowe wagennye.’’
Pasiteri Rutayisire yavuze ko abakozi b’Imana bakwiye guhozaho mu guha abayoboke urugero rw’amabwiriza yo guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ati ‘‘Kuguma mu rugo ni inyungu zacu, ni n’ibwiriza rya Leta kuko biyifasha gukomeza kureba abanduye. Nituguma mu rugo, Leta izadukubitira Coronavirus, dusubire mu buzima busanzwe vuba.’’
Abakirisitu bahawe ubutumwa bwo kurushaho kwegerana n’Imana no kwisuzuma bakazava muri ibi bihe bameze neza, bafite imbaraga nshya.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ko abantu 70 banduye Coronavirus mu Rwanda. Abaturarwanda basabwa kuguma mu rugo mu gukumira ko iki cyorezo cyakwirakwira mu gihugu.
Pasiteri Rutayisire yakomeje gufasha abayoboke b’Itorero Angilikani mu masengesho y’iminsi 40

Title: Umuganga wakoraga muri CHUK yasanzwe mu icumbi yapfuye
Body:
Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Ubugenzacyaha (RIB), rwatangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekanye icyaba cyarishe Dr Joel Kambale Ketha, wakoraga mu bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK) biherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Ubugenzacyaha (RIB), rwatangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekanye icyaba cyarishe Dr Joel Kambale Ketha, wakoraga mu bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK) biherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Amakuru avuga ko Dr Kampale wari afite ubwenegihugu bwo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yasanzwe mu cyumba aho yari yaraye izamu muri ibi bitaro yitabye Imana.
Dr Theobald Hategekimana, umuyobozi w’ibitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK), yavuze ko ku wa Gatandatu aribwo uyu mugabo yitabye Imana, ariko ibindi bisobanuro byatangwa n’inzego zishinzwe umutekano.
Umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza, yemereye IGIHE ko koko uyu mugabo yitabye Imana, ariko batangiye iperereza ibindi bizatangazwa nyuma.
Yagize ati “Nibyo amakuru RIB yarayamenye kandi yatangiye iperereza riracyakorwa ntabwo rirarangira. Turashaka kumenya icyaba cyarateye urupfu rwe.”
Amakuru agaragaza ko Dr Kambale yari inzobere mu bijyanye no gutera ikinya.
Umurambo wa nyakwigendera wagiye gusuzumwa kugira ngo hamenyekane icyamuhitanye.

Title: U Rwanda rwamenyesheje Uganda na Kenya ko u Burundi bwakumiriye amakamyo ava mu Rwanda
Body:
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yamenyesheje ibihugu bya Uganda na Kenya ko u Burundi bwafashe umwanzuro wo kubuza amakamyo atwaye ibicuruzwa avuye mu Rwanda kwinjira muri icyo gihugu.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yamenyesheje ibihugu bya Uganda na Kenya ko u Burundi bwafashe umwanzuro wo kubuza amakamyo atwaye ibicuruzwa avuye mu Rwanda kwinjira muri icyo gihugu.
Ubusanzwe amakamyo yose atwaye imizigo avuye ku cyambu cya Mombasa, anyura muri Uganda no mu Rwanda mbere yo kugera mu Burundi.
Ubuyobozi bw’u Burundi buherutse gufata umwanzuro wo kwangira ayo makamyo kwinjira mu gihugu, biteza umuvundo ku mipaka.
Ni umwanzuro utarishimwe n’abacuruzi kuko uhabanye n’ibyo ibihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) biherutse kwemeranya byo koroshya urujya n’uruza rw’ibicuruzwa muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda COVID-19.
Abaminisitiri b’ubuzima mu bihugu bigize Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) n’abashinzwe ibikorwa by’uwo Muryango, bemeje ko ibihugu binyamuryango byorohereza amakamyo n’imodoka zitwaye ibicuruzwa, ndetse bigashyiraho uburyo bwo gusuzuma ababitwaye ku mipaka yabyo.
Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda yandikiye Kenya na Uganda, ibimenyesha ko amakamyo yari yerekeje i Burundi yangiwe kwinjira.
Mu ibaruwa u Rwanda rwanditse IGIHE yabonye rwagize ruti “Guverinoma y’u Burundi ntikiri kwemerera amakamyo atwaye imizigo kwinjira aturutse mu Rwanda hirengagijwe imyanzuro y’abaminisitiri ba EAC.”
“Kubera ko u Burundi bwafunze imipaka yabwo yose ku makamyo atwaye ibicuruzwa avuye mu Rwanda, Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ntabwo izongera kwemera ko amakamyo ajyanye imizigo mu Burundi aca ku butaka bwarwo.”
Guhera mu cyumweru gishize, amakamyo yari atwaye ibicuruzwa bigiye mu Burundi yaheze ku butaka butagira nyirabwo hagati y’u Rwanda n’u Burundi.
Ibaruwa ya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, igaragaza ko kugeza kuwa 30 Werurwe, hari amakamyo 23 yari yarabuze uko yinjira mu Burundi aciye mu Rwanda.
Abashoferi na ba nyiri amakamyo bagerageje bashaka uko ikibazo cyabo cyakemuka ariko Leta y’u Burundi ikinangira.
Tariki 28 Werurwe, amakamyo atatu yari ajyanye ibicuruzwa mu Burundi abinyujije ku mupaka wa Nemba mu Karere ka Bugesera yangijwe kwinjira mu Burundi, abiri muri yo arapakururwa ibicuruzwa bipakirwa mu makamyo yo mu Burundi, naho indi imwe yo byageze kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 31 Werurwe itaremererwa kwinjira mu Burundi.
Kuwa Gatanu ushize, ku mupaka wa Ruhwa naho andi makamyo abiri yari yangiwe kwinjira.
Ku mupaka w’Akanyaru, hari andi makamyo yari aparitse ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, ba nyirayo bari kugerageza kuganira n’ubuyobozi bw’u Burundi kugira ngo yinjire.
Kubera icyo kibazo, amakamyo umunani yaganaga i Burundi yari aparitse mu gace katagira nyirako ahazwi nka Mirama Hills, ku mupaka w’u Rwanda na Uganda tariki 29 Werurwe .
U Rwanda kandi kuri uyu wa Kabiri rwemereye abarundi batandatu kugaruka mu gihugu, nyuma y’uko Guverinoma yabo ibangiye kwinjira.
Nkuko byatangajwe n’abashinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka, abo barundi bangiwe kwinjira mu gihugu cyabo tariki 27 Werurwe.
Umwe mu bashinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka yagize ati “Bari baheze mu gace katagira nyirako ku ruhande rw’u Burundi, nta biribwa, ntaho kwikinga bategereje ko abayobozi b’iwabo babemerera kwinjira.”
Abo barundi barimo umuryango w’abantu batanu, umwe yari yaraje kwivuza kanseri mu Rwanda n’undi mugabo wageze mu Rwanda avuye muri Kenya tariki 25 Werurwe 2020.
Tharcienne Hashazinka yari amaze amezi menshi aba mu Rwanda, arwaje umuhungu we waje kwivuza kanseri ku bitaro bya Butaro.
We n’abandi bo mu muryango we bamufashaga kwita ku muhungu we, bari bamaze iminsi itanu baraheze mu gace katagira nyirako ku mupaka, uburyo bwose bwifashishijwe n’umugabo wa Hashazinka ngo binjire mu gihugu cyabo ntacyo bwatanze.
Umwe mu bashinze abinjira n’abasohoka ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda, yavuze ko u Rwanda rwabakiriye, rukabashyira mu kato rubitaho muri amwe mu macumbi ya Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu Karere ka Huye.
Impamvu bashyizwe mu kato, ni uko aho bari bari ku butaka butagira nyirabwo ku mupaka, bagiye bahura n’abantu batandukanye ku buryo nta wakwizera ko batahuye n’abanduye Coronavirus.
Icyemezo cy’u Burundi cyo kwangira abaturage bacyo kwinjira iwabo nabyo bihabanye n’imyanzuro yafashwe n’abaminisitiri ba EAC mu cyumweru gishize.
Mu byemejwe harimo kuba ibihugu byarasabwe kumenyesha Ambasade gufasha abaturage babyo baba baragizweho ingaruka n’ifungwa ry’imipaka, kubafasha kugera aho bari bagiye muri EAC n’ibindi.

Title: Abarwayi batanu basanganywe Coronavirus, umubare w’abanduye mu Rwanda uba 75
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki 31 Werurwe 2020, hagaragaye abandi bantu batanu barwaye Coronavirus, bikaba byatumye umubare w’abarwaye mu Rwanda ugera kuri 75.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yatangaje ko kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki 31 Werurwe 2020, hagaragaye abandi bantu batanu barwaye Coronavirus, bikaba byatumye umubare w’abarwaye mu Rwanda ugera kuri 75.
Itangazo rya Minisante rigaragaza ko abasanganywe ubwandu biganjemo abavuye hanze y’u Rwanda bageze mu gihugu bagahita bashyirwa mu kato.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima itangaza ko “Abarwayi bose barimo kuvurirwa ahantu habugenewe kandi barimo koroherwa. Abenshi muri bo ubu nta bimenyetso bya Coronavirus bagaragaza. Nta n’umwe urembye. Hanashakishijwe abantu bose bahuye nabo kugira ngo basuzumwe ndetse bitabweho n’inzego z’ubuzima.’’
Minisante yasabye ubufatanye bwa buri muturarwanda mu gukumira iki cyorezo. Abantu bose bageze mu Rwanda bazashyirwa mu kato k’iminsi 14 guhera igihe bahagereye
Umurwayi wa mbere wa COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus yabonetse mu Rwanda ku wa 14 Werurwe 2020, ni Umuhinde ukorera rimwe mu mashami y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye mu Rwanda.
COVID-19 yemejwe nk’icyorezo cyibasiye Isi yose ku wa 11 Werurwe 2020. Kuva mu Ukuboza 2019, abamaze kucyandura ni 837 021, abagera ku 41 245 bahitanywe na cyo mu gihe 176 040 bagikize.
Abanyarwanda bose basabwe gukomeza kwitwararika, ndetse ingamba zashyizweho zikomeje kubahirizwa zirimo ko ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi bitari iby’ibanze bifunzwe, ingendo zihuza imijyi n’uturere byahagaritswe n’ingendo zitari ngombwa no kuva mu ngo nta mpamvu zihutirwa birabujijwe.
Ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus birimo kugira umuriro, ibicurane, umunaniro n’inkorora ijyana no kubabara mu mihogo, guhumeka nabi bishobora no kugera aho itera umusonga no kubuza impyiko gukora bishobora gutera urupfu. Iyi ndwara ishobora kwandura binyuze mu gukora ku muntu uyirwaye, cyane cyane mu kuramukanya abantu bahana ibiganza.
Umuntu ugaragaza ibimenyetso asabwa guhamagara ku 114, cyangwa akohereza ubutumwa bwa WhatsApp kuri +250788202080 cyangwa akitabaza umujyanama w’ubuzima umwegereye.

Title: Hagiye gufatwa umwanzuro wa nyuma kuri CHOGM yitezwe mu Rwanda muri Kamena
Body:
Ubunyamabanga bw’Umuryango w’Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza ‘Commonwealth’, bwatangaje ko icyemezo ku Nama y’Abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinoma, izabera mu Rwanda kizafatwa vuba.
Ubunyamabanga bw’Umuryango w’Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza ‘Commonwealth’, bwatangaje ko icyemezo ku Nama y’Abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinoma, izabera mu Rwanda kizafatwa vuba.
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo gishinzwe kumenyekanisha Ubukerarugendo bushingiye ku Nama, RCB, buherutse gutangaza ko kubera Coronavirus, zimwe mu nama zari kubera mu Rwanda zimuwe, ubu harimo gushakishwa amatariki mashya zaberaho bitewe n’aho icyorezo kigana.
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RCB, Nelly Mukazayire, yavuze ko “Nk’uko bigaragara hose, iki cyorezo cyagiye gituma hari ibihinduka, ndetse muri urwo rwego rwacu, ubu hari inama zigeze kuri 20 zimuwe, zikaba zitarasubitswe burundu ahubwo zarimuwe, tukaba turimo tuvugana n’ababishinzwe, abazikurikirana, kugira ngo turebe aho zazashyirwa.”
Ibi byatumye benshi bibaza niba inama ya CHOGM, igomba kubera mu Rwanda, na yo izaba mu gihe icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje kuzahaza byinshi mu bihugu bigize Commonwealth n’ibindi.
Ubunyamabanga bwa Commonwealth, kuri uyu wa Kabiri bwanditse kuri Twitter ko bufatanyije na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, barimo gushaka uburyo butekanye bushobora gutuma abayobozi bungurana ibitekerezo ndetse bagakemura ibibazo byihutirwa.
Bwakomeje buvuga ko “Icyemezo ku bijyanye n’inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu na za guverinoma bikoresha ururimi rw’Icyongereza (CHOGM 2020), iteganyijwe kubera mu Rwanda muri Kamena, gitegerejwe vuba.”
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Iterambere (RDB), Clare Akamanzi, aherutse kuvuga ko u Rwanda rwizeye ko inama ya CHOGM, itazabangamirwa n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje guhungabanya ibikorwa bitandukanye hirya no hino.
Yagize ati “Aho Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ihagaze ni ugukomeza kwitegura CHOGM, kandi turizera ko mu gihe CHOGM izabamo Coronavirus itazaba ikiri icyorezo nk’uko iri uyu munsi. Ariko turakomeza kubikurikiranira hafi, kandi twizeye ko kugeza hagati muri Mata tuzaba tubona neza icyerekezo iki cyorezo kimaze gufata ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Dukomeje kubikurikirana ariko tunakomeza imyiteguro yose ya CHOGM.”
Byitezwe ko ibikorwa bikomeye bya CHOGM bizabera muri Kigali Convention Centre na Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo, ariko izindi nama zizabera muri Kigali Conference and Exhibition Village hazwi nka Camp Kigali, Kigali Serena Hotel na Ubumwe Grande Hotel.
Inama ya CHOGM biteganyijwe ko izabera mu Rwanda muri Kamena 2020, hagati ya tariki 22-27, yitezwemo amasezerano y’ubucuruzi ya miliyoni $700.
Aya masezerano arimo ayo mu rwego rw’ubwubatsi, ibijyanye n’imikino n’imyidagaduro n’ibindi.
CHOGM ni inama yitabirwa n’abantu bari hagati ya 5000 na 8000. Kuyakira bisaba ko igihugu cyerekana ubushake hakabaho kureba ko igihugu gifite ubushobozi. Mu kureba ubwo bushobozi harebwa ibintu bitandukanye, birimo aho inama izakirirwa, indege zigana aho hantu, uko bantu babona Visa, umutekano, imiyoborere n’ibindi.
Inama ya CHOGM izaba igizwe n’ibiganiro bitandukanye birimo ibireba urubyiruko, abikorera, abagore, imiryango itari iya leta n’iby’abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinoma.

Title: U Rwanda mu bihugu bigiye kugeragerezwamo umuti wongerera umwuka abanduye Coronavirus
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo gishinzwe kugenzura Ibiribwa n’Imiti mu Rwanda, Rwanda FDA, bwatangaje ko bwakiriye ubusabe bw’ikigo LEAF Pharmaceuticals cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ariko kinafite ibiro mu Rwanda, gishaka gutangira ubushakashatsi ku muti wongera umwuka mu mubiri w’uwanduye Coronavirus.
Ubuyobozi bw’Ikigo gishinzwe kugenzura Ibiribwa n’Imiti mu Rwanda, Rwanda FDA, bwatangaje ko bwakiriye ubusabe bw’ikigo LEAF Pharmaceuticals cyo muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ariko kinafite ibiro mu Rwanda, gishaka gutangira ubushakashatsi ku muti wongera umwuka mu mubiri w’uwanduye Coronavirus.
Ni umuti ushobora gufasha mu kongera umwuka mu bice by’umubiri (tissus), aho kwiringira imashini gusa zabigenewe (intensive care unit (ICU) ventilators).
Amakuru agaragaza ko kubera uburyo iki cyorezo cya Coronavirus gituma abantu bakenera umwuka, izi mashini nazo zahise zihenda ku buryo hari izavuye ku $27,000 zikagera ku $96,000, nk’uko bitangazwa na BBC.
Umuyobozi wa LEAF Pharmaceuticals, Dr Clet Niyikiza yabwiye Televiziyo Rwanda kuri iki Cyumweru ko magingo aya ikigo cye kiri muri 17 biri gushaka umuti n’urukingo bya Coronavirus muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Iki gihugu kirahangayitse kuko ubu gifite abarwayi barenga ibihumbi 142 banduye Coronavirus, mu gihe abo imaze guhitana bagera hafi ku 2500.
Mu cyumweru gishize Perezida Trump yasinye itegeko risaba ibigo bikora ibikoresho byo mu nganda gukora nk’aho igihugu kiri mu ntambara, bigakora ibikoresho byo “guhangana n’umwanzi tutabonesha amaso.”
Itegeko rya Trump ryatumye nka bimwe mu bice by’uruganda rw’imodoka rwa General Motors bitangira gukorerwamo ibyuma byongera umwuka, bigenewe Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’ibindi bice by’Isi.
Ibigo birimo Leaf Pharmaceuticals byemerewe gukora imiti n’inkingo harebwa ku miti imaze igihe ku isoko nka Hydroxychloroquine ikoreshwa mu kuvura malaria kuva mu 1955 na Azithromycin yica udukoko dutera indwara mu mubiri kuva mu 1988.
Dr Niyikiza ati “Hari n’itsinda ririmo kureba ku miti mishya ririmo n’ikigo cyanjye, aho turimo gukora umuti wafasha abarwayi kubona umwuka (Oxygène) uhagije. Nk’uko mubizi, umubare munini utuma aba barwayi bapfa hirya no hino ku Isi ni uko iyi virus yangiza cyane ibihaha, ku buryo umurwayi atabasha kubona umwuka uhagije.”
“Rero uyu muti twizera ko uzafasha cyane, ku buryo wakwifashishwa mu gihe mudafite imashini zongera umwuka. Ni ibintu bigenze neza uyu muti wacu watangira kugeragezwa ku bantu mu byumweru bitarenze bitatu, ku buryo twazareba uko bigenda, ugenewe abantu barembye cyane hagamijwe kubagarurira ubuzima.”
Kugeza ubu kandi hari imiti isaga 100 mishya irimo kugeragezwa, ku buryo Dr Niyikiza yizera ko umuti n’urukingo bya Coronavirus bizaboneka kandi "mbere y’uko uyu mwaka ushira."
Ububushakashatsi buzagera mu Rwanda
Umuyobozi Mukuru wa Rwanda FDA, Dr Karangwa Charles, yabwiye IGIHE ko LEAF Pharmaceuticals yamaze gusaba uburenganzira bwo gukorera ubu bushakashatsi mu Rwanda, harebwa uburyo uwo muti ukora.
Yagize ati “Turacyaganira, hari ibyangombwa [bisabwa] kugira ngo batangire, hari ibikenerwa tukiganiraho, mu minsi mike rwose, hari ibikeneye gusobanurwa kugira ngo bimenyekane uburyo bizakorwa, kuko ntabwo wakwemera ko umuntu wese apfa gukora ku bantu, hari inzira zikurikizwa ziba ziriho, nibyo tukiganiraho, ariko ndumva biri mu nzira yo gusozwa.”
Yavuze ko uyu muti uzunganira abanduye kimwe n’abafite izindi ndwara zitera kugira umwuka muke, zaba iziterwa n’udukoko nka malaria cyangwa iziterwa na virus na COVID-19.
Yakomeje ati “Ikibitera ni uko abantu babura umwuka mu bice by’umubiri (tissue). Bo rero ubushakashatsi bwabo burareba uburyo bwakongera ubudahangarwa bw’umubiri kugira ngo wa mwuka ubura, ugereyo. Bafite rero imiti bashaka gukoraho ubushakashatsi, izajya ituma noneho wa mwuka utabura, kugira ngo umubiri ukomeze urwanye iyo ndwara. “
Kugeza ubu nta muti wa COVID-19 uraboneka, ahubwo havurwa ibimenyetso byayo, igikomeye kikaba kubura umwuka ku muntu wanduye kuko iyi virus itura mu bihaha, ku buryo uyu muti wemejwe wakunganira cyane urwego rw’ubuvuzi.

Title: Ethiopia yasubitse amatora kubera coronavirus
Body:
Komisiyo ishinzwe amatora muri Ethiopia, yatangaje ko amatora rusange yari ateganyijwe muri Kanama uyu mwaka asubitswe kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Komisiyo ishinzwe amatora muri Ethiopia, yatangaje ko amatora rusange yari ateganyijwe muri Kanama uyu mwaka asubitswe kubera icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Iyo Komisiyo yatangaje ko itariki nshya y’amatora izatangazwa igihe icyorezo cya coronavirus kizaba gicogoye.
Hatangajwe ko ibikorwa byo kwitegura amatora byagiye bigongana n’ingamba zo guhashya coronavirus ku buryo ibikoresho by’amatora bitaraboneka ndetse n’abakorerabushake batahuguwe ku gihe.
Byari biteganyijwe ko abazatora batangira kwiyandikisha mu ntangiriro za Mata, naho amashyaka agatangira kwiyamamaza muri Gicurasi.
Niyo matora ya mbere yari agiye kuba kuva Minisitiri w’Intebe, Abiy Ahmed wanatwaye igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel, agiye ku butegetsi mu 2018.
Nyuma yo kugera ku butegetsi, Abiy yakoze amavugurura atandukanye muri politiki ya Ethiopia.

Title: Bwa mbere mu Burundi hagaragaye abarwayi babiri ba Coronavirus
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima mu Burundi, Ndikumana Thaddée, yatangake ko ku nshuro ya mbere mu gihugu cye hagaragaye abarwayi babiri bafite ubwandu bwa COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus.
Minisitiri w’Ubuzima mu Burundi, Ndikumana Thaddée, yatangake ko ku nshuro ya mbere mu gihugu cye hagaragaye abarwayi babiri bafite ubwandu bwa COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus.
U Burundi nicyo gihugu cyo mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba cyari gisigaye kitarabonekamo umurwayi wa Coronavirus.
Mu kiganiro n’itangazamakuru, Minisitiri w’Ubuzima mu Burundi, Ndikumana, yavuze ko Abarundi babiri basanganywe Coronavirus barimo uw’imyaka 56 n’uwa 42 binjiye mu gihugu bavuye hanze.
Yagize ati “Ibitaro byo mu Giteranyi byakiriye abantu batatu baje bava muri Tanzania. Muri Buremec naho bari abantu babiri. Ibipimo byerekanye ko abo batatu baje bava muri Tanzania nta Coronavirus barwaye. Mu bitaro bya Buremec hari abantu babiri bagiye kuhivuriza, uwa mbere ni Umurundi w’imyaka 56 uba i Bujumbura akaba yari yatashye avuye mu Rwanda. Undi na we afite imyaka 42 uba i Bujumbura akaba yaherukaga i Dubai anyuze mu Rwanda."
MinisitiriNdikumana yasabye Abarundi kwitwararika isuku no kutegerana mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus.
Mu minsi ishize Tanzania yatangaje ko umwe mu barwayi babonetse ku butaka bwayo ari umushoferi wanyuze mu mu Burundi ariko Minisiteri y’Ubuzima mu Burundi yahise itangaza ko iperereza ku makuru y’uko uyu murwayi yari aturutse muri icyo gihugu, iyagendera kure.
Abarwayi basanganywe Coronavirus bari bagiye kwivuza bafite ibimenyetso bya Coronavirus, birimo inkorora. Abo bahise bajyanwa mu Bitaro byitiriwe Igikomangoma Louis Rwagasore ahateganyijwe kwita ku barwayi ba Coronavirus.
Kuri ubu abarwayi nta kibazo gikomeye bafite. U Burundi bwari bwatangaje ku wa 28 Werurwe 2020 ko bwari bwasuzumye abantu bane ariko bose basanga ari bazima.
U Burundi bwahagaritse ingendo z’indege mu byumweru bibiri ndetse bunafunga imipaka mu gukumira urujya n’uruza rw’abantu bashobora kubwinjizamo Coronavirus.
Umuryango uharanira Uburenganzira bwa Muntu Human Rights Watch uheruka kugaragaza impungenge utewe no kuba mu Burundi hashobora kuba hadatangwa amakuru mpamo kuri Coronavirus, uvuga ko abayobozi gushyira ubuzima bw’abaturage mu kaga.
HRW ivuga ko mu 2019, u Burundi bwanze gutangaza ko Malaria yabwibasiye mu gihe habonetse abantu miliyoni 8,5 bayirwaye mu gihugu gifite miliyoni 11,5 ikica abantu barenga 3,000.
Coronavirus yagaragaye mu Burundi mu gihe muri Gicurasi hitegurwa amatora rusange y’Umukuru w’Igihugu y’ugomba gusimbura Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza ku butegetsi.

Title: Hari ingo zituje n’izatokombeye-Pst Rutayisire yavuze ku isomo ryo ‘kuguma mu rugo’ ku bashakanye
Body:
Iminsi 10 iruzuye hatanzwe ibwiriza ryo kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus.
Iminsi 10 iruzuye hatanzwe ibwiriza ryo kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 iterwa na Coronavirus.
Ni icyemezo gifatwa nk’izingiro ryo guhangana na Coronavirus yugarije Isi; kuri bamwe ni umuti usharira ariko nanone ugakiza.
Mu mwanya wo kuguma mu rugo hari aho usanga abakibyiruka bahugiye kuri za filime z’uruhererekane, abasoma ibitabo n’abakora ubushakashatsi butandukanye.
Abashakanye na bo bari kumwe isegonda ku rindi, ni ibihe bishobora kurambirana cyangwa bikanyaruka bitewe n’imibanire yabo. Hari abasubiye mu bihe by’ukwezi kwa buki, hari abandi bashaririwe.
Vuba aha abakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga babonye Umutaliyani wafashwe na Polisi yavuye mu rugo, agasubiza ko ‘‘Aho kwicwa n’umugore wanjye nicwe na Coronavirus.’’ Ni rumwe mu ngero zerekana ko hari abashegeshwe no kuguma mu rugo.
Pst Dr Antoine Rutayisire uzwi mu nyigisho zubaka umuryango yabwiye IGIHE ko usanga no mu Rwanda hari abashakanye bagiriye umugisha mu kuguma mu rugo, abandi bagasharirirwa.
Yagize ati ‘‘Telefoni nakira hari abavuga ko ubu baruhutse, bicaranye n’ababo, bagafasha abana gusubira mu masomo, bakabona umwanya wo gusenga n’ibindi. Hari abo byabereye ikizamini, babuze icyo bakora, uwo si bibi cyane.’’
‘‘Abandi byabaye umuriro utazima. Hari ingo zatokombeye, hari abantu neza insinga zakoranye. Umugore arakubwira ati ‘umugabo uri hano yanshobeye ntavuga’, iyo abumbuye umunwa aravuga nabi, byadushobeye.’’
Yavuze ko muri iki gihe hari abinangira batagirwa inama; hari uwo yasabye kubaza mugenzi we inyungu yo kuba mu muriro utazima mu byumweru bibiri akamubwira ko ‘‘Ibyo ubaza pasiteri uribeshya kuko ndi mukuru nta muntu wangira inama.’’
 	 Yagereranyije Guma mu rugo n’Umwiherero 
Pasiteri Rutayisire yagaragaje ko kuguma mu rugo bikwiye kugira ingamba nshya bisiga. Kuri we si ubwa mbere abisabwe ariko isomo yakuyemo ni uko yize gutuza muri icyo gihe.
Ati “Hari abantu babifata nabi, ko bafungiye mu rugo, nkababwira nti ‘ntidufunze’, turi mu mwiherero. Iyo ubifashe neza bikorohera kubibamo, kwicara mu rugo nkavuga nti simfunze ahubwo ndi mu mwiherero kuko iyo uwugiyemo hari ibintu uba ugiye kwiga no gukora, wazarangira ukajya kubishyira mu bikorwa.’’
Mu gihe abenshi bari mu ngo, bari kumwe n’imiryango yabo, babonye umwanya wo kuganira no gucoca ibitagenda neza, gufasha abana mu masomo no gusenga ku babyizereramo.
Ati ‘‘Kuguma mu rugo ni inyungu z’ubuzima bwanjye kuko nirinda nkarinda n’abandi. Ni umwanya wo gufata ikibi ukagihindura umwanya wo kunezerwamo.’’
 	Inyungu ya Guma mu rugo ku muryango
Kuva hambere Imana yabaga mu rugo, ababandwaga niho babikoreraga ndetse niho hari intango yo guterekera.
Rutayisire agaragaza ko nubwo atasaba abantu kubisubiramo ariko bikwiye ko bagarura iryo hame ryo kugira Imana mu ngo.
Ati “Ubu twabonye umwanya wo gusengana no kugarura Imana mu rugo. Umugisha urimo ni uko Umuyisilamu ntakijya ku musigiti, umukirisitu na we ntajya ku rusengero, bose bari gusengera mu rugo.’’
Inyungu ya kabiri asanga iri muri gahunda ya ‘Guma mu rugo’ ishingiye ku kubaka urugo rwiza rurimo ubusabane hagati y’ababyeyi n’abana babo. Ati “Ubu abenshi bari kumwe, bafite umwanya wo kuganira kandi bari kumwe.’’
Pasiteri Rutayisire yavuze ko ku bashaka guhinduka, hari isomo bakura muri ibi bihe.
Ati “Ababibonyemo icyiza bazajya babikumbura, gusa bashobora no kubibona ntibafate umwanya nk’uwo gushyiraho igihe cyo kuganira. Hari abazabibona nk’ibisanzwe. Abarambiwe bameze nk’abari mu kizamini kitoroshye, ndizera ko icyumweru cya kabiri bashobora kureba uko bakibyaza umusaruro. Abo babyebereye umuriro utazima na bo bashobora gukuramo amasomo nubwo bigoye. Ikizavamo kizaterwa n’abari mu rugo n’imitekerereze yabo.’’
Minisiteri y’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango iheruka gusaba abashakanye kwirinda ihohoterwa rikorerwa mu ngo no kuzirikana kuboneza urubyaro.
Rev. Rutayisire avuga ko “Ibyo dukora [mu guhangana n’ihohoterwa] ni ubutabazi ariko ubwirinzi bukwiye kuba kwigisha umwana ukiri muto uko umugabo cyangwa umugore ateye no kumenya kumutega amatwi.’’
Mu kwirinda inda z’indahekana, yavuze ko mu byo bigisha abagiye gushyingirwa harimo no kumenya urubyaro rwabo.
Ati “Kubyara si itegeko ni umugisha. Ikibazo ni uko itondaguranshinga ry’umugisha riba mu ntegeko, iyo umuntu akubwiye ngo ‘urye uhage’, ntaba agutegetse guhaga ahubwo aba aguhaye umugisha wo guhaga. Iyo akubwiye ngo ‘ntujye hariya’, biri mu ntegeko kimwe na ‘urye uhage’. Abantu babisomye nabi bibwira ko Imana yategetse abantu ngo ‘mubyare mwororoke mwuzure Isi’ kandi yaratanze umugisha wo kubyara. Biratandukanye. Itegeko uraryumvira ariko umugisha uwufata mu kigero wowe wagennye.’’
Pasiteri Rutayisire yavuze ko abakozi b’Imana bakwiye guhozaho mu guha abayoboke urugero rw’amabwiriza yo guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ati ‘‘Kuguma mu rugo ni inyungu zacu, ni n’ibwiriza rya Leta kuko biyifasha gukomeza kureba abanduye. Nituguma mu rugo, Leta izadukubitira Coronavirus, dusubire mu buzima busanzwe vuba.’’
Abakirisitu bahawe ubutumwa bwo kurushaho kwegerana n’Imana no kwisuzuma bakazava muri ibi bihe bameze neza, bafite imbaraga nshya.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima igaragaza ko abantu 70 banduye Coronavirus mu Rwanda. Abaturarwanda basabwa kuguma mu rugo mu gukumira ko iki cyorezo cyakwirakwira mu gihugu.
Pasiteri Rutayisire yakomeje gufasha abayoboke b’Itorero Angilikani mu masengesho y’iminsi 40

Title: Umuganga wakoraga muri CHUK yasanzwe mu icumbi yapfuye
Body:
Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Ubugenzacyaha (RIB), rwatangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekanye icyaba cyarishe Dr Joel Kambale Ketha, wakoraga mu bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK) biherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Urwego rw’Igihugu rushinzwe Ubugenzacyaha (RIB), rwatangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekanye icyaba cyarishe Dr Joel Kambale Ketha, wakoraga mu bitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK) biherereye mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Amakuru avuga ko Dr Kampale wari afite ubwenegihugu bwo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yasanzwe mu cyumba aho yari yaraye izamu muri ibi bitaro yitabye Imana.
Dr Theobald Hategekimana, umuyobozi w’ibitaro bya Kaminuza bya Kigali (CHUK), yavuze ko ku wa Gatandatu aribwo uyu mugabo yitabye Imana, ariko ibindi bisobanuro byatangwa n’inzego zishinzwe umutekano.
Umuvugizi wa RIB, Marie Michelle Umuhoza, yemereye IGIHE ko koko uyu mugabo yitabye Imana, ariko batangiye iperereza ibindi bizatangazwa nyuma.
Yagize ati “Nibyo amakuru RIB yarayamenye kandi yatangiye iperereza riracyakorwa ntabwo rirarangira. Turashaka kumenya icyaba cyarateye urupfu rwe.”
Amakuru agaragaza ko Dr Kambale yari inzobere mu bijyanye no gutera ikinya.
Umurambo wa nyakwigendera wagiye gusuzumwa kugira ngo hamenyekane icyamuhitanye.

Title: Nigeria: Abadepite bemeye gukatwa imishahara y’amezi abiri kubera Coronavirus
Body:
Abadepite bo muri Nigeria batangaje ko bemeye gukatwa imishahara y’abo y’amezi abiri mu rwego rwo gutanga umusanzu mu guhashya icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Abadepite bo muri Nigeria batangaje ko bemeye gukatwa imishahara y’abo y’amezi abiri mu rwego rwo gutanga umusanzu mu guhashya icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Femi Gbajabiamila, Perezida w’umutwe w’Abadepite ugizwe n’abadepite 360, yavuze ko umushahara wabo uzifashishwa mu kwita ku mibereho myiza y’abaganga bari guhangana na Coronavirus muri ibi bihe.
Yavuze ko bamenyesheje mu bunyabamabanga bw’Inteko ko imishahara y’abadepite y’ukwezi kwa Werurwe na Mata aho kujya kuri konti zabo, izajya kuri konti y’ikigega gishinzwe ubutabazi.
Yatangaje ko ibyakozwe biri mu bushake bw’abadepite mu ngamba biyemeje zo gufasha abaturage bahagarariye guhangana na Coronavirus.
Ibigo bitandukanye, abantu ku giti cyabo n’imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta muri Nigeria, yatangiye ibikorwa byo gukusanya inkunga zo gufasha abatishoboye muri ibi bihe bikomeye, nkuko Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abashinwa, Xinhua byabitangaje.
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Kabiri, abantu 153 nibo bari bamaze kugaragarwaho Coronavirus muri Nigeria barimo babiri yahitanye.

Title: Abandi bacuruzi 10 bahanwe kubera kunyuranya n’amategeko agenga ubucuruzi
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yatangaje ko mu igenzura yakoze kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2020, yahannye abacuruzi 10, nyuma yo kugaragarwaho n’amakosa yo kunyuranya n’amategeko agenga ubucuruzi.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda yatangaje ko mu igenzura yakoze kuri uyu wa Kabiri, tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2020, yahannye abacuruzi 10, nyuma yo kugaragarwaho n’amakosa yo kunyuranya n’amategeko agenga ubucuruzi.
Ni nyuma y’uko mu gihugu cyose hakomeje gahunda yo guhana abacuruzi bari kuzamura ibiciro bitwaje ibihe bidasanzwe byo kwirinda no kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki ya 1 Mata 2020, Minicom yatangaje ko abo yahannye kuri uyu wa Kabiri ari abacuruzi bo mu turere twa Gasabo, Kamonyi na Kicukiro, bafatiwe mu makosa yo kuzamura ibiciro, kudatanga inyemezabwishyu no kutamanika ibiciro by’ibicuruzwa byabo aho abakiliya babibona, bagamije kugurisha ku giciro kinyuranye n’ibyashyizweho ndetse no gucuruza ibyarengeje igihe.
Abacuruzi bose bafashwe kuri uyu wa Kabiri baciwe amande yose hamwe angana n’amafaranga y’u Rwanda 540 000.
Kuva tariki ya 17 kugera ku ya 31 Werurwe 2020, Minicom imaze guhana abacuruzi n’ibigo by’ubucuruzi 145 mu Mujyi wa Kigali no hanze ya wo, baciwe amande angana na 10 740 000 Frw.
Tariki ya 16 na 22 Werurwe 2020, Minicom yasohoye amatangazo asaba abacuruzi bose kubahiriza ibikubiye mu itegeko nimero 36/2012 ryo ku wa 21 Nzeri 2012 rigena ihiganwa no kurengera abaguzi ndetse n’itegeko nomero 35/91 ryo ku wa 5 Kanama 1991 rigena imitunganyirize y’ubucuruzi bw’imbere mu gihugu nk’uko ryavuguruwe n’itegeko nomero 15/2001 ryo ku wa 21 Mutarama 2001.
Iyi minisiteri ivuga ko ishingiye ku igenzura imaze iminsi ikora ku masoko manini n’ahandi hakorerwa ubucuruzi mu Mujyi wa Kigali no hanze ya wo, aho bigaragara ko hari abacuruzi bakomeje kuzamura ibiciro ku biribwa, abandi bagakoresha iminzani itujuje ubuziranenge, hakaba n’abatanga inyemezabuguzi zitajyanye n’ibyaguzwe […] isaba abacuruzi kureka kwica amategeko.
Minicom ivuga ko umucuruzi uzafatwa anyuranya n’amategeko yashyizweho, azahanwa n’ingingo ya 52 n’iya 55 zigize itegeko rigenga ihiganwa no kurengera abaguzi ndetse no gukurwaho kuva kuri 5% kugeza ku 10% by’umusaruro w’ikigo cye mu mwaka ukurikiyeho cyangwa akaba yatanga amande ari hagati y’ibihumbi 200 na miliyoni eshanu z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda, mu gihe umucuruzi yaba ananiwe kwerekana impapuro zigaragaza ibicuruzwa bye mu mwaka.

Title: Col Byabagamba na Rusagara baregeye urukiko rwa EAC basaba kurekurwa
Body:
Col Tom Byabagamba na Rtd Brig Gen Frank Rusagara bamaze imyaka itandatu muri gereza ku byaha bitandukanye, bajuririye urukiko rw’umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, East African Court of Justice, (EACJ) basaba ko igihano cy’imyaka 15 bahawe giteshwa agaciro.
Col Tom Byabagamba na Rtd Brig Gen Frank Rusagara bamaze imyaka itandatu muri gereza ku byaha bitandukanye, bajuririye urukiko rw’umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, East African Court of Justice, (EACJ) basaba ko igihano cy’imyaka 15 bahawe giteshwa agaciro.
Mu Ukuboza 2019, nibwo Urukiko rw’Ubujurire rwakatiye Col Tom Byabagamba na Rtd Brig Gen Frank Rusagara igifungo cy’imyaka 15, nyuma yo kujuririra ibihano bakatiwe n’Urukiko Rukuru rwa Gisirikare mu 2016.
Col Byabagamba yahamijwe ibyaha birimo gukwiza nkana ibihuha agomesha rubanda arwangisha ubutegetsi, icyaha cyo gusebya leta, icyaha cyo guhisha nkana ibintu byagombye gufasha kugenza icyaha gikomeye n’icyaha cyo gusuzugura ibendera ry’igihugu cyangwa ibimenyetso biranga ubwigenge.
Rtd Brig. Gen. Rusagara we yahamijwe ibyaha birimo kwamamaza nkana ibihuha no kugomesha rubanda arwangisha ubutegetsi buriho, gukora igikorwa kigamije gusebya Leta ari Umuyobozi ndetse no gutunga imbunda binyuranije n’amategeko.
Mu kirego bagejeje ku rukiko rwa EAC, mu gashami karwo kaba i Nairobi, Col Tom Byabagamba na Brig Gen (rtd) Frank Rusagara basabye ko ibihano bahawe biteshwa agaciro.
Basabye kandi urukiko gutegeka Intumwa Nkuru ya Leta y’u Rwanda guhabwa imyanzuro y’urubanza rwabo rwaciwe n’urukiko rw’ubujurire mu Ukuboza umwaka ushize.
Binyuze mu munyametegeko wabo Michael Osundwa nkuko Rwanda Today yabitangaje, basabye ko barekurwa kuko uburyo bafunzwemo buhabanye n’ingingo ya 6, iya 7 n’iya 8 z’amasezerano ashyiraho Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba.
Bavuze ko kuba bafungiye mu kato no muri gereza zitemewe bihabanye n’amategeko y’uwo muryango, ay’u Rwanda n’amahame mpuzamahanga y’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Mu bindi Byabagamba asaba harimo ko urukiko rutegeka ko asubizwa mu mirimo ye ya gisirikare n’amapeti n’impeta za gisirikare yambuwe.
Intumwa Nkuru ya Leta y’u Rwanda ifite iminsi 45 yo kuba yatanze inyandiko z’ibisubizo kuri ibyo birego.

Title: Polisi iri gushakisha abantu bose bagize uruhare mu gukubita umusore w’i Rubavu bikamuviramo urupfu
Body:
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera, yavuze ko barimo gushaka mu buryo bukomeye abantu batatu bikekwa ko bagize uruhare mu gukubita Niyonzima Salomon mu Karere ka Rubavu bikamuviramo gupfa.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi y’u Rwanda, CP John Bosco Kabera, yavuze ko barimo gushaka mu buryo bukomeye abantu batatu bikekwa ko bagize uruhare mu gukubita Niyonzima Salomon mu Karere ka Rubavu bikamuviramo gupfa.
Niyonzima w’imyaka 27 ni umusore wagaragaye ku mashusho arimo gukubitwa n’abaturage mu Karere ka Rubavu nyuma y’uko bari bamufashe bamushinja kwiba igitoki.
Yaje kwitaba Imana mu ijoro rishyira ku Cyumweru tariki 29 Werurwe 2020, aguye mu bitaro bya Gisenyi.
Amashusho ya Niyonzima yari yatangiye gusakara kuwa Kane ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, aho byagaragara ko uwo mugabo abantu bari bamufashe amaguru n’amaboko bakamutambika mu kirere, undi agafata inkoni ahondagura ku kibuno.
Polisi yari yatangaje ko abamaze gufatwa bakekwaho gukubita nyakwigendera ari Niyonzima Jean Baptiste na Bitwayiki Jean Bosco. Bagenzi babo barimo Bipfakubaho François n’uwitwa Nshimiye n’undi umwe bari batarafatwa n’inzego z’umutekano, kuko bahise batoroka nyuma yo kumva ko barimo gushakishwa.
CP Kabera yabwiye itangazamakuru ko kugeza ubu abantu batatu aribo barimo gushashakishwa, barimo na nyiri urutoki aho Niyonzima yakubitiwe.
Yagize ati “Bariya turabafata, urumva iyo urwana n’ibisambo cyangwa abagizi ba nabi birumvikana ko baba bagira amayeri ariko inzego z’umutekano nazo zigira uburyo zibashaka, aba mbere barafashwe kandi birababaje kuba uriya muntu yaritabye Imana, ariko turababwira ko bariya bazafatwa.”
“Umunsi bafashwe tuzabibamenyesha nk’uko twabivuze na mbere, kuko murabizi ko biriya bintu bikimara kuba byari byaciye igikuba bamwe babyemera abandi batabyemera ko aribyo, babiri barafashwe harimo uwari umufashe amaguru n’undi ukuboko, batatu nibo bagishakishwa barimo na nyiri urutoki n’abandi babiri bamukubitaga.”
CP Kabera yavuze ko abantu batagomba kwihanira ahubwo bakwiye kuregera inzego zibishinzwe hakitabazwa amategeko kugira ngo uwakoze icyaha ahanwe.

Title: Obama yasonze Trump utorohewe no guhashya Coronavirus, anenga imyanzuro ye ku kurengera ibidukikije
Body:
Uwahoze ari Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Barrack Obama, yanenze ubutegetsi bwa Donald Trump bwatangaje ko bugiye gukuraho itegeko yari yarasize rirebana no kugabanya ingano y’ibikomoka kuri peteroli imodoka zikoresha, hagamijwe kurengera ibidukikije.
Uwahoze ari Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Barrack Obama, yanenze ubutegetsi bwa Donald Trump bwatangaje ko bugiye gukuraho itegeko yari yarasize rirebana no kugabanya ingano y’ibikomoka kuri peteroli imodoka zikoresha, hagamijwe kurengera ibidukikije.
Kuri uyu wa kabiri, tariki ya 31 Werurwe 2020, Obama abinyujije kuri Twitter yavuze ko Abanyamerika bagomba gusobanuza neza ibikorwa n’abayobozi bitoreye.
Ati “Twabonye twese ingaruka zikomeye zatewe n’abanze kumva umuburo watanzwe ku cyorezo cyugarije Isi ubu. Ntidushobora kwihanganira na none ingaruka zizaterwa no kwinangira ku ngamba zo kurengera ibidukikije. Twese hamwe by’umwihariko urubyiruko tugomba kubaza byimbitse guverinoma yacu ku rwego rwose kandi tukabitorera.”
Amagambo ya Obama ni amwe muri make avugiye mu ruhame anenga uwamusimbuye muri White House, wagaragaje ko azakora ibishoboka byose (Trump) agatesha agaciro ibigwi bya Obama, by’umwihariko kuri politiki ze zo kurengera ibidukikije.
Mu myaka itatu ishize, Obama yagaragaje agahinda gakomeye yatewe n’icyemezo cya Trump cyo kuvana Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu masezerano yo kurengera ibidukikije ya Paris, avuga ko icyo cyemezo kigaragaza ubuyobozi bw’agatsiko katifuza ahazaza heza.
Icyemezo cyo guhindura amategeko ajyanye no kugabanya lisansi na mazutu bikoreshwa n’ibinyabiziga muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika cyafashwe kuri uyu wa kabiri, abasesenguzi bavuga ko abazabyungukiramo ari inganda zitunganya ibikomoka kuri peteroli gusa kandi ko bitazatuma intego yo kugabanya imyuka yoherezwa mu kirere igerwaho nkuko byari byariyemejwe n’ibihugu byashyize umukono ku masezerano ya Paris.

Title: U Bushinwa bwagaragaje kutambara udupfukamunwa nk’amakosa ibihugu biri gukora mu kwirinda COVID-19
Body:
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kurwanya indwara z’ibyorezo mu Bushinwa, George Gao, yagaragaje ko hari amakosa akomeye ibihugu bihanganye na Coronavirus biri gukora, arimo kudashishikariza abaturage kwambara udupfukamunwa, mask.
Umuyobozi w’Ikigo gishinzwe kurwanya indwara z’ibyorezo mu Bushinwa, George Gao, yagaragaje ko hari amakosa akomeye ibihugu bihanganye na Coronavirus biri gukora, arimo kudashishikariza abaturage kwambara udupfukamunwa, mask.
Gao yabitangaje mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru cyandika ku buzima, Science Magazine.
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko kimwe mu byabafashije kugabanya umubare w’abandura Coronavirus mu Bushinwa, ari ingamba zirimo gupima abaturage, gufunga ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi, gushyira mu kato abanduye, kwirinda kw’abaturage bambara udupfukamurwa n’ibindi.
Yavuze ko abandura muri iyi minsi mu gihugu cye batakiri benshi, nubwo yemeza ko abashakashatsi bagikora amanywa n’ijoro bashaka umuti cyangwa urukingo rwa Coronavirus.
Abajijwe amakosa ibindi bihugu biri gukora mu guhangana n’icyo cyorezo, Gao yavuze ko kudashishikariza abaturage kwambara udupfukamurwa ari amakosa.
Yagize ati “Ikosa rikomeye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’i Burayi, uko mbibona ni uko abaturage batambara udupfukamunwa. Iyi virusi yandurira mu guhererekanya amatembabuzi no guhuza imibiri. Amatembabuzi ariko agira uruhare rukomeye.”
“Uba ugomba kwambara agapfukamunwa kuko nk’igihe uri kuvuga, hari amatembabuzi ava mu kanwa kawe. Hari abagiye bandura mu buryo butandukanye. Baramutse bambaye udupfukamunwa rero, byarinda ko virusi iva kuri bamwe ngo ijye ku bandi.”
Mu minsi ishize, havuzwe ibitandukanye, abantu bagaragaza ko Coronavirus yaba yaravuye mu isoko ryo muri Wuhan ricuruza inyama z’inyamaswa zo mu gasozi, bityo abariye kuri izo nyama bakaba barakwirakwije virusi.
Gao yavuze ko nta gihamya ihari kuko ubushakashatsi bukomeje ngo bamenye aho virusi yaturutse.
Hari umuti witwa “Remdesivir” uri gukorwaho ubushakashatsi, bivugwa ko utanga icyizere cyo kuvura Coronavirus.
Gao yavuze ko byitezwe ko nibura muri uku kwezi kwa Kane aribwo igeragezwa ryawo mu Bushinwa rizaba rirangiye.
Yabajijwe kandi ku mvugo Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump akunze gukoresha, avuga ko Coronavirus ari virusi y’Abashinwa.
Gao yanenze iyo mvugo ati “Ntabwo ari byo kuyita virusi yo mu Bushinwa. Iyi virusi ni iy’isi yose. Ni umwanzi utwugarije twese, si umwanzi w’umuntu runaka cyangwa igihugu runaka gusa.”
Abanduye Coronavirus mu Bushinwa basaga ibihumbi 81, abo yahitanye ni 3300 naho abakize basaga ibihumbi 76.

Title: DJ Pius yasohoye indirimbo “Ubuzima bushira” yanditse akomoye inganzo ku rupfu rwa Mowzey Radio
Body:
Rickie Pius Rukabuza wamenyekanye nka DJ Pius yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Ubuzima bushira’ iri kuri album yashyize hanze mu 2018, yanditse nyuma y’urupfu rwa Mowzey Radio wari inshuti ye magara akaba icyamamare mu muziki wa Uganda banakoranye indirimbo bise "Play it again".
Rickie Pius Rukabuza wamenyekanye nka DJ Pius yashyize hanze indirimbo yise ‘Ubuzima bushira’ iri kuri album yashyize hanze mu 2018, yanditse nyuma y’urupfu rwa Mowzey Radio wari inshuti ye magara akaba icyamamare mu muziki wa Uganda banakoranye indirimbo bise "Play it again".
Iyi ndirimbo irimo ubutumwa bwo kwereka abantu ko ubuzima bugira iherezo bityo nta n’umwe ukwiriye kubwiratana ahubwo akwiriye kubukoresha neza uko bikwiriye kandi agasabana na buri wese.
Hari aho agira ati “Burya umwenda mutirano ntabwo ujya umara imbeho, niyo wakorera duke terwa ishema n’uko ari utwawe n’ukorera ayawe uko yaba angana kose ntukabure kwishimira ubuzima utagura. Waba motari cyangwa umushoramari, waba umuhinzi cyangwa umucuruzi”.
DJ Pius yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo yayikoze nyuma y’uko Mowzey Radio wari mu itsinda rya Good Life yitabye Imana ku ya Mbere Gashyantare 2018.
Ati “Ni indirimbo nakoze nyuma y’uko Radio yitabye Imana, irimo ubutumwa bwafasha bukanigisha uwayumvise wese. Nyisohoye iki gihe kuko ibi bihe turimo muri iyi minsi byongeye bikatwereka ko abantu bose aho bava bakagera ari bamwe. Ibiza ntibirobanura, dukwiye kumenya ko icyahutaza undi nawe cyakubabaza.”
DJ Pius uhagarariye ikompanyi yitwa 1K Entertainment isanzwe ifasha abahanzi n’aba DJ banyuranye mu mwaka ushize yari yasohoye indirimbo yise “Mfate moto”.
Tariki ya 4 Kanama 2018 muri Camp Kigali nabwo yamuritse album ye ya mbere yise ‘Iwacu’ nyuma yo kuva mu itsinda yahozemo rya Two4Real yari ahuriyemo na TK Aidan. 
Yashyigikiwe n’abahanzi bakomeye barimo Dr Jose Chameleone, Weasel, Pallaso, Bruce Melodie, Farious, Charly & Nina, Uncle Austin, Jules Sentore, Jack B na Babou.
Umva indirimbo nshya ya DJ Pius yise “Ubuzima bushira”

Title: USA: Abantu ibihumbi 240 bashobora kwicwa na Coronavirus; Trump yateguje abaturage ku minsi ikomeye imbere
Body:
Perezida Donald Trump yatanze umuburo w’ibihe bikomeye kandi by’akababaro bitegereje Amerika mu byumweru bibiri biri imbere kubera Coronavirus, aho nibura abantu bagera ku bihumbi 240 bashobora gupfa.
Perezida Donald Trump yatanze umuburo w’ibihe bikomeye kandi by’akababaro bitegereje Amerika mu byumweru bibiri biri imbere kubera Coronavirus, aho nibura abantu bagera ku bihumbi 240 bashobora gupfa.
Ni ubutumwa butomoye Trump wari umaze iminsi agerageza gukerensa no koroshya uburemere bw’icyorezo cya Coronavirus yageneye Abanyamerika.
Noneho yumvikanye avuga ukuri kuri iki cyorezo cyatitije Isi aho kucyoroshya yerurira Abanyamerika ko imbere hari iminsi mibi kurusha iyo barimo ubu.
Ati “Ndashaka ko buri munyamerika yitegurira iminsi ikomeye iri imbere. Tugiye kunyura mu byumweru bibiri bikomeye.”
Trump agendeye ku biri kubera mu bitaro bya New York biri kugwamo abantu benshi bazize Coronavirus, yasabye abantu kutegerana no guhana intera aho bari hose nibura mu minsi 30 mu rwego rwo kurwanya ikwirakwira ry’icyo cyorezo.
Nyuma yo kuvuga ayo magambo, ukuriye ibikorwa byo guhangana na Coronavirus muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerikam, Dr. Deborah Birx, yavuze ko nubwo amabwiriza yakurikizwa uko bikwiye abantu bari hagati y’ibihumbi 100 na 240 bashobora gupfa.
Inzobere mu rwego rw’ubuzima muri Amerika, Dr Anthony Fauci, yahise agira ati “Tugomba kwitegura. Tugiye gukora uko dushoboye kose ku buryo iyo mibare itazagera aho.”
Ni ubwa mbere Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuze ku mibare y’abashobora gupfa bazize Coronavirus imaze kugera muri leta 50.
Abanduye Coronavirus bagera kuri 188592 muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akaba aricyo gihugu gifite abantu benshi. Abamaze gupfa ni 4 055 naho abakize ni 7 251.

Title: Serivisi zimwe zahagaze, hafatwa ingamba nshya ku bivuriza kuri Mutuweli na RAMA kubera COVID-19
Body:
Ikigo cy’Ubwiteganyirize mu Rwanda (RSSB) cyafashe ingamba ku banyamuryango bacyo basanzwe bakoresha ubwisungane mu kwivuza (Mituweli) n’ubwishingizi bw’abakozi buzwi nka RAMA, muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Ikigo cy’Ubwiteganyirize mu Rwanda (RSSB) cyafashe ingamba ku banyamuryango bacyo basanzwe bakoresha ubwisungane mu kwivuza (Mituweli) n’ubwishingizi bw’abakozi buzwi nka RAMA, muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda icyorezo cya coronavirus.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yahagaritse serivisi zimwe na zimwe mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri , kugira ngo hirindwe ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya coronavirus. Muri serivisi zihagaritswe, iz’ubuvuzi ntizirimo. Amavuriro n’ibitaro byarakomeje.
Kugira ngo abarwayi bivuze, abakoresha Mituweli cyangwa RAMA hari ibyo basabwa, icyakora RSSB yashyzeho amabwiriza mashya araba akurikizwa muri ibi bihe serivisi zimwe zahagaritswe, kugira ngo abarwayi bavurwe.
Mu itangazo iki kigo cyashyize hanze, cyatangaje ko ku banyamuryango ba Mituweli icyangombwa cyajyaga kiva mu kagari kugira ngo abana batarafata indangamuntu bahabwe amakarita kitakiri ngombwa.
Icyemezo cy’amavuko kandi cyajyaga gitangwa n’ivuriro kikamara amezi atatu umwana ahabwa ibikorwa by’ubuvuzi kuva avutse, kuri ubu kizajya kimara amezi atandatu. Ibi ni nako bizagenda ku bana bavuka ku bakoresha RAMA.
RSSB yatangaje ko ku bakoresha RAMA, impushya zo kwivuza z’igihe gito zarengeje igihe n’iziri hafi kurangira zongerewe igihe kugeza tariki 31 Gicurasi 2020.
Itangazo ryashyizweho Umukono n’Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RSSB, Regis Rugemanshuro, rivuga ko umukozi utarabona ikarita yo kwivuza ariko yaramaze kwandikwa no gutangirwa imisanzu azaba akoresha indangamuntu kugira ngo abone serivisi zo kwivuza.
RSSB yatangaje ko kwakira dosiye nshya zisaba amafaranga ya pansiyo, ay’ibyago bikomoka ku kazi cyangwa agenerwa umugore uri mu kiruhuko cyo kubyara byabaye bihagaze, kimwe no gusaba ubwishingizi bw’indwara ku bakozi b’ibigo byigenga.
Kwishyura umusanzu ya Mituweli birakomeza hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga nkuko byari bisanzwe.
Iminsi 11 irashize amabwiriza y’ibyumweru bibiri ashyizweho mu kwirinda coronavirus mu Rwanda, gusa inzego z’ubuzima zagiye zigaragaza ko igihe gishobora kongerwa bitewe nuko icyorezo kizaba gihagaze.
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Kabiri, abantu 75 nibo bari bamaze gutangazwa ko banduye coronavirus mu Rwanda.

Title: Amajyaruguru: Abakora isuku basabye gusubukura akazi bakurikije amabwiriza yo kwirinda COVID-19
Body:
Guverineri w’intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yemereye abasanzwe bakora isuku ku mihanda no mu busitani kubakorera ubuvugizi, kugira ngo bemererwe gukomeza gukora mu rwego rwo gukomeza kubungabunga isuku.
Guverineri w’intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, yemereye abasanzwe bakora isuku ku mihanda no mu busitani kubakorera ubuvugizi, kugira ngo bemererwe gukomeza gukora mu rwego rwo gukomeza kubungabunga isuku.
Aba baturage bamaze iminsi bagaragaza ko kuva icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyagera mu Rwanda imirimo yabo yahagaritswe, ngo bikaba byaratumye imihanda yaramezeho ibyatsi n’ubusitani.
Bamwe mu basanzwe bakora iyo mirimo bavuga ko baramutse bakomorewe bakongera gukora bakubahiriza byihariye amabwiriza yo guhana intera mu rwego rwo gukomeza kwirinda gukwirakwiza icyorezo cya Covid-19.
Ikimanimpaye Patricie ni umwe muri bo yagize ati “N’ubundi twari dusanzwe dukora dutatanye kuko buri wese aba afite aho akora, baturetse tugakomeza gukora twakomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda icyorezo cya Covid-19, kuko n’ubusanzwe twahanaga nka metero 100, isuku y’aho dutuye no ku mubiri ni ngombwa ariko n’iyi mihanda igasukurwa."
Gahunde François na we ati " Twiteguye kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda Coronavirus, ariko iyi mihanda n’ubusitani bigakomeza bigasukurwa, nk’ubu mutembereye iyi mihanda mwasanga harameze ibigunda, ibikori byuzuyemo, ntabwo hakwiye kuba nk’itongo kandi hari abantu, bareke dukore Igihugu cyacu kigumane isuku nk’iyo twahoranye."
Aba bakozi kandi banasaba ko bazajya bahembwa buri kwezi aho guhemberwa amezi atatu nk’uko bari basanzwe bahembwa, kuko ngo muri ibi bihe byo kwirinda icyorezo cya Covid-19 bakenera ibintu byinshi, yaba ibyo kurya n’ibundi bikoresho bakenera buri munsi birimo iby’isuku ibafasha kwirinda.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru Gatabazi Jean Marie Vianney, avuga ko ibi byifuzo byose bigiye gukorerwa ubuvugizi kandi bigakemuka mu buryo bwiza.
Yagize ati " Ubundi abakora isuku yo mu mihanda no mu busitani ntaho batandukaniye n’abahinga, kandi basanzwe bakora bategeranye, ndetse isuku ni ngombwa, iki ndetse n’icyo basaba ku bijyanye n’imihemberwe yabo byose turakomeza kubikorera ubuvugizi harebwe uko byakemuka."
Kuva mu Rwanda hagaragara umuntu wa mbere wanduye Covid-19, hatangiye gushyirwaho amabwiriza yihariye yo kwirinda iki cyorezo, aho imwe mu mirimo yagiye ihagarara gukorwa, abantu bakaguma mu ngo hirindwa ikwirakwira cya coronavirus.

Title: Coronavirus : Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zihariye benshi banduye, u Butaliyani ku isonga mu bapfuye

Title: Burya dusangiye gupfa no gukira!
Body:
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko y’iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bw’umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire y’ikirere cyangwa ku misazire y’isi nk’uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Hari benshi barajwe ishinga no gushakisha inkomoko y’iki cyorezo cya coronavirus. Byaba bituruka ku makosa cyangwa ubushake bw’umuntu, byaba bikomoka ku mihindagurikire y’ikirere cyangwa ku misazire y’isi nk’uko bamwe babivuga, icyo tubona ni uko twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki cyorezo cyadushyize ku munzani w’ubuzima kandi cyitwereka ko iby’ingenzi ari ibyo duhuje kurusha ibidutandukanya.
Abakomeye n’aboroheje, abami n’abatware bahuje icyifuzo n’aboro! Twese turasaba Imana kubaho. Intambara zari zarananiranye zerekanye ko burya turwaniraga ubusa, nazo ziraceceka! Twese twabonye akanya ko kwitekerezaho, maze tubona ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira koko!
Dusangiye gukira: Twese twaremwe mu ishusho y’Imana kandi iduha Ubuhanga, Ubwenge, ubwigenge n’umutima ukunda kugira ngo tubashe gukora ugushaka kwayo, harimo kugenga ibindi biremwa no kubana neza mu rukundo n’abandi. Twese twaremewe gusingiza Imana no kubana nayo (Reba Yh 17).
Dusangiye gupfa: Dusangiye gupfa nk’uko dusangiye ingaruka z’icyaha cy’inkomoko. Kuva ubwo Muntu yasuzuguraga Imana, agashaka kunganya ubwenge nayo ndetse akumva ashaka no kuyirusha, Imana yamusubije mu mwanya we ariko iranamuhana. Bityo aba asemeye bene muntu twese.
Uhoraho abwira umugore ati “Nzongera imiruho yawe igihe utwite, maze uzabyare ubabaye, uzahora wifuza umugabo wawe”. None se Babyeyi babyaye, ni nde wabyaye atababaye cyangwa atamennye amaraso? Kuva ubwo twese dusangiye gupfa no gukira. (Intg 3, 16).
 Uhoraho abwira n’umugabo ati ‘Kuko wansuzuguye, Umugati wawe uzawurya wiyushye akuya kugeza ubwo uzasubira mu gitaka, kuko ari cyo wavuyemo. Koko rero uri umukungugu, kandi uzasubira mu mukungugu”. (Intg 3, 17-19). Ibi se ntitubihuriyeho, ntiturya ari uko twiyushye akuya? Nyamara tujye twibuka ko dusangiye gupfa no gukira.
Iki gihe rero si igihe cyo gushakisha inkomoko y’icyorezo gusa ahubwo ni igihe cyo gufashanya nk’abahuje gupfa no gukira. Niba twese duhuje ibibazo niduhuze no gushakisha ibisubizo, cyane cyane twita ku mbabare n’abatishoboye. Ni igihe kandi cyo kugendera mu gushaka kw’Imana!
Bavandimwe nk’uko tubibonye umubabaro n’ibyago byacu byakomotse ku gusuzugura Imana; aho umuntu wa mbere yihaye gushaka kuresha nayo! N’uyu munsi hari ibyo tubona ukabona ko Muntu yagiye ashyira imbere ubuhanga, ubwenge bwe ndetse agakora ibyo yishakiye aho kugira ngo byose bigende uko Imana yabigennye.
Dukomeze gusenga twizeye ngo Imana idukize ibyaha byacu kandi iturengere idukize iki cyorezo.
Dusenge Nk’uko Uhoraho yabibwiye Dawudi ati “Ntacyo ntagukoreye niba kandi bidahagije nzongeraho n’ibindi (2 Sam 12, 7-8) Natwe, turagushimira Nyagasani kubera ibyiza byose wadukoreye ariko kandi tugarutse imbere yawe n’umutima unyuzwe nabyo, tunagusaba ngo wongereho n’ibindi byiza, utugirire Impuhwe maze udutabare ikibi cyugarije isi. Ni wowe wivugiye ngo igihe kirageze ngo ndengere umuryango wanjye: turengere nk’uko warengeye Daniyeli ukamukura mu rwobo rw’intare zishonje, nk’uko warengeye abayisiraheli bakurikiranywe n’ingabo za Farawo.
 Dutabare nk’uko watabaye Pahulo mu Nzu y’imbohe, maze inzugi z’uburoko zigafunguka, turwanirire ishyaka nk’uko warirwaniriye abavandimwe batatu (Meshaki, Sadaraka na Abedenego) baciriwe urwo gupfa, bakarohwa mu muriro ugurumana ariko ukohereza umumalayika wawe agatemberana nabo mu muriro, maze bose bagatangarira izina ryawe. Ubwo twiyemeje kukugarukira no kongera kukubera abana, ngwino utubere Imana, natwe tuguhoranire icyubahiro hejuru ya byose. Ku bwa Yezu Kristu Umwami wacu. Amen”.

Title: Ibyo wamenya kuri Kalashnikov, imbunda yanditse amateka ku Isi (Video)
Body:
Ntushobora kuvuga mu buryo byoroshye impamvu imbunda ya AK-47, ifatwa nk’intwaro ya mbere yakunzwe cyane n’abarwanira ubwigenge cyangwa kwibohora, abasirikare n’abacancuro mu mirwano no mu bwicanyi bitewe n’uko yoroshye kuyikoresha, imikorere yizewe n’ubushobozi ifite.
Ntushobora kuvuga mu buryo byoroshye impamvu imbunda ya AK-47, ifatwa nk’intwaro ya mbere yakunzwe cyane n’abarwanira ubwigenge cyangwa kwibohora, abasirikare n’abacancuro mu mirwano no mu bwicanyi bitewe n’uko yoroshye kuyikoresha, imikorere yizewe n’ubushobozi ifite.
Iyi mbunda yo ku rutugu ifite uburebure bwa santimetero 87, yahanzwe n’Umurusiya Mikhail Kalashnikov, iya mbere ikaba yarakozwe mu 1947, kugeza ubu izibarirwa muri miliyoni 100 zikaba zimaze gukorwa.
Kalashnikov yigeze gutangaza ko gukora iyi mbunda yabitewe n’intambara ya kabiri y’Isi yose yari abonye ko yangije byinshi bityo yifuza guhita ahanga intwaro yoroshye gukoresha kandi izafasha mu kurinda ubusugire bw’igihugu cye.
Mu 1949, AK-47 yabaye intwaro yo kugaba ibitero yifashishwaga cyane n’igisirikare cy’Abasoviyete, gusa nyuma yaje kwemerwa n’ibindi bihugu nyuma y’amasezerano ya Warsaw, bituma ikwirakwira ku Isi yose, iba ikimenyetso cy’impinduramatwara cyane cyane mu bihugu nka Vietnam, Afghanistan, Colombia na Mozambique.
Imbunda ya Kalashnikov ntihenze kuyikora, ni ngufi, itwarika neza, iroroshye kuyikoresha kandi ntigorana mu kuyirashisha. Ikindi kandi ntabwo isaba gutunganywa cyane kandi ikora ahantu hose.
Mu 2007, Kalashnikov yasingije cyane imbunda ye avuga ko irenze iya M-16 y’Abanyamerika.
Yagize ati “Mu ntambara ya Vietnam, abasirikare b’abanyamerika bajugunye imbunda zabo za M-16 bafata AK-47 amasasu yayo bakayakura ku basirikare ba Vietnam bapfuye. Numvise ko abasirikare ba Amerika banayikoresheje muri Iraq kenshi”.
Imbunda ya AK-47, ishobora kugurwa amadolari 50 no munsi yayo cyane cyane muri Afurika. Umuvuduko w’isasu riva mu munwa wa AK-47, uba uri kuri metero 700 ku isegonda. Impuzandengo yo kurasa mu munota umwe ishobora kurasa amasasu 600 kandi ishobora gukora mu buryo bwihuse cyangwa ubwihuse igice (semi-automatique).
AK-47 Kalashnikov yubatswe mu bishushanyo bibiri; imwe ifite bimwe mu bice bikozwe mu giti n’indi ifite ibikoze mu cyuma.
Ni imbunda ifite igice cyakwitwa nk’ububiko cyangwa agasanduku kagenewe kujyamo amasasu gafite ubushobozi bw’agera kuri 30.
Hari kandi igice gituma ugiye kurasa ahitamo niba akoresha uburyo bwihuse ‘automatique’ cyangwa ubwihuse gake ‘semi-automatique’.
Ikindi gice ni imbarutso. Imbarutso ya AK-47 yakuwe mu gihangano cy’uwakoraga imbunda zirwanishwa n’abasirikare bo ku butaka, John C. Garand, ari nawe wahanze M1 ndetse n’icy’Umudage, wakoraga imbunda Hugo Schmeisser.
Hari inyakira (receiver), iki ni igice gikomeye ku mbunda kuko giherereyemo ibijyanye byose n’imikorere yayo yaba kwakira amasasu, kuyohereza mu kindi gice n’ibindi. Hari igice cyongerera umuvuduko isasu, ikiriha ingufu nyinshi n’igice cy’ubwirinzi.
Imbunda ya AK-47 irasa isasu rifite ibipimo bya milimetero 7.62 x 39. Ishobora kurasa inshuro hagati ya 20 na 30 mbere y’uko utangira kuyumva ku rutugu rwawe. Ifite kandi ubushobozi bwo kurasa muri metero hagati ya 300 na 400.
Iyi mbunda itwarika ku buryo bworoshye kuko ipima ibilo 3.47 igihe nta masasu arimo. Iyo yuzuye amasasu ipima ibilo 4.78. Igice cyayo kinyuramo isasu mbere yo kurekurwa gipima uburebure bwa santimetero 40.6.
Iyi mbunda ya Kalashnikov ni imwe mu mbunda zikoreshwa cyane ku Isi, aho izibarirwa kuri miliyoni 72 ziri hirya no hino mu bihugu bibarirwa mu 100. Ikundirwa cyane kuba yihanganira ibihe bibi byose nk’imvura, izuba ryinshi, ubukonje bukabije n’ibindi.
Amateka yerekana ko ibisasu bya kirimbuzi Amerika byatewe i Hiroshima na Nagasaki mu 1945, bibarwa ko byahitanye abagera ku 200 000, ariko imbunda ya Kalashnikov, bivugwa ko ari yo imaze kwica benshi kuko yahitanye ababarirwa muri za miliyoni nyinshi hirya no hino ku Isi.

Title: Pape Diouf wabaye Perezida w’Ikipe ya Marseille yapfuye azize Coronavirus
Body:
Umunya- Sénégal, Pape Diouf, wabaye Perezida w’Ikipe ya Marseille yo mu Bufaransa yapfuye afite imyaka 68 kuri uyu wa Kabiri azize icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umunya- Sénégal, Pape Diouf, wabaye Perezida w’Ikipe ya Marseille yo mu Bufaransa yapfuye afite imyaka 68 kuri uyu wa Kabiri azize icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Diouf yari ari kuvurirwa mu bitaro biri muri Sénégal aho akomoka nyuma y’uko afashwe n’iki cyorezo. Itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’iyi kipe yabereye umuyobozi rivuga ko “Pape azahora mu mitima yacu iteka” nk’umwe mu bantu bayanditsemo amateka.
Perezida wa Sénégal, Macky Sall, nawe yihanganishije abakunzi b’umupira w’amaguru, umuryango wa nyakwigendera ndetse n’abaturage b’igihugu cye muri rusange ku bwo kubura uyu mugabo w’agaciro.
Sall yavuze ko yakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Diouf kuva ubwo yashyirwaga mu bitaro byitwa “Hôpital de Fann” agifatwa n’iyi ndwara.
Diouf niwe muntu wa mbere w’umwirabura wanditse amateka yo kuba yarayoboye ikipe yo mu cyiciro cya mbere ku mugabane w’u Burayi ubwo yajyaga kuri uyu mwanya mu 2005.
Mbere yaho yari yarakoze nk’umunyamakuru ndetse nk’umuntu ushinzwe gushakira abakinnyi amakipe aho yahagarariye abarimo Marcel Desailly, Basile Boli, William Gallas, Samir Nasri na Didier Drogba.

Title: Video: Menya ibintu bitandatu Harry na Meghan bemeye guhara kubera kuva mu muryango w’ibwami

Title: Kicukiro:Umusore yapfiriye mu nzu nyuma y’umunsi umwe uwo baherutse gusangira apfuye
Body:
Umusore uri mu Kigero cy’imyaka 32 y’amavuko wari utuye mu Mudugudu wa Multimedia mu Kagari ka Kagina mu Murenge wa Kicukiro mu Karere ka Kicukiro, yasanzwe mu nzu yapfuye kuri uyu wa 31, Werurwe, 2020 nyuma y’umunsi umwe undi mu bagore babiri baherutse gusangira yitabye Imana.
Umusore uri mu Kigero cy’imyaka 32 y’amavuko wari utuye mu Mudugudu wa Multimedia mu Kagari ka Kagina mu Murenge wa Kicukiro mu Karere ka Kicukiro, yasanzwe mu nzu yapfuye kuri uyu wa 31, Werurwe, 2020 nyuma y’umunsi umwe undi mu bagore babiri baherutse gusangira yitabye Imana.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Kicukiro Murebwayire Alphonsine , yabwiye IGIHE ko amakuru y’uwo musore uzwi ku izina rya Micomyiza ariko ibyangombwa bigaragaraza ko yitwa Ntwali Armel rwamenyekanye kuri uyu wa Kabiri nyuma yuko nyiri aho akodesha abonye amaze amasaha menshi atava mu nzu akitabaza ubuyobozi bukica urugi.
Ati “ Mu gipangu yabagamo yabwiye umukuru w’umudugudu ko amuheruka ku Cyumweru nijoro [tariki 29 Werurwe] kandi ko yabonaga asa n’uwasinze agira amakenga y’ukuntu adaheruka gusohoka , bica urugi nk’ubuyobozi ngo barebe basanga yapfuye kandi ntacyo yambaye.”
Uyu musore ngo yari amaze imyaka ibiri atuye muri ako gace yibana. Nta kazi yagiraga ahubwo yari atunzwe na mushiki we uba i Burayi. Iyo yamwohererezaha amadolari ngo yajyaga kunywa, gusa ngo yari afite abagore babiri bakunze gusangira.
Murebwayire Alphonsine yabwiye IGIHE ko umwe muri abo basangiraga na we yitabye Imana ku wa Mbere tariki 30 Werurwe.
Ati “ Hari abagore basangiraga barimo uwo mu Gasharu ari naho banywereye, umwe rero yapfuye ejobundi none Armel na we arapfuye.”
Umuvugizi w’Urwego rw’Igihugu ry’Ubugenzacyaha (RIB) Marie Michelle Umuhoza yabwiye IGIHE ko urwo rwego rwamenye ayo makuru ndetse rwatangiye iperereza ku cyateye urwo rupfu.
Umurambo w’uwo musore wajyanywe gupimwa ngo bifashe mu kugaragza icyateye urwo rupfu mu gihe n’irindi perereza rikomeje muri rusange. Ibyangombwa bye ‘pasiporo’ byerekena ko akomoka mu Burundi.

Title: RAB yagaragaje uko yakemuye ikibazo cy’umukamo mwinshi mu gihe cyo kwirinda Coronavirus
Body:
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi, RAB, kivuga ko cyagennye uburyo bwo gutunganya amata mu buryo bushobora gutuma amara igihe kirekire.
Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe guteza imbere Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi, RAB, kivuga ko cyagennye uburyo bwo gutunganya amata mu buryo bushobora gutuma amara igihe kirekire.
Ni icyemezo kijyanye n’ibihe Abanyarwanda barimo byo kuguma mu ngo mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, byatumye amwe mu mata atabona uko agenda, agere ku masoko yayo.
Umusaruro w’ibikomoka ku bworozi by’umwihariko ibijyanye n’amata wagiye wiyongera mu Rwanda, kuko nko mu 1998, Umunyarwanda umwe yanywaga litiro esheshatu ku mwaka, naho kuri ubu akaba anywa litiro 68 ku mwaka.
Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi ivuga ko nko mu 2014, umusaruro w’amata wari litiro miliyoni 634,330 ku mwaka, mu gihe mu 2018, wageze kuri litiro miliyoni 816,791.
Umuyobozi Mukuru Wungirije muri RAB ushinzwe Ubworozi, Dr Uwituze Solange, avuga ko muri ibi bihe inganda zihari zifite ubushobozi bwo kuyatunganya, ku buryo abantu bashobora kuyagura bakayabika.
Yagize ati “Muri rusange ahantu hari inganda zirimo iz’Inyange n’izindi, ubu icyiza gihari ni uko zifite ubushobozi bwo gukora ayo mata, akaba yabikwa byibuze amezi icyenda ku buryo atakwangirika.”
Yavuze ko abajyaga bagura amata yo gukoresha umunsi ku munsi ariko bikaba bibagora, na bo bahisemo kugura ashobora kubikwa igihe kirekire.
Ati “Ubu abantu bahisemo kugura ya yandi abikika igihe kirekire gusa ni ku babishoboye, ibi bituma n’inganda zibasha gufata umukamo w’aborozi mwinshi zikayatunganya.”
RBA yatangaje ko abacuruzi batwaraga amata mu bicuba na bo bagomba kubahiriza amabwiriza yashyizweho.
Dr Uwituze yagize ati “Icy’igenzi ni uko amata bayatwara muri ibyo bicuba kandi bagakurikiza isuku n’amabwiriza yo kwirinda Coronavirus.’’
Yasabye abantu guhaguruka bagakora ariko banubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda Coronavirus.
Mu Rwanda hamaze kugaragara abarwayi ba Coronavirus 70 ndetse bari kwitabwaho bameze neza, ku buryo aba mbere bashobora gutangura gutaha mu minsi ya vuba.

Title: Gisubizo Ministries na Gentil Misigaro bahuriye mu ndirimbo ihumuriza abihebye
Body:
Umuramyi w’Umunyarwanda ukomeye cyane ukorera muzika muri Canada, Gentil Misigaro yahuriye na Gisubizo Ministries mu ndirimbo nshya itanga ihumure ku bantu muri ibi bihe Isi itorohewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Umuramyi w’Umunyarwanda ukomeye cyane ukorera muzika muri Canada, Gentil Misigaro yahuriye na Gisubizo Ministries mu ndirimbo nshya itanga ihumure ku bantu muri ibi bihe Isi itorohewe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Iyi ndirimbo nshya yiswe "Ntidufite Gutinya" ni iy’ ihumure ku bahuye n’ingaruka za Coronavirus n’abandi bose bari mu bibazo bitandukanye.
Hari nkaho ivuga ngo "Ntidufite gutinya habe na gato kuko ubuzima bwacu buri muri we, haba mu byago no mu makuba aturindisha imbabazi agira, kuba turiho ni ubuntu bwayo, kuba turiho ni imbabazi zayo."
Umuyobozi Mukuru wungirije wa Gisubizo Ministries, Runyambo Eddy, yabwiye IGIHE ko bari barifuje guha abantu ihumure no kubabwira ko nta handi barikura uretse ku Mwami Yesu.
 Yagize ati “Muri iyi minsi abantu bari mu rugo mu ngamba zafashwe mu kwirinda ikwirakwiza rya Covid-19 abantu benshi bafite ubwoba, hari abandi banduye baribaza uko bizagenda, ihumure nta handi riva ni ku Mana yonyine yaremye ijuru n’Isi. Niyo yonyine yavuze ngo yemwe abarushye n’abaremerewe nimuze munsange ndabaruhura."
Abajijwe impamvu bahisemo gukorana na Gentil Misigaro avuga ari ibintu bari barifuje kuva kera.
Ati “Ni umuramyi ukomeye kandi twifuje kenshi gukorana na we indirimbo, twatangiye kubitegura kuva batangiye gutegura igitaramo bari bafite mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi, igitaramo kimaze gusubikwa kubera COVID-19 twihutishije uyu mushinga cyane ko indirimbo yari ijyanye n’ibi bihe Isi iri kunyuramo byo kurwanya Coronavirus.”
Mu kwirinda ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus yugarije Isi, Leta y’u Rwanda yashyizeho ingamba zitandukanye zirimo gusaba abantu kuguma mu ngo zabo, kwirinda guhura n’abantu benshi cyangwa kwegerana nabo nk’ibisanzwe, gukaraba ibiganza n’amazi meza n’isabune inshuro nyinshi n’ibindi.
Ntidufite gutinya ni indirimbo igizwe n’iminota ine n’amasegonda 13, amajwi yayo yatunganyijwe na Producer Boris na Bruce mu gihe amashusho yayobowe na Fleury Legend.
Itsinda rya Gisubizo Ministries ryamamaye mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana mu Rwanda no mu Karere ka Afurika y’Uburasirazuba. Ryamenyekanye cyane mu ndirimbo zirimo “Amfitiye byinshi”, “Mana uriho”, “Ndaguhetse ku Mugongo”, “Narababariwe”, ‘‘Halleluya’’ n’izindi.
Gisubizo Ministries imaze guhabwa ibihembo byinshi mu muziki birimo ibya Groove Awards Rwanda aho mu 2016, ryegukanye bitatu birimo icya Korali y’Umwaka, Indirimbo nziza y’Umwaka n’iyo Kuramya y’Umwaka ndetse mu Karere ryatwaye Groove Awards Kenya 2017 ryegukanye mu ruhando rw’andi makorali yo muri Afurika yo hagati n’iy’Uburasirazuba.
Izina rya Gentil Misigaro ryakunzwe binyuze mu ndirimbo zirimo ‘Biratungana’, ’Hano ku Isi’, ’Hari imbaraga’, ‘Yesu ndiye Dereva’, ‘Hano ku Isi’, ‘Buri munsi’, ’Iyo mbimenya’ n’izindi nyinshi zamaze kwinjira mu buzima bwa buri munsi bw’abemera Yesu nk’Umwami n’Umukiza wabo.
