Title: Minani Epimaque yemejwe nk’umusimbura wa Depite Ngabitsinze mu Nteko
Body:
Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’amatora (NEC) yatangaje ko Minani Epimaque wo mu Ishyaka riharanira Demokarasi n’Imibereho myiza y’Abaturage (PSD) ari we uzasimbura Depite Ngabitsinze Jean Chrysostome uherutse kugirwa Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi (MINAGRI).
Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’amatora (NEC) yatangaje ko Minani Epimaque wo mu Ishyaka riharanira Demokarasi n’Imibereho myiza y’Abaturage (PSD) ari we uzasimbura Depite Ngabitsinze Jean Chrysostome uherutse kugirwa Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubuhinzi n’Ubworozi (MINAGRI).
Dr Ngabitsinze wari Umuyobozi wa Komisiyo ishinzwe gukurikirana imicungire y’Umutungo wa Leta, PAC, mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, yagizwe Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri MINAGRI; umwanya utari usanzwe ufite umuntu muri iyo Minisiteri mu mpinduka zo ku wa 9 Werurwe 2020.
Itangazo NEC yashyize ahagaragara rigira riti “Komisiyo y’Igihugu y’Amatora iramenyesha Abanyarwanda ko Minani Epimaque, nimero zirindwi ukurikira ku rutonde ntakuka rw’abakandida-depite ba PSD mu matora yabaye muri Nzeri 2018 ari we uzasimbura Ngabitsinze Jean Chrysostome.”
Ingingo ya 94 y’itegeko ngenga rigenga amatora mu Rwanda ryo muri Nyakanga 2019 ivuga ko iyo Umudepite avuye mu murimo we, asimburwa hakurikijwe uko abakandida bakurikirana ku rutonde, umwanya we uhabwa ukurikiyeho ku rutonde yatoreweho akarangiza igihe cya manda gisigaye iyo kirengeje umwaka umwe.
Icyakora, iyo hari impamvu zituma ibyo bitubahirizwa, umutwe wa politiki cyangwa ishyirahamwe ry’imitwe ya politiki ryandikira Komisiyo risobanura iyo impamvu mu gihe kitarenze iminsi itanu. Iyo ku mpamvu iyo ariyo yose, Umudepite watorewe ku rutonde rw’umutwe wa politiki cyangwa ishyirahamwe ry’imitwe ya politiki avuye mu murimo we w’ubudepite, Perezida w’Umutwe w’Abadepite abimenyesha Komisiyo mu gihe kitarenze iminsi icumi kugira ngo itangaze amazina y’Umudepite usimbura.
Komisiyo igomba kuba yatangarije Abanyarwanda amazina y’Umudepite mushya mu gihe kitarenze iminsi irindwi uhereye igihe Perezida w’Umutwe w’Abadepite abiyimenyeshereje.
Iyo ari umutwe wa politiki washeshwe, umwe cyangwa benshi mu Badepite beguye kandi nta musimbura uri ku rutonde, hakoreshwa andi matora yo gusimbura abadepite batari mu myanya yabo mu gihe kitarenze iminsi 90.
Iyo bigenze bityo, buri mutwe wa politiki cyangwa abakandida bigenga bashobora gutanga kandidatire kuri uwo mwanya mu buryo busanzwe buteganyijwe igihe iyo myanya ipiganirwa.
Minani Epimaque ni munti ki?
Minani Epimaque yabonye izuba ku wa 5 Mutarama 1980. Ni umugabo wubatse, ufite umugore umwe n’abana batatu.
Minani usanzwe ari Umunyamabanga wa PSD mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo, amaze imyaka 10 akora mu Rukiko rw’Ikirenga nk’Umushakashatsi mu by’Amategeko, umwanya yagiyeho mu 2010.
Afite icyiciro cya Kabiri cya Kaminuza mu Mategeko yakuye muri Kaminuza yigenga ya Kigali (ULK) akagira n’iy’Icyiciro cya Gatatu cya Kaminuza mu Butegetsi bwite bwa Leta (Public Administration) yakuye muri Kaminuza ya Tsingua mu Bushinwa. Yize no mu Ishuri Rikuru ryigisha rikanateza imbere amategeko, Institute of Legal Practice and Development (ILPD).
Mu yindi mirimo, yakoze mu bigo bitandukanye aho yagiye ashingwa ubushakashatsi. Yakoze mu Kigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ibaruramibare ashinzwe ubushakashatsi kuva mu 2001 kugeza 2007. Yahavuye ajya mu cyari PSI naho ashinzwe ubushakashatsi, yakoze muri Sonarwa ashinzwe Ubucuruzi mu Ishami ry’Ubwishingizi bw’Ubuzima. Yanabaye umwarimu.
Yakoze muri Minisiteri y’Uburezi ashinzwe ubushakashatsi aho yavuze akajya mu Rukiko rw’Ikirenga aho yatangiye ku wa 1 Mata 2010 kugeza uyu munsi agizwe umudepite.
Mu buzima busanzwe bw’aho atuye ni Umukuru w’Isibo yitwa ‘Ibakwe’ yo mu Mudugudu wa Nyagasozi mu Kagari ka Karuruma mu Murenge wa Gatsata mu Karere ka Gasabo akaba n’Umukuru w’Abatwarasibo.

Title: Abashakashatsi bagaragaje uburyo bwo gupima amaraso bwerekana ubwoko bwa Cancer zirenga 50
Body:
Inyigo nshya yagaragaje ko hari uburyo bushya bwo gupima amaraso bushobora kuvumbura ubwoko burenga 50 bwa Cancer, aho byitezwe ko buzafasha abaganga kwita ku barwayi hakiri kare kurenza uko byari bisanzwe bikorwa.
Inyigo nshya yagaragaje ko hari uburyo bushya bwo gupima amaraso bushobora kuvumbura ubwoko burenga 50 bwa Cancer, aho byitezwe ko buzafasha abaganga kwita ku barwayi hakiri kare kurenza uko byari bisanzwe bikorwa.
Uku gupima gushingiye ku turemangingo ndangasano twihariwe na buri muntu akaba ari natwo tumuranga (ADN), kukaba kwibanda ku mpinduka z’ibinyabutabire, ibizwi nka methylation.
Ubu buryo bwifashishwa mu kugaragaza ubwoko burenga 50 bwa Cancer burimo n’izica cyane nka Cancer y’urwagashya, iy’udusabo tw’intanga, iy’ubwonko n’iy’amara.
Abashakashatsi bavuga ko ubu buryo bwo gusuzuma bwizewe kandi bushobora kugaragaza Cancer mbere y’uko ibimenyetso bigaragara. Nibura ibirenga 99% by’ibisubizo butanga biba ari ukuri ariko haracyari umukoro wo gusuzuma ko budashobora kugira ikibwisoba.
Ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi byatangajwe mu kinyamakuru cy’ubuvuzi bwa Cancer, inzobere zivuga ko ari uburyo bwiza bwo kuvumbura za Cancer zigifata umuntu. Bavuga ko ari uburyo bw’inyongera bwo kuvumbura cancer no kuyivura hakiri kare kurenza uko byakorwaga.
Ubu buryo bwo gusuzuma bwakozwe n’ikigo Dana-Faber Cancer Institute na Mayo Clinic, bureba ibinyabuzima (molecules) bizwi nka methyl bitera impinduka mu tunyangingo (Cellules) bigatuma turwara cancer.
Umwe mu bayoboye iyi nyigo, Geoffrey Oxnard, avuga ko ubu buryo bwo gusuzuma amaraso butuma hagaragara ubwoko bwinshi bwa cancer.
Oxnard yavuze ko ‘ibyavuye mu bushakashatsi byerekanye ubu buryo bwo gusuzuma bushobora kugaragaza cancer ku rwego rwose yaba iriho’.
Mu igerageza hasuzumwe amaraso y’abarwayi barenga 4000 bamwe bafite abandi badafite cancer. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekana ko 96% by’ibizamini byafashwe, byagaragaje ubwoko butandukanye bwa cancer.

Title: Bimwe mu bikoresho utakekaga ko ari inzira yaguhuza na Coronavirus (Amafoto)
Body:
Mu gihe buri wese asabwa gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zashyizweho no gukurikiza inama zo gukumira no kurwanya ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus, hari benshi batari bazi ko ibikoresho byo mu ngo cyangwa ku kazi na byo biri mu bishobora gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo.
Mu gihe buri wese asabwa gushyira mu bikorwa ingamba zashyizweho no gukurikiza inama zo gukumira no kurwanya ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus, hari benshi batari bazi ko ibikoresho byo mu ngo cyangwa ku kazi na byo biri mu bishobora gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo.
Inama ya mbere igirwa abantu mu gukumira no kurwanya ikwirakwira rya COVID-19 ni ukwirinda gukoranaho cyangwa guhana ibiganza mu buryo ubwo ari bwo bwose, gukaraba intoki inshuro nyinshi hakoreshejwe amazi meza n’isabune no guhagarika ingendo zitari ngombwa.
Mu gihe abantu bakangurirwa kuguma mu ngo, abo bidashoboka ko bahagarika imirimo bakwiye kwiyitaho no kwirinda birushijeho.
Akenshi usanga hari ibikoresho byifashishwa na benshi buri munsi bishobora no gushyira ubuzima bwabo mu kaga bakaba bakwandura cyane no batoroherwa no kumenya niba uwabikoresheje mbere atarandura.
Nta gushidikanya ko imibare y’abamaze gufatwa cyangwa kwicwa na Coronavirus hirya no hino ku Isi, irimo n’abanduriye mu bikoresho benshi batatekerezaga ko biri ku rutonde rw’ibishobora gukwirakwiza iki cyorezo.
Abahanga bavuga ko virus itera COVID-19 ishobora kumara amasaha cyangwa iminsi itarapfa mu gihe iri ku kintu gikomeye cyangwa cyoroshye; igihe kigahinduka bitewe n’ubuso, ubushyuhe cyangwa ubuhehere bw’icyo kintu.
Niba utekereza ko igikoresho runaka gishobora kuba cyaranduye, gisukure ukoresheje umuti wica udukoko cyangwa amazi n’isabune; usukure kandi intoki zawe na bwo ukoresheje isabune n’amazi cyangwa umuti wica udukoko kandi wirinde gukora ku maso, ku munwa cyangwa ku mazuru.
Twese dufatanyije twahashya ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus. Tugume mu rugo!

Title: Rayon Sports yagobotse abakinnyi bayo mu bihe bya Coronavirus
Body:
Muri ibi bihe abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, Rayon Sports yagobotse abakinnyi bayo, buri umwe ahabwa ibihumbi 50 Frw yo kwifashisha.
Muri ibi bihe abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, Rayon Sports yagobotse abakinnyi bayo, buri umwe ahabwa ibihumbi 50 Frw yo kwifashisha.
Kuva tariki ya 15 Werurwe, ibikorwa byose bihuza abantu benshi birimo n’imikino, byarahagaritswe mu Rwanda mu gihe abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo zabo kuva tariki ya 21 Werurwe 2020 mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’ubwandu bwa Coronavirus.
Bitandukanye n’andi makipe 13 muri 16 akina Shampiyona y’icyiciro cya mbere, afashwa na Leta, 90% by’amafaranga Rayon Sports ikoresha ku kwezi, aturuka mu bafana bayo mu gihe 10% ari atangwa n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo nk’uko biheruka gutangazwa n’ubuyobozi.
Abafana bayo bamaze iminsi batanga inkunga yo gufasha ikipe, hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga rya telefoni kuri *610# ndetse kuva icyo gikorwa gitangiye tariki ya 19 Werurwe 2020, hamaze gukusanywa agera kuri miliyoni 6 Frw.
Nubwo Rayon Sports yihaye intego yo kugeza kuri miliyoni 20 Frw. IGIHE yamenye ko abakinnyi batangiye kugezwaho iyi nkunga ndetse buri mukinnyi yahawe ibihumbi 50 Frw.
Umuvugizi wa Rayon Sports, Nkurunziza Jean Paul, yabwiye IGIHE ko amafaranga bahaye abakinnyi ari yo kugira ngo bifashishe muri ibi bihe bari mu ngo zabo.
Ati “Muri ibi bihe abakinnyi tubitaho bisanzwe, tukabaha amafaranga bifashisha. Uyu munsi bashobora guhabwa amafaranga, ejo bakabona andi. Ni amafaranga ari kuva mu nkunga y’abafana, bitandukanye n’imishahara cyangwa andi. Uko abafana bazakomeza kwitanga, abakinnyi bazajya bayahabwa.”
Rayon Sports yari isanzwe yinjiza impuzandengo ya miliyoni 15 Frw ku kwezi, zirimo miliyoni 10 Frw zavuye ku kibuga n’izindi miliyoni 5 Frw zatanzwe n’abafana.
Kuva imikino ihagaze hagati muri uku kwezi ndetse umukino iheruka guhuramo na Gicumbi FC ukaba warabaye mu muhezo, byatumye ubuyobozi bwayo butangira gushaka ibindi bisubizo birimo no gushishikariza abafana kuyiba hafi.
Rayon Sports imaze iminsi kandi nta mafaranga ihabwa na SKOL, aho yishyuraga umwenda wa miliyoni 33 Frw yari yaragurijwe, ariko ikaba izahabwa ikindi gice kingana na miliyoni 33 Frw n’uyu muterankunga wayo mukuru mbere y’uko umwaka w’imikino urangira.
Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, aherutse gutangaza ko ikoresha hafi miliyoni 32 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe kuri ubu hari gushakwa uburyo abakinnyi bahembwa ukwezi kwa Gashyantare.
Indi nkuru wasoma: Mu Rwanda birashoboka kugabanyiriza abakinnyi imishahara kubera Coronavirus?- Icyo abayobozi b’amakipe babivugaho.

Title: Impamvu kubahiriza ‘Itariki yo Kubeshya’ bidakwiye mu bihe bya Coronavirus
Body:
Itariki ya 1 Mata buri mwaka, ni umunsi abantu batandukanye bafata nk’uwagenewe kubeshya, ku buryo bamwe usanga hari inkuru bakwije cyangwa bagashuka umuntu runaka, nyuma akaza kumenya ko ibyo yabwiwe byari ibinyoma bitewe n’uwo munsi.
Itariki ya 1 Mata buri mwaka, ni umunsi abantu batandukanye bafata nk’uwagenewe kubeshya, ku buryo bamwe usanga hari inkuru bakwije cyangwa bagashuka umuntu runaka, nyuma akaza kumenya ko ibyo yabwiwe byari ibinyoma bitewe n’uwo munsi.
Bimwe mu bikorwa byibukwa byajyanye n’uwo munsi, hari ubwo mu 1986 maneko wa Israel yakwije inkuru ko Nabih Berri wayoboraga Lebanon yishwe. Amakuru yaguye mu itangazamakuru bitangira gusakara, biza no kuvugwa na Minisitiri w’Ingabo wa Israel Yitzhak Rabin.
Ni inkuru yaciye igikuba mu Burasirazuba bwo Hagati, ariko nk’igihuha, cyari gifite ingaruka zikomeye.
Kubera ibihe Isi irimo, abantu benshi bafite imitima ihagaze kuko nko mu cyumweru gishize, Abanyamerika basaga milyoni eshatu batakaje imirimo, ku buryo igihuha icyo aricyo cyose gishobora guteza impagarara ku rwego rukomeye.
Ikigo gitanga ibisubizo by’ikoranabuhanga cya Google, ni kimwe mu byari bimaze kumenyereza ababikoresha ko ku wa 1 Mata kigira uburyo kibeshya, kuri iyi nshuro cyatangaje ko kitazagira uruhare mu gutangaza ikintu icyo aricyo cyose kiri muri uwo mujyo, bitandukanye n’ibyari bisanzwe.
Ni igikorwa Umuyobozi ushinzwe Imenyekanishabikorwa muri Google, Lorraine Twohill, yavuze ko kigamije guha icyubahiro abarimo guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 no korohereza abakomeje gushakisha amakuru nyayo banyuze kuri Google, cyane ko ubu abenshi btanasohoka mu ngo.
Mu ibaruwa yandikiwe abakozi, igira iti “Twahagaritse ibikorwa bihuriweho byajyana n’itariki ya 1 Mata, ariko twumva ko hashobora kuba hari n’ibiteganywa tutazi. Turabasaba kwitandukanya nabyo ndetse abo bantu bahagarika ibyo baba bateguye byose – haba mu kigo no hanze yacyo.”
Ibi bikorwa hari ibihugu byabihagurukiye, aho nko mu Buhinde hemejwe ko umuntu wese uzakwirakwiza ibihuha muri ibi bihe bya Coronavirus, azakanirwa urumukwiye hakurikijwe amategeko y’icyo gihugu.
Ni ibikorwa umuntu uzabigiramo uruhare ashobora gukatirwa gufungwa amezi atandatu. Ni ibikorwa ngo bizagera no ku bantu bakwirakwiza ayo makuru ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nka WhatsApp, kuko ayo makuru azaryozwa abayobozi bayo.
Kubeshya muri ibi bihe kandi bifatwa nk’ibishobora kugira ingaruka zikomeye, kubera ko mu kwirinda Coronavirus bisaba kugendera ku mabwiriza yagenwe, kandi abantu benshi ntabwo ariko babasha kugera ku makuru bitewe n’uko hari abatakiva mu rugo.
Tariki ya 1 Mata benshi bakunze kwita “Poisson d’Avril” mu rurimi rw’Igifaransa yatangiye gufatwa nk’umunsi wo kubeshya mu 1594 ku ngoma y’Umwami w’Abafaransa Charles IX.
Kuri iyi tariki ni ho umwaka mushya watangiriragaho muri iki gihugu bagendeye ku ngengabihe ya Julien (Calendrier Julien). Abafaransa batangiraga umwaka bishima bahana impano zitandukanye cyane cyane ibyo kurya nk’uko bisanzwe kugeza ubu; ibyo biryo byabaga byiganjemo amafi.
Umwami Charles IX rero aza guhindura iyi tariki aca iteka ko umwaka uzajya utangira ku ya 1 Mutarama ariko ibi ntibyakuraho ko Abafaransa bakomeza kwishimisha ku wa 1 Mata ari nako bakomeza guhana impano; gusa bamwe muri bo batangira guhana impano z’impimbano (bihanywe no kudakoresha ukuri nk’uko byari bisanzwe) cyane cyane iz’amafi ari na ho izina “Poisson d’Avril” ryakomotse.
Ibi rero byaje kuba akamenyero uko umwaka utashye, ari na ho uyu munsi waje gufatwa nk’umunsi wo kubeshya, biza kugenda bikwirakwira mu bihugu 
bitandukanye hirya no hino ku Isi.

Title: Ntawunguka wa FDLR nadataha azaba nka Mudacumura-Gen Major Alexis Kagame
Body:
Umuyobozi w’Ingabo mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba, Gen Maj Alexis Kagame, yavuze ko Gen Ntawunguka Pacifique alias Omega usigaye ayoboye FDLR nadataha mu gihugu cye azasoza nabi nka Mudacumura Sylvestre yasimbuye.
Umuyobozi w’Ingabo mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba, Gen Maj Alexis Kagame, yavuze ko Gen Ntawunguka Pacifique alias Omega usigaye ayoboye FDLR nadataha mu gihugu cye azasoza nabi nka Mudacumura Sylvestre yasimbuye.
Yabitangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere mu rugendo yagiriye mu Karere ka Rubavu mu nama n’abayobozi kuva mu mudugudu kugeza mu murenge.
Gen Maj Alexis Kagame yabwiye abayobozi ko umubano w’u Rwanda na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo umeze neza ku buryo imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda na FDLR irimo, itazihanganirwa.
Yavuze ko FDLR itabangamiye u Rwanda gusa kuko no mu mashyamba ya RD Congo aho ifite ibirindiro, yica abaturage, igasahura ikanafata abagore ku ngufu.
Ati “Nabo bafashe icyemezo cyo kuyirwanya kandi byagenze neza. Mwarabyumvise mu makuru ko hari abayobozi ba FDLR bagwa iyo mu mashyamba, ba Mudacumura, ba Jean Michel ba RUD Urunana, hari n’abafashwe bazanwa Mutobo batagira ingano.’’
Yakomeje anenga abanga gutaha kubera ingengabitekerezo y’urwango barimo Gen Ntawunguka Pacifique [Omega] usigaye ayobora FDLR. Gen Ntawunguka yigeze kuvuga ko azagaruka mu Rwanda nta Mututsi ukirurimo.
Gen Maj Alexis Kagame yavuze ko Ntawunguka nadahindura imyumvire ngo atahe mu gihugu cyamubyaye, bizarangira apfuye nkuko byagendekeye Mudacumura yasimbuye.
Ati “Mudacumura wiyitaga General urumva aho yaguye, Jean Michel wa RUD Urunana na we ni uko kandi ufite igihugu kikwakira kikaguha n’amafaranga yo kwiteza imbere ukanga gutaha kubera ingengabitekerezo yabahezemo y’urwango. Na Mudacumura niko yavugaga ngo ntiyahemukira Habyarimana. Abakiri mu mashyamba ba Ntawunguka Pacifique wiyita ngo ni Omega ukorera hano za Nyamuragira, nadataha niko azapfa, na we azagwa hariya.’’
Muri Nzeri 2019 nibwo ingabo za Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, FARDC, zishe Lieutenant General Sylvestre Mudacumura wayoboraga umutwe wa FDLR, mu gitero zagabye ku birindiro by’uwo mutwe mu gace ka Bwito mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Uburengerazuba, Munyentwari Alphonse, yashimiye abaturage b’imirenge yegereye umupaka ugabanya u Rwanda na Congo muri Rubavu, uko bari kwitwara mu kubungabunga umutekano.
Yabasabye ko ari nako babigenza ku cyorezo cya Coronavirus cyugarije Isi muri iki gihe, bagatahiriza umugozi umwe.
Imirenge ikora ku mupaka irimo uwa Busasamana yagiye ikunda kwibasirwa n’ibitero by’umutwe wa FDLR. Igitero giheruka ni icya tariki 10 Ukuboza 2018 ubwo abarwanyi ba FDLR bakigabaga mu Murenge wa Busasamana ahitwa Kanyesheja abagera ku icyenda bakahasiga ubuzima, umuturage umwe agakomereka.

Title: Abasenateri basabwe kwifatanya n’abadafite ubushobozi muri ibi bihe
Body:
Perezida wa Sena Dr Iyamuremye Augustin, yasabye abasenateri muri ibi bihe u Rwanda n’Isi muri rusange bahanganye n’icyorezo cya coronavirus, kwifatanya n’abadafite ubushobozi, babafasha kubona ibyo kurya mu Midugudu batuyemo.
Perezida wa Sena Dr Iyamuremye Augustin, yasabye abasenateri muri ibi bihe u Rwanda n’Isi muri rusange bahanganye n’icyorezo cya coronavirus, kwifatanya n’abadafite ubushobozi, babafasha kubona ibyo kurya mu Midugudu batuyemo.
Kuri iki Cyumweru nibwo biro ya Sena yateranye hakoreshejwe uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga, harebwa uruhare abasenateri bakwiriye kugira muri ibi bihe.
Perezida wa Sena yavuze ko abasenateri bakwiye kugira uruhare mu gufasha abatishoboye, cyane cyane bakabikora aho batuye.
Yagize ati “Biro ya Sena yasuzumye uruhare abasenateri bagomba kugira muri ibi bihe bidasanzwe u Rwanda n’Isi biri mu rugamba rwo kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19, abagize Sena barahamagarwa kwifatanya n’abadafite ubushobozi, babafasha kubona ibyo kurya mu midugudu batuyemo.”
Umujyanama wa Perezida wa Sena, Olivier Mushimire, yabwiye IGIHE ko nyuma yo guhabwa ubu butumwa, abasenateri bagaragaje ko bishimiye iki gikorwa.
Yagize ati “Nyuma y’ubu butumwa bwe, abasenateri bagaragaje ko bamushyigiye ndetse basanzwe barabitangiye kandi biteguye kubikomeza, byari ukubashishikariza kujya muri iki gikorwa, bakanashishikariza n’abandi kuko aba ni abayobozi, kandi ni abantu bafite ubushobozi bwo kugira uruhare rufatika muri iki gikorwa.”
Senateri Ntidendereza William utuye mu Karere ka Kicukiro, Umurenge wa Gatenga, yabwiye IGIHE ko iyi gahunda bayitangiye, kuko kuri iki Cyumweru bafashije imiryango 28 igizwe n’abantu barenga 100 itishoboye.
Yagize ati “Isibo nyobora yitwa Imena, twakoze urubuga dutangira kubwira abo duturanye bafite ubushobozi, buri muntu agatanga uko ashoboye. Twashyizeho abantu bagenda baturebera babandi bafite ubushobozi buke turabanduka.”
Avuga ko bagiye babaha amavuta, ibiribwa n’ibindi bikenewe mu rugo.
Avuga ko uko ubushobozi uko buzagenda buboneka, bazakomeza kujya bafasha abakeneye ubufasha, agasaba n’abandi gukomeza iki gikorwa cyo gufasha.
Abandi basenateri baganiriye na IGIHE, bavuze ko nubwo batari bagatangiye iki gikorwa ariko bagiye kwifatanya n’abo baturanye bafite intege, kugira ngo babafashe abakeneye ubufasha.
Kuwa Gatandatu nibwo leta yatangije mu gihugu gahunda yo guha ibikenerwa by’ibanze birimo ibiribwa ku baturage batishoboye muri ibihe abaturarwanda basabwe kuguma mu ngo.

Title: Gaël Faye yahishuye ko amaze iminsi arwaye COVID-19
Body:
Umwanditsi w’ibitabo akaba n’umuraperi Gaël Faye yatangaje ko amaze iminsi arwaye COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus, ashimira umuganga wamufashije agakira adashyizwe mu bitaro, bitandukanye n’ibyabaye kuri bagenzi be bakoranaga kuri filime Petit Pays.
Umwanditsi w’ibitabo akaba n’umuraperi Gaël Faye yatangaje ko amaze iminsi arwaye COVID-19 iterwa n’agakoko ka Coronavirus, ashimira umuganga wamufashije agakira adashyizwe mu bitaro, bitandukanye n’ibyabaye kuri bagenzi be bakoranaga kuri filime Petit Pays.
Gaël ni Umufaransa ufite inkomoko mu Rwanda, umaze kwamamara ku rwego mpuzamahanga. Aheruka kwandika igitabo yise ’Petit Pays’, ndetse amaze iminsi mu bikorwa byo kumenyekanisha filime yagikozweho.
Mu butumwa yanyujije kuri Instagram, Gaël Faye yavuze ko mu bikorwa byo kumenyekanisha iyo filime ariho yanduriye Coronavirus.
Ati "Mu byumweru bibiri ubwo nari mu bikorwa byo kumenyekanisha filime Petit Pays nanduye COVID-19. Nagize amahirwe yo kutajyanwa mu bitaro, bitandukanye n’ibyabaye kuri bamwe mu bagize itsinda dukorana kuri filime. Namaze iminsi 15 mu kato."
Yavuze ko muri iyo minsi 15 yari afite ibimenyetso birimo gucika intege, kubabara umutwe, gukorora no kugira ibibazo by’ubuhumekero, akababara mu bihaha no mu gituza.
Yakomeje ati "Kuva ejo nagize amahirwe yo kongera guhura n’umuryango wanjye. Ndashimira muganga wanyitayeho kandi akamvura. Ndabifuriza mwese kugira umuhate no kwiyitaho no kwita ku bandi muri ibi bihe bikomeye."
Gaël Faye aheruka mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi mu bikorwa byo kwerekana bwa mbere filime Petit Pays, yatangiye gukorwa ku wa 14 Mutarama 2019, n’Umufaransa Eric Barbier biciye muri studio yitwa Jerico.
Iyi filime ishingiye ku nkuru y’ubuzima bw’umwana wavukiye i Burundi abyarwa n’Umunyarwandakazi w’impunzi n’umuzungu w’Umufaransa. Uwo mwana avuga uko yabonaga ubuzima muri icyo gihe, ibibazo by’amoko y’Abahutu n’Abatutsi.
Uwo mwana uba ufite hagati y’imyaka 10 na 15, aba yibuka uburyo ubuto bwe bwaje kwicwa n’ibibazo bya politiki zo muri aka karere. Anavuga ku kibazo cyo kuvuka ku babyeyi badahuje uruhu.
Nyuma yaje guhungishirizwa i Burayi ari nabwo yaje kubona ko kuba imvange bigoye kuko haba i Burundi no mu Burayi, hose abantu bamufataga nk’umunyamahanga.
Amaze gukura yiyemeje kugaruka muri Afurika kuko ariho nibura yumvaga ari iwabo. Filime ‘Petit Pays’ ivuga no ku mateka yaranze u Burundi n’u Rwanda, mu myaka ya za 90 na nyuma yaho.
U Bufaransa ari nacyo gihugu Gaël Faye abamo, icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze gufata abantu 44.550, naho abamaze gupfa ni 3.024.
 Il y a 2 semaines lors de la promotion de #petitpayslefilm j'ai attrapé le covid 19. J'ai eu la chance de ne pas être hospitalisé contrairement à d'autres personnes de l'équipe du film. J'ai passé 15 jours en isolement total. 15 jours de courbatures, maux de tête, quintes de toux et surtout problèmes respiratoires (comme si j'avais de la colle dans les poumons et des hauts fourneaux en activités dans la cage thoracique 🥵). Depuis hier je peux à nouveau côtoyer ma famille. Merci au médecin qui m'a pris en charge et admirablement bien soigné. . Je vous souhaite à toutes et à tous beaucoup de courage et de prendre soin de vous et des autres durant cette période si étrange❤️🌼🕊️ #covıd19

Title: Kayonza: Imibiri y’abazize Jenoside imaze imyaka 26 mu rugomero igiye gukurwamo
Body:
Muri iki Cyumweru hagiye gushakishwa imibiri y’abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yajugunywe mu cyuzi cya Ruramira cyizwi nka ‘Barrage’ giherereye mu Karere ka Kayonza.
Muri iki Cyumweru hagiye gushakishwa imibiri y’abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi yajugunywe mu cyuzi cya Ruramira cyizwi nka ‘Barrage’ giherereye mu Karere ka Kayonza.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo Akarere ka Kayonza katangaje ko imibiri y’abazize Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi bo mu bice bitandukanye bigize Akarere ka Kayonza, yajugunywe mu rugomero ruzwi nka ‘Barrage’, izakurwamo muri Nyakanga 2019, kugira ngo ishyingurwe mu cyubahiro.
Uru rugomero ruri mu Mudugudu wa Karambi, Akagali ka Gikaya hagati y’Umurenge wa Ruramira n’uwa Nyamirama, rwifashishwa mu kuhira ibihingwa birimo umuceri. Muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi hajugunywemo imibiri y’abishwe kugeza n’ubu itarakurwamo.
Kuva mu 1994 kugeza ubu hamaze gukurwamo imibiri 53 gusa, mu gihe amakuru yatanzwe muri Gacaca yavugaga ko hajugunywemo abasaga 3000.
Eng. Nkurunziza Gilbert uyoboye ibikorwa byo gukamya amazi muri iyo Barrage yavuze ko mu minsi itatu kiraba cyakamijwe kugira ngo iyo mibiri ikurwemo. Ni nyuma y’aho kuri uyu wa Mbere umuyoboro munini wacukuwe usohoramo amazi.
Umwaka ushize ni bwo hatangiye igikorwa cyo gukamya amazi mu cyuzi cya Ruramira, amakuru akavuga ko aho kugabanuka yarushagaho kwiyongera.
Muri Mata umwaka ushize abacitse ku icumu rya Jenoside bari babwiye IGIHE ko icyo cyuzi ari kirekire ariko ko iyo amazi agabanyutse hari igihe babona imwe mu mibiri.
Uretse muri “Barrage” hari n’ahandi hirya no hino hakiri imibiri y’Abatutsi itarashyingurwa mu Karere ka Kayonza. Harimo mu Murenge wa Mukarange ahari paruwasi ya EER Nyagatovu, ubuhamya butandukanye bwemeza ko hari abantu bagera kuri 300.
Hari n’abaguye ahahoze ari mu bisi bya Rwinkwavu nabo bataraboneka ngo bashyingurwe mu cyubahiro. Abanyarwanda basabwa gutanga amakuru y’aho ariho hose bazi hajugunywe imibiri y’Abatutsi bazize Jenoside kugira ngo bashyingurwe mu cyubahiro.

Title: Yasiragiye igihe kinini: Ibyo utamenye ku rugendo rwa Yvanny Mpano muri muzika
Body:
Yvanny Mpano uri mu bahanzi bari kuzamuka neza bakunzwe muri iki gihe yavuye imuzi ubuzima bwe n’uko yamaze imyaka myinshi asiragira mu muziki bikaza kumukundira nyuma y’igihe avuye kuwiga ku Nyundo.
Yvanny Mpano uri mu bahanzi bari kuzamuka neza bakunzwe muri iki gihe yavuye imuzi ubuzima bwe n’uko yamaze imyaka myinshi asiragira mu muziki bikaza kumukundira nyuma y’igihe avuye kuwiga ku Nyundo.
Uyu musore ubusanzwe yitwa Mutangana Yves ariko mu muziki yiyita Yvanny Mpano. Yavukiye mu Karere ka Nyarugenge tariki ya 1 Nyakanga 1989.
Mu mashuri yisumbuye yize Amateka, Ubukungu n’Ubumenyi bw’isi [HEG].
Ni imfura mu muryango w’abana babiri b’abahungu. Mu 2011 ubwo yari yitabiriye irushanwa rya Talent Detection nibwo yahuye na Lick Lick wari umwe mu bagize Akanama Nkemurampaka muri iryo rushanwa, wamukunze akamukorera indirimbo ye yambere yise "Wagiye he".
Mu 2013 yinjiye mu ishuri rya muzika ryo ku Nyundo aharangiza mu 2017, anatangira kwigisha muzika mu mashuri abanza. Mu 2019 yagarutse muri muzika. Uyu musore azi gucuranga guitar.
Kuri ubu ni umwe mu bahanzi birahirwa na benshi kubera ubuhanga buri mu ndirimbo ze yaba mu myandikire, imiririmbire ndetse n’uko yitwara mu mashusho.
Ibihangano bye bikora ku mitima ya benshi bakazamura amarangamutima kubera amagambo aryoheye amatwi ndetse umusore cyangwa inkumi wayifashisha atera imitoma umukunzi we nta kabuza arahirwa.
Yari ifite inzozi zo kuba umukinnyi w’umupira w’amaguru ukomeye aza kugira imvune
Kuva mu 2008 uyu musore yakundaga umuziki ariko akabikomatanya no gukina umupira w’amaguru.
Ati “Natangiye gukunda umuziki mu 2008 niga mu mashuri yisumbuye mu cyiciro rusange, mbere nakundaga umupira w’amaguru ndetse narakinaga, gusa umuziki uza kunganza. Natangiye kubyiyumvamo buhoro ndirimba mu rusengero, niga guitar. Nasohoye indirimbo ya mbere mu 2011 nyikorewe na Lick Lick yitwaga ‘Wagiye he?’.
Mu mupira w’amaguru avuga ko atawukinaga yishimisha kuko yakinaga imyanya ibiri yose kandi akabikora neza kuko yari impano yemeze ko yakuraga kuri se.
Ati “Ntabwo nishimishaga mu mupira w’amaguru, nakinaga mu izamu ndetse ndi n’umwataka kandi byose nkabikora neza. Nakuze mbona amafoto ya papa nawe wakinaga uyu mukino ari umunyezamu nkura mbikunda nza no gusanga mbishoboye. Naje kugira imvune y’ukuguru kw’iburyo turi mu mikino ihuza amashuri nza kugira ubwoba gusa na none umutima wanjye wansunikiraga mu muziki.”
“Nari nziko bizakunda ku ndirimbo ya mbere. Hari Group y’abana bari baturutse i Kayonza, bumva ukuntu ndirimba bansaba kubashyiriramo inyikirizo bampa 15 000 Frw mbona umuziki ushobora kuba urimo akantu.”
Umuziki waramusiragije, duke abonye akawumenamo ariko bikanga
Ati “ Nabaye umuhanzi wo mu byiciro bibiri cyane ko nakoze umuziki mbere y’uko njya kwiga ku Nyundo, ndabyibuka 2011-2013 nibwo nagiye guhatana nshaka kujya kwiga umuziki ariko nari mfite indirimbo eshatu. Mu 2014 nibwo nagiye kwiga ndangiza mu 2017, nize kuririmba.”
Akirangiza amashuri yisumbuye ntabwo yatekereje kujya kwiga muri kaminuza ahubwo yatekereje ikintu yakora kikajya kimuha amafaranga yo gushora mu muziki .
Ati “Nakoraga akazi ko kwakira abantu, nakoze aka kazi imyaka itatu. Amafaranga nakuraga hariya niyo nashoraga mu muziki kandi nanahembwaga make ariko nkakora icyo nakwita kubiba, nkavuga nti hari umunsi aya mafaranga azagaruka.”
Uyu musore yari asanzwe afite akazi ubwo yafataga umwanzuro wo kujya kwiga umuziki, ahitamo kukareka ngo ajye kugerageza mu muziki yari yarimariyemo arebe ko bikunda.
Ati “Njya kwiga ku Nyundo nagiye nsize akazi nakoraga. Ndavuga nti reka njye kureba ukuntu bimeze nimbona ari byiza nzakomeza. Inyota nari mfite ni ukureba igisobanuro cy’umuziki. Ikintu cya mbere nakuyeyo nabaye umunyamuziki wuzuye numva ko ikintu mfite nagisobanurira umuntu.”
Mu 2014 yararambiwe akora indirimbo ya nyuma avuga ko nidakundwa azahita areka umuziki ariko ku bw’amahire yumva itangazo risaba abashaka kujya kwiga umuziki kwiyandikisha ahita ajya kuwiga atyo, atangira gukabya inzozi ze.
Ati “Mu muryango bageze aho bararambirwa, hari ukuntu batabyumvaga neza gusa nyuma bageze aho barabyumva. Bakambwira bati ibintu ukoze imyaka ine bitarakunda urabona bizavamo? Urumva utamaze gukura? Nakoze iyitwa Karahanyuze mu 2014 numva ariyo ya nyuma, naka inguzanyo ku kazi nkora ibishoboka byose ariko nayo iranga. Nyuma y’ukwezi nibwo nahise njya kwiga ku Nyundo.”
Indirimbo ye yamamaye cyane yise ‘‘Ndabigukundira” avuga ko kwamamara kwayo bitamutunguye kuko ajya kuyikora yarebye icyo atari afite akagishyiramo imbaraga, yanasohoka akabona umuntu wishyura ikorwa ryayo mu buryo bw’amashusho.
Ati “ Haje umuntu ansaba ko nayikorera amashusho kandi njye narumvaga nta gahunda yabyo mfite. Yishyuye ibintu byose.”
Ubu Yvanny Mpano akora umuziki mu buryo bw’umwuga ndetse yemeza ko kuva muri Kanama 2019 yatangiye kubona ibiraka ahantu hatandukanye mu bukwe abikesheje indirimbo yise ‘Ndabigukundira’.
Uyu musore ateganya gushyira hanze album ye ya mbere, ndetse amaze gukora muri studio indirimbo enye zizaza zisanga izindi yamaze gukora zikanakundwa cyane.
Mu buhanzi bwe abahanzi afatiraho icyitegererezo cyane Kidum aza imbere kubera ukuntu aririmba ubuvanganzo bw’Ikirundi ariko akanakunda cyane indirimbo zo mu rurimi rw’Igifaransa.
Ikiganiro IGIHE yagiranye na Yvanny Mpano

Title: Hashyizweho ibihano bishobora guhabwa abacuruza amakara bazamuye ibiciro
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (Minicom), yashyizeho ibihano bishobora guhabwa abakoze amakosa yo kuzamura ibiciro by’amakara, binyuranye n’ibyo yashyizeho mu cyumweru gishize.
Minisiteri y’Ubucuruzi n’Inganda (Minicom), yashyizeho ibihano bishobora guhabwa abakoze amakosa yo kuzamura ibiciro by’amakara, binyuranye n’ibyo yashyizeho mu cyumweru gishize.
Minicom iheruka gutangaza ko umufuka w’amakara utagomba kurenza amafaranga ibihumbi 12, muri ibi bihe igihugu gihanganye n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Itangazo ry’iyi Minisiteri rivuga ko ‘ishingiye ku igenzura ryakozwe, igiciro amakara aranguzwaho kitagomba kurenza 10,500 Frw kandi akagurishwa atarenze 12,000 Frw ku mucuruzi udandaza mu Mujyi wa Kigali’.
Mu turere hakurikizwa ibiciro byari bisanzweho mbere y’uko hashyirwaho amabwiriza abuza ingendo zitari ngombwa mu gihugu mu rwego rwo kwirinda icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Itangazo rya Minicom ryo kuri uyu wa Mbere risaba kubahiriza ibiciro by’amakara yashyizeho, rigaragaza ibihano bishobora guhabwa abakoze amakosa yo kuzamura ibiciro mu Mujyi wa Kigali no mu turere.
Riti “Kutubahiriza ibiciro byashyizweho byo kurangura ku mucuruzi n’imodoka iranguza ni 50 000Frw, kutubahiriza ibiciro byashyizweho byo kudandaza ni 20 000 Frw. Umucuruzi uzafatirwa mu ikosa inshuro nyinshi (insubira cyaha), igihano ahabwa kikuba kabiri”.
Ibi bihano kandi bishobora guhabwa abakoze amakosa mu ntara.
Abayobozi b’inzego z’ibanze (Akarere, Umurenge, akagari n’inzego z’umutekano zikorera mu turere) basabwe gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ibi biciro kimwe n’ibiciro by’ibiribwa byatangajwe mu gihe gishize.
Minicom ishyizeho ibi bihano mu gihe hari aho umufuka w’amakara urimo kugura amafaranga ibihumbi 16 Frw. Mu bice by’akarere ka Gasabo cyane cyane mu Murenge wa Gisozi, umufuka w’amakara uragura amafaranga ibihumbi 20 Frw.
Mu cyumweru gishize mu karere ka Kicukiro, Umurenge wa Kanombe, umufuka w’amakara waguraga amafaranga ibihumbi 17 Frw. Mu karere ka Rulindo, Umurenge wa Shyorongi, ho ikilo cy’amakara kigurwa ku mafaranga 500 Frw.

Title: Facebook igiye gushora miliyoni 100$ mu itangazamakuru kubera COVID-19
Body:
Facebook yatangaje ko igiye gushora miliyoni 100 z’amadolari mu gufasha itangazamakuru muri iki gihe cy’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Facebook yatangaje ko igiye gushora miliyoni 100 z’amadolari mu gufasha itangazamakuru muri iki gihe cy’icyorezo cya COVID-19 giterwa na Coronavirus.
Iri shoramari ririmo miliyoni 25$ z’inkunga y’ingoboka ku itangazamakuru ry’imbere mu bihugu binyuze mu mushinga witwa ‘Facebook Journalism Project’, mu gihe izindi miliyoni 75$ zizakoreshwa mu iyamamazabikorwa kugira ngo itangazamakuru ribone amafaranga.
Bitewe nuko amafaranga yaturukaga mu kwamamaza arimo kugabanyuka kubera ingaruka za Coronavirus mu rwego rw’ubukungu, itangazamakuru ririmo gukorera mu buryo budasanzwe kugira ngo abantu bamenye amakuru kuri COVID-19.
Hazatangwa inkunga y’ako kanya izafasha abanyamakuru gutara inkuru z’ingenzi binyuze muri porogaramu yo kumenyekanisha Coronavirus.
Ikindi gice cy’inkunga kizahabwa ibitangazamakuru mu bihugu bikomerewe cyane na Coronavirus. Icyiciro cya mbere kizahabwa ibitangazamakuru 50 byo muri Amerika na Canada.
Aya mafaranga azatuma itangazamakuru rikomeza gutangaza inkuru ziboneye muri iki gihe cya Coronavirus, kandi binatange amahirwe ku itangazamakuru ry’imbere mu bihugu yo guteza imbere impinduka mu bucuruzi burambye bushingiye ku ikoranabuhanga.

Title: Uganda: Urubanza rwa Gen Henry Tumukunde rwasubitswe kubera ibura ry’umucamanza
Body:
Urubanza rwa Lt Gen Henry Tumukunde uherutse gutabwa muri yombi n’Inzego z’umutekano muri Uganda, rwasubitswe kubera kubura k’umucamanza.
Urubanza rwa Lt Gen Henry Tumukunde uherutse gutabwa muri yombi n’Inzego z’umutekano muri Uganda, rwasubitswe kubera kubura k’umucamanza.
Tumukunde akekwaho ibyaha birimo gutunga amasasu n’intwaro mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko.
Lt Gen Henry Tumukunde yatawe muri yombi ku wa 13 Werurwe 2020 nyuma y’iminsi mike atangaje ko aziyamamaza mu matora yo mu 2021 agasimbura Perezida Yoweri Museveni ku butegetsi.
Urubanza rwa Lt Gen Henry Tumukunde wabaye Minisitiri w’Umutekeno rwagombaga gutangira ku wa 30 Werurwe. Daily Monitor yatangaje ko rwasubitswe kubera umucamanza wagombaga kuruburanisha Valerian Tuhimbise atari mu nshingano nyuma y’uko imanza zihagaritswe mu rwego rwo kwirinda coronavirus.
Lt Gen Tumukunde ashinjwa ibyaha bine birimo gutunga intwaro n’amasasu mu buryo butemewe n’amategeko. Ubushinjacyaha bwabitangaje tariki 13 Werurwe 2020 ubwo yafatirwaga ku biro bye biri ahitwa Impala mu Mujyi wa Kololo aho yafatanywe imbunda ebyiri; imwe yo mu bwoko bwa AK47 na masotela (Pisitori).
Lt Gen. Tumukunde anashinjwa icyaha cy’ubugambanyi. Ni icyaha akekwaho biturutse ku byo yavugiye kuri imwe muri Televiziyo zo kuri Uganda ku itariki 5 Werurwe 2020, ashishikariza igihugu cy’amahanga guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Uganda.

Title: Uburezi bw’abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye mu bishobora guhungabanywa cyane na Coronavirus
Body:
Umuryango wita ku kurengera abana, Save the Children, urasaba guverinoma z’ibihugu kugira icyo zikora kugira ngo abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye bahagaritse amasomo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, bitazababera intandaro yo kurivamo burundu no kugerwaho n’imibereho mibi birindaga babifashijwemo n’ishuri.
Umuryango wita ku kurengera abana, Save the Children, urasaba guverinoma z’ibihugu kugira icyo zikora kugira ngo abana baturuka mu miryango itishoboye bahagaritse amasomo kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus, bitazababera intandaro yo kurivamo burundu no kugerwaho n’imibereho mibi birindaga babifashijwemo n’ishuri.
Izi mpungenge zije nyuma y’uko mu kwirinda ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus, cyakomeza gukwirakwira. Ibihugu birenga 120 byamaze gushyiraho amabwiriza ahagarika amashuri kugeza kuri za kaminuza, bikaba byaragize ingaruka ku banyeshuri bo hirya no hino ku Isi basaga miliyari 1.2 nk’uko ishami ry’umuryango w’Abibumbye rishinzwe uburezi, ubumenyi n’Umuco (UNESCO), ribigaragaza.
Umuryango Save the Chidren, urasaba Leta z’ibihugu ko zashyiraho uburyo bwo kwita ku bana bahagarikiwe amashuri kubera Coronavirus, hashyirwaho uburyo bwo kwiga bw’iyakure budaheza ndetse bafasha n’abarimu kugira ubumenyi bubashoboza kwigisha muri ubu buryo bitabangamiye ireme ry’uburezi.
Umuyobozi ushinzwe uburezi muri Save the children ishami ryo mu Rwanda, Ndahayo Paulin, yavuze ko guhagarika amashuri kubera Coronavirus, bishobora kuzagira ingaruka ku burezi bw’abanyeshuri.
Ati “Duhanganye n’ibihe bidasanzwe, umubare w’abana bahagaritse ishuri na kaminuza bitunguranye urenze kimwe cya kabiri cy’abaturage b’u Rwanda, amagana y’ibihumbi by’abanyeshuri ntibazabasha gusubira ku ishuri nk’uko bisanzwe mu gihe cy’ibyumweru, amezi bishobora no kurenga, ibizamini by’ingenzi byarahagaritswe cyangwa birasubikwa.”
Akomeza agira ati “Ibi byabaye umutwaro ku miryango by’umwihariko ku idafite ubumenyi buhagije ku bijyanye no kwirerera abana mu buryo bubungura ubumenyi ndetse biba nk’ikiza ku bana bakomoka muri iyi miryango”.
Uyu muryango uvuga ko ingaruka z’ifunga ry’amashuri zirenga ku kubangamira uburezi zikagera no ku mibereho y’abana cyane cyane abava mu miryango itishoboye, kuko abenshi bacungira ku mafunguro yo ku ishuri agira uruhare runini mu mirire yabo.
Uyu muryango kandi ushingiye ku bunararibonye ufite mu bijyanye n’uburezi bw’abana, ugaragaza ko uko umwana amara igihe kinini atagiye ku ishuri ari nako biba bishoboka cyane ko atazarisubiramo, ibi bikagaragara cyane ku bana b’abakobwa baturuka mu miryango itifashije.
Izi mpungenge ni zo zituma uyu muryango usaba leta y’u Rwanda, binyuze muri Minisiteri y’uburezi gukorana n’abafatanyabikorwa bayo bose gushyiraho byihuse uburyo bufasha abana kwiga mu buryo bw’iyakure kandi ikagenzura ko iri koranabuhanga ridaheza abana b’abakene n’abafite ubumuga.
Save the Children ivuga ko abana bazagerwaho n’ingaruka cyane barimo abo ku muhanda, abatagira ababyeyi, abagikeneye kurerwa cyane, abari mu nkambi z’impunzi ndetse n’abafite ubumuga.
Umuyobozi wa Save the Children mu Rwanda Maggie Korde yavuze ko uyu muryango witeguye gufatanya n’u Rwanda mu gushakira umuti iki kibazo.
Yagize ati“Twiyemeje gukorana na guverinoma y’u Rwanda, Minisiteri y’Uburezi n’Ikigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe uburezi ndetse n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa mu iterambere, mu gushaka igisubizo gishingiye mu guhanga udushya kugira ngo abana babashe gutekana mu rugo banashobore gukomeza kugera ku buryo bubafasha kwiga”.
Ubuyobozi bw’uyu muryango mu Rwanda, buvuga ko iki ari igihe cyo gufatanyiriza hamwe mu kurengera abana, ukagira n’inama ababyeyi batandukanye ko mu gihe bubahiriza amabwiriza ya leta yo kuguma mu rugo, ko bakwiye kubyaza uyu mwanya umusaruro barushaho gukundisha abana babo umuco wo gusoma ndetse ukababera n’amahirwe yo kurushaho kumarana umwanya munini na bo babafasha no kwiga.

Title: Umuhanzi Cyusa Ibrahim yibarutse imfura
Body:
Umuhanzi Cyusa Ibrahim uri mu bagezweho mu muziki gakondo yibarutse imfura ye yabyaranye n’umukobwa uba muri Canada.
Umuhanzi Cyusa Ibrahim uri mu bagezweho mu muziki gakondo yibarutse imfura ye yabyaranye n’umukobwa uba muri Canada.
Mu kiganiro kigufi Cyusa yagiranye na IGIHE yemeye ko yibarutse umwana w’umuhungu mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Mbere tariki 30 Werurwe 2020.
Uyu muhanzi yagize ati "Nibyo nabyaye imfura yanjye, nyina aba muri Canada twarakundanaga aza kugenda."
Cyusa yavuze ko uyu mukobwa babyaranye atari we bakiri mu rukundo muri iyi minsi.
Abajijwe ku kuba abyaye atarashaka yagize ati "Umwana ni umugisha, wenda sinabanye na nyina kubera amatage ariko nishimiye kwibaruka imfura yanjye."
Cyusa Ibrahim ni umwe mu bahanzi bagezweho mu muziki gakondo. Aherutse i Burayi aho yari afite igitaramo cyakomwe mu nkokora n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Cyusa yavutse tariki 13 Nyakanga 1989; avukira i Nyarugenge mu Mujyi wa Kigali. Uyu musore uri gusatira imyaka 31 amaze kwamamara mu bihangano bitandukanye bigaruka ku muco nyarwanda.
Uyu musore avuka kuri Rutare Pierre inzobere bwubatsi ufite ibigwi i Kigali, wanagize uruhare rukomeye mu iyubakwa rya zimwe mu nyubako z’i Kigali mu gihe cye harimo n’imisusire y’amasangano yo mu mujyi rwagati (Rond Point). Yanamamaye mu mukino wa Basketball na Volleyball.
Cyusa ni umuvandimwe wa Stromae nawe uri mu bahanzi bakomeye ku Isi wamamaye mu ndirimbo zitandukanye zirimo ‘Papaoutai’, ‘Alors on danse’, ‘Formidable’, ‘Racine carrée’ n’izindi.
Cyusa na we arakataje mu muziki. Mu gihe kirengaho gato umwaka amaze atangiye gushyira hanze ibihangano, ni umwe mu barangamiwe mu gisekuru cye kubera gutera umugongo injyana z’amahanga akimakaza gakondo.
Mu 2012 nibwo yatangiye gukora umuziki. Yawinjiyemo byeruye mu 2019 ubwo yasezeraga akazi yakoraga agatangaza ko ubuzima bwe bwose ari wo agiye guha umwanya.
Amaze gukora indirimbo zirimo ‘Umutako’, ‘Mbwire nde’, ‘Rwanda Nkunda’, ’Migabo’, ‘Umwitero’ ndetse n’iza kera yasubiyemo nka ‘Imparamba’ na ‘Muhoza wanjye’.

Title: Musenyeri Mbanda yahishuye uko umugore we yamusohokanye bakicarana ku ibaraza muri gahunda ya #Gumamurugo
Body:
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 nibwo itangazo rya Minisitiri w’Intebe ryahamije ko abantu bose bagomba kuguma mu rugo, ingendo n’utubari bifungwa mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, bamwe babanza kwibaza aho bazibandwa bazerekeza.
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 nibwo itangazo rya Minisitiri w’Intebe ryahamije ko abantu bose bagomba kuguma mu rugo, ingendo n’utubari bifungwa mu gukumira ikwirakwira rya Coronavirus, bamwe babanza kwibaza aho bazibandwa bazerekeza.
Si ishyano ryari riguye ku bafite ingo zibizihira, n’ubusanzwe bavaga mu kazi bahanya, uwageze mu rugo mbere ugasanga anyotewe no gusanganira mugenzi we.
Sindi butinde ku baryaga ari uko bakoze - dukomeze kubaba hafi, twaratewe buri muntu yimane mugenzi we - cyangwa se ngo ntinde ku bafite ingo zibasharirira, bahise bibaza uburyo bagiye kumara ibyumweru bibiri barebana mu maso ntawe ufite aho ahungira undi, haba mu kazi cyangwa mu kabari.
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, abantu bakomeje gusangiza ababakurikira amasomo bamaze kuvana muri iyi minsi 10 ishize, ukabona amafoto acicikana y’uburyo mu rugo bakorana siporo, bareba filime, bicaye baganira n’urubyaro cyangwa basangira ubuzima, ari nako bacungira hafi aho icyorezo kigana.
Bumwe mu buhamya bwakoze benshi ku mutima ukurikije ibitekerezo babutanzeho, ni ubwa Musenyeri Dr Laurent Mbanda, Umuyobozi w’Itorero Angilikani mu Rwanda. Yagarukaga ku bihe byiza yagiranye n’umugore we Chantal Mbanda bamaranye imyaka 36 kuko bashyingiranwe mu 1984, bazengurukana mu butumwa mu bihugu birimo u Burundi, Kenya, Congo, Côte d’Ivoire, Zimbabwe na Tanzania.
Ku mugoroba wo Cyumweru yasangije abamukurikira kuri Twitter uburyo umugore we wamutunguye, amusaba kwitegura, akambara bimwe by’umugabo ugiye gusohokana n’urubavu rwe.
Mu butumwa bwe yagize ati “Umugore wanjye yansabye kwambara ngo dusohokane mu ijoro! Ubwo namubwiraga ko bitemewe, yarambwiye ati wowe ambara uyu munsi! Twicaye ku ibaraza ryacu dusohokana ku mugoroba.”
My wife told me to dress up for a night out! When I said it was night allowed, she said just dress up today! We seated on our balcony for a “night out” pic.twitter.com/NFyfQV9EaP
— Laurent Mbanda (@MbandaLaurent) March 29, 2020
Ni ubutumwa buherekejwe n’amafoto abiri, agaragaza Musenyeri Mbanda yicaranye n’umugore we bamwenyura.
Ni n’umugoroba wateguwe mu buryo bwitondewe, kuko ameza yari yateguwe bimwe by’abakundana, hategurwaho twa buji (bougies) dukikije ururabo, kumwe ijoro ry’urukundo ryaba ryateguriwe muri imwe muri hoteli zitanga umutuzo nka zimwe zikomeye muri Kigali, cyangwa mu bindi bice nyaburanga by’u Rwanda.
Ni igikorwa cyasembuye ibitekerezo by’abantu banyuranye, bamwe bagaragaza ko muri ibi bihe batemerewe kuva mu rugo, mu buryo bwo guhanga ibishya, mushobora gutegura umugoroba wanyu, mukawuhimbaza bikarushaho kubongerera ibyishimo mu rugo, n’umuryango wanyu ugasugira.
Nk’uwitwa Donnah Kamashazi, yavuze ko ubu ari uburyo bwiza cyane bwo guhangana n’ibi bihe byo kutava mu rugo cyangwa ‘lockdown”, bitewe na Coronavirus.
Maria Kaitesi we yagize ati “Ibi ni byiza kandi ni intangarugero ku bandi bashakanye – hano dushobora kuhigira ikintu kimwe cyangwa bibiri.”
Uwitwa Mary N. we yakuriye ingofero Chantal wateguye uyu mugoroba utagira uko usa, akomeza ati “Abantu bashobora kwishima no mu bihe bigoye!”
Kugeza ubu abantu bamaze kwandura Coronavirus mu Rwanda ni 70, ndetse abaturarwanda bakangurirwa kuguma mu rugo, kugira ngo hakumirwe ko iki cyorezo cyakwirakwira imbere mu gihugu.
Ubu abaturarwanda bari mu cyumweru cya kabiri, ariko amabwiriza ya Minisitiri w’Intebe avuga ko izi ngamba zizamara igihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri gishobora kongerwa.
