Title: Sierra Leone: Uwahoze ari Minisitiri yagejejwe mu rukiko azira kwinjirana imbunda kwa Perezida
Body:
Paolo Conteh yagejejwe mu rukiko rwo muri Sierra Leone ashinjwa ubugambanyi kuko yinjiranye imbunda mu biro bya Perezida ubwo bari bagiye mu nama yo gushaka icyakorwa ngo bakumire coronavirus.
Paolo Conteh yagejejwe mu rukiko rwo muri Sierra Leone ashinjwa ubugambanyi kuko yinjiranye imbunda mu biro bya Perezida ubwo bari bagiye mu nama yo gushaka icyakorwa ngo bakumire coronavirus.
Uyu mugabo wahoze ari Minisitiri w’Ingabo yagejejwe mu rukiko rwo mu murwa mukuru, Freetown kuri uyu wa Mbere.
Arashinjwa ibyaha 16 bishamikiye ku cyaha nyamukuru cy’ubugambanyi. Urubanza rwe rwarasubitswe, ariko umucamanza amwima kuburana ari hanze nkuko yari yabyifuje.
Conteh yatawe muri yombi tariki 19 Werurwe nyuma y’uko ibyo yakoze bimenyekanye.
Nubwo ashinjwa kwinjirana imbunda kwa Perezida Julius Maada Bio , we avuga ko yari yayeretse abashinzwe umutekano w’umukuru w’igihugu bakora ku marembo ya Perezidansi.
Ibinyamakuru byo muri icyo gihugu byatangaje ko gutwara imbunda ugiye guhura na Perezida, Itegeko Nshinga ribifata nk’ubugambanyi.

Title: Ibintu by’agaciro Harry na Meghan bagiye guhara kubera kuva mu muryango w’ibwami
Body:
Mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko, Igikomangoma Harry n’umugore we Meghan biyambuye inshingano bari bafite mu muryango w’ubwami bw’u Bwongereza, biyemeza kujya kubaho mu buzima busanzwe muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko, Igikomangoma Harry n’umugore we Meghan biyambuye inshingano bari bafite mu muryango w’ubwami bw’u Bwongereza, biyemeza kujya kubaho mu buzima busanzwe muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Amakuru avuga ko intandaro yo gushaka kuva mu muryango w’ibwami kwa Harry na Meghan ari uko Meghan yari abangamiwe n’ubuzima bwaho ndetse itangazamakuru rigahora rishaka kwinjira mu buzima bwite bw’umuryango we.
Uyu mwanzuro bafashe wababaje Umwamikazi Elizabeth II n’abandi bayobozi bakuru mu muryango, bituma atumiza inama y’igitaraganya, bemeranya ko Harry na Meghan nibava ibwami, batazongera kwitwa ibikomangoma, bikajyana no kwamburwa inshingano bari basanzwe bahabwa n’umwamikazi.
Icyemezo cyo kuva ibwami cyatangiye kubahirizwa kuri uyu wa 31 Werurwe 2020, kizatuma ububasha n’icyubahiro bagenerwaga nk’abari ku rutonde rw’abaragwa b’ubwami bihagarara.
Bimwe mu byo Harry na Meghan ndetse n’umuhungu wabo Archie batazongera kugiraho uburenganzira harimo kuba:
Batemerewe kongera kuzenguruka isi bahagarariye Umwamikazi

Meghan na Harry bahise bakurwa ku rutonde rw’abazajya bakora ingendo hirya no hino ku isi bahagarariye umwamikazi Elizabeth II. Kuva bashyingiranwa bari bamaze gukora ingendo nk’izo inshuro ebyiri.
Urugendo rwa mbere barukoreye muri Australia, New Zealand na Fiji; mu gihe urwa kabiri barukoreye muri Tonga na Afurika y’Epfo.
Uru rwo rwanakozweho icyegeranyo na televiziyo ya ITV, cyatambutse mu Ukwakira 2019.
Ntibazongera guhabwa amafaranga ava mu kigega cy’ibwami

Meghan na Harry bagaragaje ko bashaka gutangira ubuzima bwabo bwite badakoresheje amafaranga bari basanzwe bahabwa n’ikigega cy’ibwami. Iki kigega cyari gisanzwe cyishyura 5% by’amafaranga yose uyu muryango wakoreshaga mu bikorwa bijyanye no kwita ku nyubako babagamo n’ibiro bakoreragamo.
Gusa bazakomeza guhabwa amafaranga na se wa Harry, Igikomangoma Charles, wabahaga 95% by’ayo bakoresha yose mu gihe bari bakiri mu nshingano z’umuryango w’ibwami.
Bazishyura miliyoni 2,4 z’amapawundi yakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura inzu yabo

Mu 2018, umuryango wa Meghan na Harry wari wavugururiwe inzu yawo iri mu gace ka Berkshire, bitwara akayabo ka miliyoni 2,4 z’amapawundi.
Nta biro byabo bwite bizongera kuba ibwami

Muri Mutarama 2020, byemejwe ko ibiro bya Harry na Meghan byari biri ibwami bifungwa kuko nta nshingano z’umuryango w’ibwami bagifite.
Ku rubuga rwa internet rw’uyu muryango ni ho hanyujijwe amakuru y’uko ibiro byabo bizafungwa. Gusa Harry na Meghan bari barabimenyesheje abo bakoranaga muri Mutarama, mu rwego rwo kubafasha kumenya aho bazakomereza imirimo yabo.
Umutekano wabo ntuzongera kwishyurwa na Canada

Kuva mu Ugushyingo 2019, Meghan na Harry biberaga ku kirwa cya Vancouver muri Canada, guverinoma y’iki gihugu ari yo yishyura ibijyanye n’umutekano wabo.
Gusa iki gihugu na cyo cyavuze ko kizahagarika ayo mafaranga uyu muryango ukimara kuva mu nshingano z’ibwami.
Ntibazongera kurindwa abapaparazi bashyira amafoto yabo kuri internet

Ubusanzwe hari amategeko ntakuka yashyizweho yo kurinda abo mu muryango w’ibwami mu gihugu cy’u Bwongereza, ku buryo nta mafoto yabo ajya hanze ibwami batabyemeje.
Hari impungenge ko kuva uyu muryango ugiye gufatwa nk’ibindi byamamare byose, amafoto ya Meghan yafashwe muri Mutarama 2020, ashobora kujya hanze batabanje kubigishwaho inama.
Harry na Meghan bari basanzwe bakoresha ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zabo izina rya “Sussex Royal” risobanura ‘Ubwami bwa Sussex’. Nubwo bazakomeza gukoresha iri zina, Harry aracyari ku mwanya wa gatandatu ku rutonde rw’abashobora guhabwa ikamba ry’ubwami, ibintu bitamuha icyizere ko yazaba umwami mu gihe asigaje ku isi.
Meghan w’imyaka 38, yari asanzwe ari icyamamare kuri televiziyo muri Amerika mbere yo gushyingirwa ibwami. Kubana kwe na Harry byateje urunturuntu mu muryango w’ibwami, amakuru akavuga ko byatumye umubano wa Harry na mukuru we William uzamo agatotsi.
Mbere y’uko Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zifunga umupaka wazo wo mu majyarugu kubera icyorezo cya COVID-19, Harry na Meghan buriye indege yabo bwite berekeza muri Leta ya California, mu Mujyi wa Los Angeles, ahasanzwe haba nyina wa Meghan, Doria Ragland.

Title: Urugendo rwa Jay-Z ufatwa nk’umuhanzi wa mbere wa Hip hop utunze miliyari y’amadolari
Body:
Jay-Z amaze imyaka irenga 20 muri bya bindi abahanzi mu njyana ya Hip hop bita “Hustle”, ni ugushakisha ubuzima, amanywa n’ijoro. Ni umugabo wagize uruhare runini mu guhindura uko abantu babona injyana ya Hip hop ku Isi, abera kandi icyitegererezo abandi benshi batabarika bashakaga gutera imbere.
Jay-Z amaze imyaka irenga 20 muri bya bindi abahanzi mu njyana ya Hip hop bita “Hustle”, ni ugushakisha ubuzima, amanywa n’ijoro. Ni umugabo wagize uruhare runini mu guhindura uko abantu babona injyana ya Hip hop ku Isi, abera kandi icyitegererezo abandi benshi batabarika bashakaga gutera imbere.
Mu 2019, nibwo Forbes yatangaje ko uyu mugabo ariwe muhanzi wa mbere mu njyana ya Hip hop ufite umutungo ubarirwa muri miliyari y’amadolari.
Shawn Cater wamenyekanye nka Jay-Z yakuriye mu buzima butoroshye, kuko imyaka ye y’ubuto yacurujeho ibiyobyabwenge. Ku myaka 13 nibwo yatangiye gutekereza kuzaba umuherwe, ariko ntiyatekereza ko rap yabimugezaho.
Yumvaga ko ashobora gukina Basketball, bityo ikamugeza ku nzozi ze icyakora si ko byagenze.
Ni urugendo asangiye n’abandi benshi bahereye ku busa, nk’inshuti ye magara, P Diddy, Sean Combs; na we watangiye acuruza ibinyamakuru ku mihanda y’i New York nyuma yo kuva mu ishuri.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 50, yinjiye mu muziki bitandukanye n’abandi benshi muri iki gihe kuko we yamenyekanye akuze.
Mbere na mbere yegereye sosiyete zitandukanye zifasha abahanzi, ariko nta n’imwe yigeze imufasha.
Indirimbo ye ya mbere yasohotse kuri album yise Reasonable Doubt mu 1996 afite imyaka 27.
Kuva icyo gihe amaze gushyira hanze album 12. Amaze kwegukana Grammy Awards 21, n’ibindi bihembo byinshi.
Album yamwubakiye izina ni Blue Print yo mu 2001, yari iriho indirimbo nka Song Cry n’izindi.
Nyuma yakoze izindi zirimo nka Magna Carta Holy Grail, nyuma y’imikoranire na Samsung yamuhaye miliyoni eshanu z’amadolari kugira ngo ariyo iyigiraho uburenganzira busesuye mbere y’abandi.
Iheruka ni iyo yashyize hanze mu 2017 yitwa 4:44. Ni ukuvuga saa kumi n’iminota 44, iriho indirimbo zigaruka ku buzima bwe no ku byo yashinjwaga byo guca inyuma umugore we Beyoncé.
Ni yo album yatangiyemo ubutumwa bwatumye bongera kwiyunga nyuma y’uko byavugwaga ko bashobora gutana.
Muzika ntabwo ariyo yamwinjirije ubutunzi bwe muri iki gihe, ahubwo yabukuye mu bindi bikorwa. Birimo nka Sosiyete ze nka Rocawear, Roc Nation Sports, 40/40 Club, Tidal n’izindi.
Ufashe ibikorwa bye byose ukabiteranya, agaciro kabyo karenze miliyari y’amadolari, ubwo ntubariyemo umutungo w’umugore we Beyoncé Knowless ubarirwa muri miliyoni 500 z’amadolari.
Mbere na mbere Jay-Z yaje kuvumbura ko ashobora gukora sosiyete ye bwite y’imyenda aho gukomeza kumenyekanisha iy’abandi, niko guhita ashinga Rocawear yatangiye mu 1999. Mu 2007 yaje kuyigurisha kuri miliyoni 204 z’amadolari na Iconix.
Reka twinjire mu mutungo bwite wa Jay-Z
Kugira ngo ubashe kubara amafaranga afite, bisaba kureba imigabane afite muri sosiyete zitandukanye nko muri sosiyete ikora champagne yitwa Armand de Brignac. Afite imigabane ingana na 100% ya Armand de Brignac.
Armand de Brignac
Ni champagne iza mu icupa risa na zahabu, mu 2006 yashyize hanze ubwoko bwayo Ace of Spades. Icupa rimwe kugira ngo rikorwe, bitwara amadolari 13 ariko ryageze ku isoko rigahagarara agera kuri 300.
Iyo sosiyete ifite agaciro kabarirwa muri miliyoni 310 z’amadolari.
Imigabane ye muri sosiyete zitandukanye
Jay-Z afite imigabane mu bigo bitandukanye ibarirwa agaciro ka miliyoni 220 z’amadolari.
Urugero ni muri Uber, aho afite imigabane ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 70 z’amadolari. Bivugwa ko yayiguze miliyoni ebyiri z’amadolari mu 2013.
D’Ussé
Ubu nabwo ni ubwoko bw’inzoga bwa Jay- Z, aho abufatanyije n’uruganda rwa Bacardi. Bibarwa ko nabwo buhagaze agera kuri miliyoni 100 z’amadolari.
Tidal
Mu 2015, Jay-z yatangije Tidal, urubuga rushyirwaho indirimbo z’abahanzi, ahamo imigabane abandi bahanzi kugira ngo bamufashe mu kuba indirimbo zabo zazajya zihagera mbere y’ahandi.
Yashakaga guhangana na iTunes, Spotify n’izindi mbuga zinyuzwaho imiziki.
Abahanzi bose bafite amasezerano muri Tidal, bemeye ko indirimbo zabo zizajya zihajya mbere y’uko zigera ahandi. Tidal ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 100 z’amadolari.
Roc Nation
Ni sosiyete ifasha abahanzi imaze imyaka igera kuri 20 itangiye. Roc Nation ifite kandi igice gifasha abakinnyi b’umupira cyitwa Roc Nation Sports, aho Jay-z akora nk’ushinzwe kubashakira amakipe.
Ni we uhagararariye abarimo Kevin Durant, Kylie Irving, benshi bakina muri NFL, abakina mu mupira w’amaguru nka Jerome Boateng, Kevin De Bruyne, Romelu Lukaku, Eric Bailly n’abandi. Iyi ibarirwa miliyoni 75 z’amadolari.
Usibye ibi, amafaranga yinjizwa n’ibihangano bye bya muzika muri album 12 amaze gushyira hanze, abarirwa muri 75 z’amadolari.
Jay-z atunze kandi ibihangano by’ubugeni byinshi yagiye agura muri za cyamunara n’ahandi. Byo bibarwa ko bifite agaciro ka miliyoni 70 z’amadolari ya Amerika.
Uyu mugabo w’abana batatu kandi, afite umutungo urimo inzu zifite agaciro ka miliyoni 50 z’amadolari.
Nyuma y’uko we n’umugore we Beyoncé bibarutse impanga mu 2017, baguze inzu ebyiri zirimo imwe iri mu gace ka East Hampton i New York ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 26 z’amadolari n’indi ya miliyoni 88 iri California.
Jay- Z afite kandi indi nzu iri i New York ahitwa Tribeca ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 6.85.
Jay- Z abarizwa mu bindi bikorwa bitandukanye, nk’aho aherutse kugirwa umwe mu bayobozi b’uruganda rw’imyenda rwa Puma, intego ze zikaba ari ukurufasha mu gukora inkweto zishobora kwambarwa n’abakinnyi ba Basketball kuko Nike na Adidas zari zaramaze kurwanikira muri uyu mukino.
Reba hano indirimbo ya Jay-Z yitwa Song Cry yo mu 2002, iri mu zakunzwe bihebuje

Title: Igikomangoma cyo muri Espagne cyishwe na Coronavirus
Body:
Maria Teresa de Bourbon-Parma, Igikomangoma cyo muri Espagne, yitabye Imana azize icyorezo cya Coronavirus nkuko byatangajwe na musaza we, Igikomangoma Sixto Enrique.
Maria Teresa de Bourbon-Parma, Igikomangoma cyo muri Espagne, yitabye Imana azize icyorezo cya Coronavirus nkuko byatangajwe na musaza we, Igikomangoma Sixto Enrique.
Uyu akaba muntu wa mbere mu miryango y’i Bwami muri Espagne uzize icyo cyorezo.
Sixto Enrique yatangaje ko Maria Teresa yaguye i Paris mu Bufaransa ku wa Kane tariki 26 Werurwe 2020. Ni Mubyara w’umwami Felipe VI mu miryango ya kure, akaba yari afite imyaka 86 y’amavuko.
Ikiriyo cye cyabereye i Madrid ku wa Gatanu tariki 27 Werurwe 2020. Mu Bufaransa hamaze gupfa abantu 3 024 bazize Coronavirus mu bantu 44550 yagaragayeho ni mu gihe 7,927 bayikize.
Espagne imaze kugira abantu 87956 bagaragayeho Coronavirus, 7716 barapfuye naho 16,780 barakize.
Uretse umuryango w’I Bwami wo muri Espagne, mu Bwongereza naho icyo cyorezo cyarahageze aho cyagaragaye ku Gikomangoma Charles tariki 25 Werurwe 2020. Charles w’imyaka 71 y’amavuko ubu yishyize mu kato.
Maria Teresa de Bourbon-Parma ni Umufaransa ufite ubwenegihugu bwa Espagne yabonye mu 1981 ari nabwo yinjiye mu muryango w’i Bwami muri icyo gihugu.
Yavukiye i Paris mu 1933. Yari umwalimu muri Kaminuza, akaba n’impirimbanyi iharanira uburenganzira bw’abagore. Ntabwo yigeze ashaka umugabo nta n’umwana asize.

Title: Amateka y’ibyorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo byayogoje u Rwanda kugeza mu 1946
Body:
Mbere y’imyaka 74 ishize(1946-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwabaye mu byorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, byoretse imbaga y’abatagira ingano, bishegesha igihugu ku buryo ubuyobozi bwariho icyo gihe bwagiye bufata ingamba zikomeye.
Mbere y’imyaka 74 ishize(1946-2020) ishize, u Rwanda rwabaye mu byorezo by’inzara, indwara z’abantu n’amatungo, byoretse imbaga y’abatagira ingano, bishegesha igihugu ku buryo ubuyobozi bwariho icyo gihe bwagiye bufata ingamba zikomeye.
Igitabo “Imizi y’u Rwanda” cyanditswe n’umusizi Nsanzabera Jean de Dieu, kigaragaza ko ubwo hari hashize imyaka mike umwami Mibambwe Sentabyo yimye ingoma, ni ukuvuga ahasaga mu wa 1746, mu Gisaka hateye ubushita burimbura abatagira ingano.
 Icyo ihe mu Rwanda hari intambara itoroshye hagati ya Mibambwe Sentabyo na Gatarabuhura washakaga ingoma ku mbaraga. Sentabyo yahashyije Gatarabuhura ahungira mu Gisaka. Mu gihe biteguraga gutera mu Gisaka hateye indwara y’ubushita bituma Abanyarwanda batinya gutera yo ngo batazana icyo cyorezo ndetse n’ umwami ubwe aca iteka ko nta muntu ugomba kwambuka Nyabarongo agana iburasirazuba bw’u Rwanda kugira ngo atagira aho ahurira n’iyo ndwara.
Umwami na we yarimutse aza gutura muri Taba ya Gitarama ahitwa i Remera ndetse n’amato yose yambutsaga abantu muri Nyabarongo abuzwa kongera kwambutsa abantu mu rwego rwo gushyira mu kato igice cy’uburasirazuba.
Kimenyi Getura umwami wategekaga i Gisaka icyo gihe ; na we yatinyaga u Rwanda kandi ahora azi neza ko isaha ku isaha igihugu cye cyaterwa n’abanyarwanda bakacyigarurira. Ibyo byatumye yigira inama yo gushyigikira Gatarabuhura akanamutiza amaboko bagafata ubutegetsi mu Rwanda bityo na we igihugu cye kikagira amahoro.
Yashyizeho Inkoto( Bariyeri) hirya no hino mu gihugu cyane cyane ku mbibi zihuza u Rwanda n’i Gisaka.
Uyu mwami Kimenyi Getura yaje guhimba amayeri yo kohereza umuntu mu Rwanda agenda yiyita ko ahunze igihugu bityo akaba ashaka ubuhungiro ku mwami Sentabyo. Uwo muntu ngo yaje yitwaje n’impano y’impuzu ikoze neza, ariko iyi mpano yari iy’uburozi kuko ngo yari yarambawe n’umunyabushita.
Sentabyo ntiyagize amakenga y’ikigambiriwe, yahise akenyera iyo mpuzu imwanduza ubushita ari nabwo bwamuhitanye. Nubwo Sentabyo yahitanywe n’ubushita, yagerageje gukingira abanyarwanda, ntibabwandura ngo bubakukumbe. Yategetse ko nta munya-Gisaka winjira mu Rwanda, abanyarwanda nabo babuzwa kujyayo ndetse mu gihugu hose hashyirwaho za bariyeri (Inkoto) zikumira abashoboraga kukinjirana mu Rwanda.
Hagati y’umwaka wa 1746 na 1946, mu Rwanda hadutse indwara z’ibyorezo zitandukanye zahitanye n’amatungo. Muri zo twavuga nko mu 1890-1891 ubwo hateraga indwara y’amatungo yitwa Muryamo yibasiraga cyane amatungo magufi, mu 1907-1908 hateye indwara y’amatungo yitwa Uburenge bwibasiraga cyane inka, mu 1920-1927 hateye indwara y’amatungo yitwa Iragara, mu 1934-1935 hongeye gutera Muryamo yibasira cyane cyane amatungo magufi n’indwara y’amatungo yitwa Amashuye bwibasiraga cyane inka inka yadutse mu 1936-1937.
Kugira ngo abami b’u Rwanda bahoshe ibyo byorezo byibasiraga amatungo, bakoraga imihango yo gufukura amariba mashya bakayatera n’ibyuhagiro bivura izo ndwara n’indi mihango yateganywaga n’Ubwiru.
U Rwanda kandi rwigeze kugira n’ibihe by’amapfa akomeye hatera ibyorezo by’inzara, zihitana abatari bake. Nko mu 1890 hateye inzara bise Muhatibicumuro, mu 1902 -1903 hateye inzara bise Ruyaga, mu 1917-1918 hateye Rumanura( Rumanurimbaba), mu 1924-1925 hateye Gakwege, mu 1927-1928 hateye Urwakayihura ( Yitiriwe Kayihura wataraga u Bugoyi kuko ariho yatangiriye), mu 1931 hateye inzige ziyogoza imyaka naho mu 1942-1944 hatera Ruzagayura.
Mu bihe by’inzara n’amapfa, Abami b’amatungo n’imyaka bajyaga mu miterekero, bagatanga imbuto n’ibyuhagiro by’imyaka kugira ngo irumbuke. Kera mu Rwanda hakundaga gutera Inzara bitaga amazina bahereye ku cyayiteye, cyangwa se ku bimenyetso byayo no ku nkurikizi zayo
Mu byorezo by’inzara , Abami b’imbuto bajyaga ku misozi miremire, bakahaca ibiraro, bagaterekera, ari na ko bavuza ingoma; imvura yabaga yahagamye, ikagwa. Ibyonnyi na byo byatera mu mirima, Abahoryo bakazivuma zikagenda.
Hari n’indwara z’ ibyorezo zateraga mu bantu ku mpamvu zo kubura imiti zikarimbura imbaga , abarokotse zikabasigira ubusembwa. Indwara z’ibyorezo zateye mu Rwanda zikibasira abantu, zirimo ubushita bwateye hagati ya 1893 na 1894, mu 1916-1917 bwarongeye buratera, mu 1917-1918 ; hateye Mugiga inagaruka mu 1935 naho mu 1945 hatera ibihara.
Iyo ibyorezo by’indwara nk’izo byateraga, Abami b’ imbuto n’amatungo batangaga amasubyo, ariyo miti y’amahumane yo gucubya ibyo byorezo by’indwara.
Mu Rwanda rwa kera habaga n’indi mihango yajyanaga n’ingoma, igakorwa n’abavubyi b’imvura, bakayikorera ahantu inkuba yabaga yakubise, bakahaterekerera , kugira ngo bahavane umwaku wayo , bakahagangahura.

Title: Ibihe bitazibagirana byaranze umupira w’amaguru mu myaka 10 ishize (Video)
Body:
Nta kintu gishimangira urukundo rw’umupira w’amaguru nk’ibihe bitazibagirana. Bishobora kuba igitego cyatsinzwe mu masegonda ya nyuma y’umukino, gutungurana kw’amakipe mato cyangwa uburiganya budasanzwe.
Nta kintu gishimangira urukundo rw’umupira w’amaguru nk’ibihe bitazibagirana. Bishobora kuba igitego cyatsinzwe mu masegonda ya nyuma y’umukino, gutungurana kw’amakipe mato cyangwa uburiganya budasanzwe.
Ni byinshi ushobora kuba warabonye mu gihe umaze ureba umupira w’amaguru, ariko turakwibutsa bimwe mu byabaye mu 10 ishize n’ibindi byagiye bigarukwaho n’abatari bake.
2010: Iniesta ahesha Espagne igikombe cy’Isi
Igikombe cy’Isi kimwe rukumbi cyabereye muri Afurika, cyegukanywe na Espagne ikegukana bwa mbere ibikesha igitego cyo mu minota y’inyongera cyatsinzwe na Andrés Iniesta mu mukino wayihuje n’u Buholandi.
Wari umukino wa nyuma udasanzwe, aho umusifuzi w’Umwongereza Howard Webb yatanzemo amakarita y’umuhondo 12.
Myugariro w’u Buholandi, John Heitinga yahawe ikarita ya kabiri y’umuhondo ku munota wa 109 mu gihe byibazwaho uburyo Nigel de Jong yagumye mu kibuga nyuma yo gukubita umugeri Xabi Alonso mu gituza.
Nyuma yo gutsinda igitego cyahesheje igihugu cye Igikombe cy’Isi, Iniesta yiyambuye umupira, asigarana undi w’imbere wariho amagambo yo kuzirikana Dani Jarque wakiniraga Espanyol, ariko akaba yarapufye bitunguranye mu 2009 afite imyaka 26.
Igikombe cy’Isi cyaje Espagne iri mu bihe byayo, aho mu 2008 na 2012 yegukanye igikombe cy’Uburayi (Euro).
2011: FC Barcelone ikosora Manchester United ku mukino wa nyuma wa UEFA Champions League
Impamvu uyu mukino uri mu yaranze imyaka 10 iheruka, ni uburyo amakipe yombi yagiye guhura ari ku rwego rumwe ndetse igice cyawo cya mbere, cyarangiye ari igitego 1-1.
FC Barcelone yatozwaga na Pep Guardiola, ibifashijwemo na Lionel Messi, yatsinze Manchester United ibitego 3-1, yegukana irushanwa ku nshuro ya gatatu mu myaka itandatu.
Sir Alex Ferguson watozaga Manchester United, yavuze ko ari yo kipe nziza yahuyemo mu gihe yamaze ari umutoza.
2012: Agüero atungura Manchester United
Umwaka wa 2012 uzahora wibukwa mu isozwa ry’umwaka uwo ari wose w’imikino muri Shampiyona ya Premier League.
Manchester City yagiye gukina umukino usoza umwaka w’imikino isabwa gutsinda Queens Park Rangers kugira ngo yegukana igikombe cya mbere cya Shampiyona mu myaka 44.
Uko iminota yaganaga ku musozo mu y’inyongera, ikipe y’umutoza Roberto Mancini yari yatsinzwe ibitego 2-1 ndetse kugeza kuri iryo segonda, igikombe cyari mu maboko ya Manchester United.
Igitego cyo kwishyura cyatsinzwe na Edin Džeko ku munota wa 92, cyagaruriye Manchester City icyizere mbere y’uko Sergio Agüero atsinda igitego cyabahesheje intsinzi n’igikombe cya Shampiyona.
Martin Tyler wogezega uwo mukino kuri Sky Sports yavuze ko bigoye kuzongera kubona ibihe nk’ibi.
2013: Gusezera kwa Sir Alex Ferguson
Mu mwaka wakurikiyeho, Manchester United yabaye nk’iyihimura kuri Manchester City, yegukana Shampiyona ndetse yari Premier League ya 13 yegukanywe na Sir Alex Ferguson wayitozaga.
Tariki ya 8 Gicurasi 2013, Ferguson yatangaje ko asezeye umupira w’amaguru nk’umutoza, ubwo yari afite imyaka 71.
Uyu mugabo w’Umunya- Écosse, yatwaye ibikombe 38 mu myaka 27 yatojemo iyi kipe y’i Old Trafford, akaba ari na we mutoza wegukanye ibikombe byinshi mu mateka y’umupira w’amaguru.
Icyo gihe, yatangaje ko “icyemezo cyo gusezera ari cyo gikomeye yafashe” mu buzima bwe.
Abandi batoza bose bamusimbuye muri iyi kipe uhereye kuri David Moyes, ntawe urongera kuyihesha Premier League, imyaka irindwi irashize.
2014: U Budage bwandagaje Brésil imbere y’abafana bayo
Icyizere cyari cyose ku batuye Brésil, bari bakiriye irushanwa baherukaga kwegukana mu 2002.
Nyuma yo kurenga amatsinda no gutsinda Chile na Colombia, Brésil yari ifite icyizere cyo kugera ku mukino wa nyuma, yahuye n’u Budage muri ½.
Ibyabereye muri Belo Horizonte na n’ubu bishobora kuba bitarasibangana mu mitwe no mu mitima y’abanya-Brésil batsinzwe n’u Budage ibitego 7-1.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye ikipe ya Scolari imaze kwinjizwa ibitego 5-0 mu gihe u Budage bwageze ku mukino wa nyuma, bukegukana irushanwa butsinze Argentine igitego 1-0.
Uyu mukino niba utaragusekeje, warakubabaje!
.
2015: Ruswa muri FIFA
Mu mpeshyi ya 2015, Ishyirahamwe ry’Umupira w’Amaguru ku Isi (FIFA) ryabayemo ibitazibagirana nyuma y’uko Urwego rw’Ubutabera muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rushinje bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru baryo, ibyaha birimo ruswa ndetse batabwa muri yombi n’Urwego rushinze iperereza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, FBI.
Mu Ukuboza uwo mwaka, abayobozi 16 barafashwe bashinjwa kugira uruhare mu ruswa ya miliyoni $200 yatanzwe mu kugira ngo u Burusiya buzahabwe igikombe cy’Isi cya 2018 ndetse na Qatar ihabwe icya 2022.
Ibi byashyize iherezo ku buyobozi bw’abagabo babiri bari bakomeye; Sepp Blatter wayoboraga FIFA na Michel Platini wayoboraga UEFA, aho bahagaritswe imyaka umunani batagaragara mu bikorwa byose bijyanye n’umupira w’amaguru.
Ubujurire bwakozwe muri uwo mwaka, bwatumye igihano cya Blatter kiva ku myaka umunani igera kuri itandatu, ariko ntibyakuyeho icyasha ku mupira w’amaguru.
2016: Leicester City yegukanye Premier League
Kwegukana Premier League kw’ikipe ya Leicester City mu 2016 byatunguye benshi nyuma y’uko mu mwaka w’imikino wari wabanje, yari mu myanya ya nyuma ndetse ikaba yarashoboraga kumanuka mu cyiciro cya kabiri.
Mu mpeshyi ya 2015, nibwo Claudio Ranieri yagizwe umutoza wa Leicester City, asimbuye Nigel Pearson ndetse abasesenguzi benshi bategaga iminsi uyu Mutaliyani, bavuga ko atazabasha kuyigumisha mu cyiciro cya mbere.
Ibifashijwemo n’abarimo Jamie Vardy watsinze ibitego 13 mu mikino 11 yikurikiranya hagati ya Kanama n’Ugushyingo, Leicester City yageze kuri Noheli ariyo iyoboye Premier League mu gihe Manchester City, Arsenal na Tottenham zagowe no kuyikura kuri uwo mwanya.
2017: Neymar yatumye isoko ry’abakinnyi rihenda
Tariki ya 3 Kanama 2017 nibwo Paris Saint-Germain yaguze umunya-Brésil Neymar, aba umukinnyi wa mbere uhenze mu mateka y’umupira w’amaguru, aguzwe muri FC Barcelone kuri miliyoni 222€.
Uwaherukaga kugurwa menshi, yari Paul Pogba waguzwe na Manchester United avuye muri Juventus, mu 2016 kuri miliyoni 105€.
Kuva Neymar aguzwe, ibiciro by’abakinnyi byariyongereye ariko biragoye kubona uzarenza amafaranga uyu mukinnyi yaguzwe mu gihe cya vuba.
2018: Ronaldo yatsinze kimwe mu bitego bidasanzwe
Ni ibitego byinshi byatsinzwe mu myaka 10 ishize, ariko icyo Cristiano Ronaldo yatsinze Juventus mu 2018 muri UEFA Champions League, kiri mu bitazibagirana.
Ronaldo yabanje gusimbuka metero 2.2 mu kirere mbere yo kwigarama umupira yatereye mu rubuga rw’amahina ukaruhukira mu izamu ryari ririnzwe na Gianluigi Buffon.
Muri uwo mwaka, nibwo Ronaldo yagiye muri Juventus aguzwe muri Real Madrid.
Igitego cye ni cyo cyatowe nk’icy’umwaka na UEFA, gihigitse icyo Gareth Bale yatsinze Liverpool ku mukino wa nyuma.
2019: Liverpool yanga kurekura imbere ya FC Barcelone
FC Barcelone yatsinze Liverpool ibitego 3-0 mu mukino ubanza wa Champions League.
Mohamed Salah yagombaga gusiba umukino wo kwishyura kubera imvune ndetse amahirwe y’ikipe ya Jürgen Klopp yo gukomeza, yari make cyane.
Igice cya mbere cyarangiye Liverpool ifite igitego kimwe cya Divock Origi, cyabonetse ku munota wa karindwi. Aha, icyizere cyari cyinshi ku bafana ba FC Barcelone.
Georgio Wijnaldum watsinze ibitego bibiri nyuma yo gusimbura, yongereye Liverpool icyizere mbere y’uko Origi atsinda icya kane ku mupira wavuye muri koruneri yatewe na Trent Alexander-Arnold.
Anfield habereye ibitangaza byinshi, ariko ibyabaye iryo joro byasaga n’ibidasanzwe.
Liverpool yageze ku mukino wa nyuma, yegukana UEFA Champions League ku nshuro ya gatandatu, itsinze Tottenham.
Ibindi bitazibagirana mu mupira w’amaguru
U Bugereki butwara Euro 2004
Kwegukana Igikombe cy’Uburayi kw’u Bugereki mu 2004 ni kimwe mu bitangaza by’umupira w’amaguru.
Igitego cya Angelos Charistea cyari gihagije ngo gitere agahinda umutima n’amarira mu maso ya Cristiano Ronaldo.
Ubugereki nta mahirwe bwahabwaga mu gihe ibihugu nka Espagne, u Bufaransa na Portugal yari mu rugo, byari bifite abakinnyi bakomeye.
Ronaldinho akomerwa amashyi n’abafana ba Real Madrid kuri Santiago Bernabéu
Ntibisanzwe ko umukinnyi wa FC Barcelone yakomerwa amashyi n’abafana ba Real Madrid nubwo waba uri Lionel Messi watsindiye ibitego bitatu i Madrid.
Mu mukino wabaye mu Ugushyingo 2005, Ronaldinho yakomewe amashyi n’abafana ba mukeba nyuma yo kugaragaza ubuhanga ahanganye n’ikipe yarimo Iker Casillas, Roberto Carlos, David Beckham, Raul na Zinedine Zidane.
Penaliti ya Antonín Panenka 
Hari mu Gikombe cy’Uburayi cyo mu 1976. Czechoslovakia yanganyije n’u Budage bw’Uburengerazuba ibitego 2-2, bituma hitabazwa penaliti ku mukino wa nyuma.
Antoním Panenka yagiye gutera penaliti yashoboraga guhesha Czechoslovakia igikombe. Panenka yateye agapira koroheje, umunyezamu Sepp Miaer agana iburyo, umupira ujya mu izamu.
Kuva icyo gihe, uyu mugabo yitiriwe penaliti zitewe muri ubwo buryo, ndetse abarimo Andrea Pirlo na Sebastian Abreu bagiye bazitera mu marushanwa akomeye naho Neymar, Robin van Persie na Cristiano Ronaldo barazihushije.
 Korea y’Amajyaruguru itsinda u Butaliyani
Intsinzi y’igitego 1-0 Korea y’Amajyaruguru yabonye imbere y’u Butaliyani mu Gikombe cy’Isi cyo mu 1966, yatunguye isi yose bitewe n’uburyo muri icyo gihugu cyo muri Asia havugwamo intambara mu gihe u Butaliyani bwari buzwi nk’ikipe ikomeye.
 Igitego Ryan Giggs yatsinze Arsenal
Igitego Ryan Giggs yatsinze Arsenal ku mukino wa nyuma wa FA Cup mu 1999, kigarukwaho cyane bitewe n’uburyo yacenzemo abakinnyi bane mbere yo gutsinda ndetse kikaba cyaratumye Manchester United yegukana ibikombe bitatu uwo mwaka.
Yagitsinze nyuma y’uko Arsenal yari imaze guhusha penaliti yatewe na Dennis Bergkamp mu gihe Manchester United yari yasigaye ari abakinnyi 10 ubwo Roy Keane yahabwaga ikarita itukura.
 Lilian Thuram afasha u Bufaransa mu Gikombe cy’Isi
Mu mikino 142 yakiniye u Bufaransa, Liliam Thuram yabutsindiye ibitego bibiri gusa ariko bifite kinini bivuze!
Uyu wabaye umukinnyi wa Juventus, yabitsinze mu mukino wa ½ cy’Igikombe cy’Isi mu 1998, u Bufaransa bugera ku mukino wa nyuma busezereye Croatia ku bitego 2-1.
Iki gihugu cyari cyakiriye irushanwa, cyashobora gusezererwa ariko Thulam akigeza ku mukino wa nyuma ndetse kibasha kwegukana Igikombe cy’Isi gitsinzwe Brésil ibitego 3-0 ku mukino wa nyuma.
Umutwe wa Zinedine Zidane
Ku mukino wa nyuma w’Igikombe cy’Isi cya 2006 cyegukanywe n’u Butaliyani mu Budage, Zinedine Zidane wakinaga umukino we wa nyuma nk’umukinnyi, yahawe ikarita itukura kubera umutwe yakubise Umutaliyani, Marco Materazzi bitewe n’amagambo yamubwiye.
Liverpool yigaranzura Milan AC
Liverpool ifite amateka atangaje. Mu myaka 15 ishize, yegukanye UEFA Champions League ya 2005 iturutse inyuma, ikishyura ibitego 3-0 yari yatsinzwe na Milan AC ku mukino wa nyuma wabereye i Istanbul.
Igice cya mbere cyari cyarangiye ari 3-0, mu cya kabiri, ikipe y’umutoza Rafa Benitez itsindirwa na Steven Gerard, Vladimír Šmicer na Xabi Alonso kuri penaliti nyuma y’ikosa Gennaro Gattuso yari amaze gukorera kuri Gerard mu rubuga rw’amahina.
Hitabajwe penaliti, Liverpool irazitsinda, yegukana iri rushanwa ku nshuro ya gatanu mu gihe byayisabye gutegeza mu mwaka ushize wa 2019 ngo iryegukane ku nshuro ya gatandatu.
Ikiganza cy’Imana cya Diego Maradona
Ibaze nk’igitego Diego Maradona yatsindishije ikiganza mu Gikombe cy’Isi cyo mu 1986, gitsinzwe muri iki gihe!
Uyu mugabo w’Umunya-Argentine, yatsinze ibitego bitandukanye mu gihe cye, ariko icyo yatsinze u Bwongereza mu mukino wa ¼ cy’Igikombe cy’Isi mu 1986, akoresheje ikiganza, n’ubu kiracyavugwa.
Argentine yatsinze u Bwongereza ibitego 2-1 ndetse yegukanye iryo rushanwa ryari ryabereye muri Mexique.

Title: Umujyi wa Goma wagize umuntu wa mbere urwaye coronavirus
Body:
Mu mujyi wa Goma, mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru habonetse umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus, hakaba hafashwe ingamba zikomeye zirimo no guhagarika urujya n’uruza.
Mu mujyi wa Goma, mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru habonetse umurwayi wa mbere wa Coronavirus, hakaba hafashwe ingamba zikomeye zirimo no guhagarika urujya n’uruza.
Mu itangazo ryashyizwe ahagaragara kuri uyu wa mbere taliki 30 werurwe 2020, n’ubunyamabanga bw’agashami gashinzwe kurwanya Coronavirus buremeza ko mu barwayi 17 bashya babonetse muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, umwe aturuka mu ntara ya Kivu y’amajyaruguru mu mujyi wa Goma.
Intara ya Kivu y’amajyaruguru ikaba ibaye ahantu ha kane hagaragayemo icyorezo cya Coronavirus nyuma y’umujyi wa Kinshasa, Ituri n’intara ya Kivu y’Amajyepfo .
Uyu murwayi wabonetse akomoka muri Nigeria akaba yarageze i Goma tariki 18 Werurwe 2020 . Yari mu kato kuva tariki 23 Werurwe 2020. Yari umukozi w’umuryango nterankunga ukorera i Goma.
Guverineri w’intara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru, Carly Kasivita Nzanzu yasabye umuyobozi w’urwego rushinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka gushakisha abakozi bakora ku mupaka munini wa Grande Barrière bahuye n’uwo murwayi waje avuye mu Rwanda.
Kuri icyi Cyumweru hari habonetse abandi bantu babiri banduye icyorezo cya Coronavirus mu mujyi wa Bukavu muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo ihana imbibi n’umujyi wa Goma.
Kuva iki cyorezo cyagaragara muri Repubulika iharanira demukarasi ya Congo hamaze kuboneka abarwayi 98, umunani barapfuye mu gihe batatu bakize.

Title: Covid-19: Umwanya ku miryango yari yarazahajwe n’amakimbirane
Body:
Muri iki gihe isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Covid-19, zimwe mu ngamba zafashwe ni ugukaraba intoki hifashishijwe amazi meza ndetse n’isabune, ariko by’umwihariko, abantu bose basabwa kuguma mu ngo nka kimwe mu bisubizo byo guhashya iki cyorezo, dore ko nta muti cyangwa urukingo gifite.
Muri iki gihe isi yugarijwe n’icyorezo cya Covid-19, zimwe mu ngamba zafashwe ni ugukaraba intoki hifashishijwe amazi meza ndetse n’isabune, ariko by’umwihariko, abantu bose basabwa kuguma mu ngo nka kimwe mu bisubizo byo guhashya iki cyorezo, dore ko nta muti cyangwa urukingo gifite.
Ingamba zo kuguma mu ngo kwa buri wese, zatumye ubishaka n’utabishaka, bose bisanga bari mu rugo. Ibi byaje kandi mu gihe hari hashize igihe kitari gito hari ingo nyinshi zifite amakimbirane, ndetse no mu nkiko hari ibirego byinshi bya gatanya.
Nk’uko bimenyerewe, zimwe mu mpamvu zakururaga ubwimvikane buke hagati y’abagabo n’abagore ndetse bikaganisha kuri gatanya harimo kutabonera umwanya ibiganiro biboneye, gucana inyuma, ikoreshwa nabi ry’umutungo, kwikunda n’ibindi.
Mu bihe bisanzwe, umwe mu bafitanye amakimbirane yabonaga ubuhungiro mu kazi, mu nsengero, mu baturanyi cyangwa muri bene wabo. Ariko ubu bombi bategetswe kugumana. Uwo gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo yatangajwe ari iwe, yahise ategekwa kuhaguma.
Ese muri iki gihe abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu ngo, abagize umuryango babanye bate? Reka turebere hamwe bimwe mu bintu byari byarazambye, ariko bishobora kuzarushaho kuba byiza bitewe na gahunda yo kuguma mu rugo.
Abana batahabwaga umwanya n’ababyeyi
Abana cyane cyane abakomoka mu miryango yo mu mijyi, ntibabonaga ababyeyi mu buryo buhagije. Ibi byaterwaga n’uko ababyeyi babyukaga bajya gushakira ingo imibereho, bakagera imuhira bananiwe, ku buryo batabasha guha abana umwanya uhagije.
Igisubizo cya covid-19:
N’ubwo ababyeyi bamwe na bamwe basabwe gukorera mu rugo, ariko wakwirirwa mu rugo uri gukora cyangwa utari gukora, abana bababona hafi, barabaganiriza, bakabisanzuraho. Ababyeyi bari gufasha abana gusubira mu masomo no gukora uturimo tworoheje nko kubigisha kwikarabya, kwigaburira, gusasa uburiri bwabo n’ibindi.
Abashakanye batahanaga umwanya uhagije
Nk’uko twabivuze hejuru, zimwe mpamvu zikurura amakimbirane mu ngo, harimo kutabonera umwanya uwo mwashakanye. Abantu bakazahura ibibazo byaragiye byiyongeraho ibindi, kandi bitabanje gukemuka.
Igisubizo cya covid-19:
Icyorezo cya coronavirus gitumye abashakanye birirwana mu rugo. Amafunguro y’umunsi yose bari kuyasangira. N’ubwo hari abirirwa mu kazi, ariko burya agera aho agasoza. Hari abirirwa mu mbuga nkoranyambaga, ariko burya agera aho akarambika terefone hasi. Ubwo rero bombi bari kumwe, kandi bafite umwanya wo kuganira ku cyerekezo cy’urugo cy’igihe kirekire n’ibindi batabashije gukemura mu gihe kizaza. Ubu nta wakwireguza umunaniro!
Abagabo bashinjaga abagore kwangiza umutungo w’urugo
Hari abagabo benshi usanga bashinja abagore gukoresha nabi amafaranga. Yagera mu rugo bakamwaka amafaranga y’amakara, akabuka inabi ngo “ayo nabahaye aka kanya arashize?”
Igisubizo cya covid-19:
Burya iyo abagabo babwira abagore ko bakoresha amafaranga yo mu rugo nabi, iteka abagore baba bifuza ko umugabo yazisanga mu buzima butuma amenya uko amafaranga akoreshwa. Ubu abakozi bo mu ngo barasaba nyirabuja amafaranga, sebuja yumva akabona neza icyo agiye gukoreshwa. Ubu barabona mu bubiko bw’ibiryo, amata n’ibindi bikoresho uko bigenda bishira. Ubu ikibazo cy’ikoreshwa ry’ibyo mu rugo kirareba buri wese.
Abantu bari barasabye gatanya
Hari abantu benshi bari baratanze ibirego bisaba gatanya. Nk’uko bimenyerewe, iyo usabye gatanya ntabwo uhita uyihabwa uwo munsi. Ahubwo leta ibaha umwanya wo kubanza kugerageza ubundi buryo bwose bushoboka, ngo ahari wenda byakemuka mutabanje gutandukana.
Igisubizo cya covid-19:
Ubu abashakanye bahawe umwanya wo kwicara, bakareba ibyatumaga badahuza. Ngaho nimufate umwanya mubiganireho, buri wese arebe ububabare bwa mugenzi we. Nta mahirwe ahari yo guhamagara umuturanyi, parrain cyangwa marraine ngo baze kubafasha gukemura ibibazo byanyu, oya! Ahubwo nimwiganirire ubwanyu, mushake umuti w’ikibazo, ariko ikiruta byose, buri wese acire bugufi mugenzi we, uwababaje mugenzi we amusabe imbabazi.
Imico itari myiza yaregwaga abakozi bo mu rugo
Hari abagabo n’abagore baganira ukumva barabwirana ibibazo bafitanye n’abakozi mu ngo zabo. Bamwe babarega agakungu, kuzana abahungu mu rugo (mu gihe ari abakobwa), kwiba ibiribwa, kwangiza n’ibindi.
Igisubizo cya covid-19:
Umwanya wo kuguma mu rugo ni umwanya wima benshi mu bakora amakosa avuzwe haruguru amahirwe yo gukomeza ayo makosa. Ubu ni umwanya mwiza wo kwisubiraho, ukamenya inshingano zawe ko ari ukubaha no gukora akazi ushinzwe neza. Ni n’umwanya w’abakoresha wo kongera kwereka ubumuntu abo bakoresha binyuze mu gusangira nabo, kubabaza amakuru y’imiryango yabo n’ibindi.
Ese Bibiliya itanga izihe nama ku mubano n’inshingano z’abagize umuryango?
Mu by’ukuri Bibiliya irerura ikabwira buri wese uko akwiriye kwifata kugira ngo abashe kubana na mugenzi we neza. Iyi mirongo yo muri Bibiliya iributsa buri wese mu bagize umuryango, uko akwiriye kwitwara kugira ngo abungabunge umubano we n’abandi.
“Bagore, mugandukire abagabo banyu nk’uko bikwiriye abari mu Mwami wacu. Bagabo, namwe mukunde abagore banyu ntimubasharirire. Bana, mwumvire ababyeyi banyu muri byose, kuko ibyo ari byo Umwami ashima. Ba se, ntimukarakaze abana banyu batazinukwa. Mbata, mwumvire ba shobuja bo ku mubiri muri byose, ntimubakorere bakibareba gusa ngo muse n’abanezeza abantu, ahubwo mubakorere mutaryarya mu mitima yanyu mwubaha Imana. Ibyo mukora byose mubikore mubikuye ku mutima, nk’abakorera Shobuja mukuru badakorera abantu, (Abakorosayi 3:18-23).
Mwese tubifurije ubuzima buzima, dukomeze dukarabe intoki neza kandi tugume mu rugo, turushaho kuzahura umubano hagati y’abagize umuryango.

Title: RwandAir igiye gutangiza ingendo zitwara imizigo
Body:
RwandAir yatangaje ko iri gutegura gutangiza ingendo z’indege zitwara imizigo mu rwego rwo gukemura ikibazo ku rujya n’uruza rw’ibicuruzwa.
RwandAir yatangaje ko iri gutegura gutangiza ingendo z’indege zitwara imizigo mu rwego rwo gukemura ikibazo ku rujya n’uruza rw’ibicuruzwa.
Mu rwego rwo guhangana n’icyorezo cya COVID-19 ku itariki 20 Werurwe nibwo Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yahagaritse ingendo zose z’indege zitwara abagenzi zaba iziva mu Rwanda zijya mu mahanga ndetse n’iziva mu mahanga zinjira mu Rwanda. Indege zahagaritswe gutwara abagenzi zirimo n’iza RwandAir.
Cyakora Guverinoma yatangaje ko indege zitwara ibicuruzwa n’imiti zizakomeza gukora, mu rwego rwo gufasha igihugu gukomeza kubona ibikenewe birimo imiti n’ibindi.
Sosiyete y’indege Rwandair yamaze gutangaza ko iri kunoza uburyo bushya bw’ingendo zitwara ibicuruzwa buzatuma u Rwanda n’ibindi bihugu bibasha kubona ibicuruzwa by’ibanze birimo n’imiti.
Umuyobozi wa Rwandair, Yvonne Makolo yabwiye itangazamakuru ko iyo gahunda iri gutegurwa .
Makolo yavuze ko bakiri gutunganya uburyo bizakorwa kandi ko bitazasaba gufata indege zitwara abantu ngo bazihinduremo izitwara imizigo nkuko bamwe bashobora kubyibwira.
Ati “Turi kubikoraho. Ariko ntabwo tuzahindura indege zitwara abagenzi izitwara imizigo. Tuzakoresha imyanya ihari kugira ngo dutware ibicuruzwa.”
Uburyo iyo gahunda nshya izakorwa bizatangazwa mu mpera z’iki cyumweru.
Izo ngendo zishobora kuba uburyo sosiyete y’indege ishobora kwinjizamo amafaranga mu bihe bya COVID-19 ariko na none n’uburyo bwo kubona ibicuruzwa by’ibanze bidakorerwa mu gihugu.
Iki cyemezo gisa n’aho kizafasha abohereza ibintu mu mahanga mu Karere kugera ku isoko mpuzamahanga, muri ibi bihe bikoroshya ubucuruzi bwabo.
Mu gihe ingendo nyinshi z’indege zakozweho n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus izindi zigahagarikwa burundu, gushyiraho indege zitwara imizigo kuri RwandAir bizongera amahirwe yo kugeza ibicuruzwa by’u Rwanda ku isoko mpuzamahanga birimo icyayi, ikawa, n’ibindi birimo n’indabo.
Mu gihe kandi indege zahagaritse ingendo, ibihugu bikeneye kongera mu bubiko bwabyo ibijyanye n’ibikoresho byo kwa muganga, imiti n’ibyo gupima icyorezo gishya cya coronavirus.

Title: Tanzania: Umuntu wa mbere yishwe na Coronavirus
Body:
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri Tanzania, yatangaje ko umuntu wa mbere yishwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus muri iki gihugu, akaba ari umunya-Tanzania w’imyaka 49 wari urwaye izindi ndwara.
Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri Tanzania, yatangaje ko umuntu wa mbere yishwe n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus muri iki gihugu, akaba ari umunya-Tanzania w’imyaka 49 wari urwaye izindi ndwara.
Iyi Minisiteri ivuga ko uyu muntu yapfuye kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 31 Werurwe 2020, aguye mu kigo cyakirirwamo abarwayi ba COVID-19, kiri Mloganzila i Dar es Salaam.
Iti “Uwapfuye ni umunya-Tanzania, umugabo wo mu kigero cy’imyaka 49, wari ufite n’ubundi burwayi”.
Kugeza ubu muri Tanzania hamaze kuboneka abarwayi ba Coronavirus 19, umwe yarayikize abandi baracyari mu bitaro, ndetse n’uwo umwe wapfuye.

Title: StarTimes yatangije ikoranabuhanga rifasha mu kwisuzuma Coronavirus muri Afurika
Body:
Muri iyi minsi abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu rugo mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, StarTimes, yatangije uburyo bwo kwisuzuma iki cyorezo, buboneka kuri ‘StarTimes ON’.
Muri iyi minsi abantu bose basabwe kuguma mu rugo mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus, StarTimes, yatangije uburyo bwo kwisuzuma iki cyorezo, buboneka kuri ‘StarTimes ON’.
StarTimes iteye iyi ntambwe yo gutangiza ubu buryo bwiswe ‘COVID-19 Self-evaluation and Reference System’, muri Afurika nyuma y’amakuru n’ibiganiro byigisha binyura ku miyoboro yayo y’itangazamakuru.
Ubu buryo bushobora gufatwa nk’isuzuma ry’ibanze ry’indwara, bufite akamaro ko kugabanya igitutu ku rwego rw’ubuvuzi ndetse n’ibyago byo gukwirakwiza ubwandu ahantu hahurira abantu benshi nko kwa muganga.
Binyuze mu isuzuma rikorwa n’ubu buryo, ababukoresha bashobora kubona inama z’icyo bakora yaba kujya kwa muganga niba ari ngombwa, ibi bigatuma birinda umuhangayiko uterwa no gukekeranya ku buryo ubuzima bwabo buhagaze.
Iri koranabuhanga riraboneka kuri StarTimes ON mu Cyongereza, mu Gifaransa, Igiportigali, Igiswahili no mu zindi ndimi guhera kuwa 27 Werurwe 2020.
Muri iri koranabuhanga kandi hariho n’amakuru ashingiye ku bisubizo by’ibibazo byinshi by’abarikoresha. Intambwe zo kurikoresha ziroroshye cyane kuzikurikiza kandi urikoresheje ahita abona ibisubizo mu masegonda make nyuma yo kohereza ibisubizo by’ibibazo aba yabajijwe.
COVID-19 Self-evaluation and Reference System, yakozwe n’abanyafurika bafatanyije n’inzobere mpuzamahanga, biteguwe na Kaminuza ya Tsinghua, ishyirahamwe ry’abaganga mu Bushinwa ndetse na StarTimes muri Afurika.
Itanga ibisubizo bishingiye ku busesenguzi bwimbitse ikomora ku bunararibonye ku cyorezo cya COVID-19, ahantu hatandukanye ndetse n’amakuru y’abarenga miliyoni 10 mu bihugu 19 bayikoresheje.
Mbere yo gutangizwa kandi yasuzumwe inemezwa n’akanama k’inzobere mpuzamahanga mu bijyanye n’iri koranabuhanga.
Umuyobozi w’ishami rishinzwe ibikorwa bijyanye na serivisi muri StarTimes, Amy Pang, yavuze ko nk’ikigo gikorera muri Afurika, bashaka gukoresha amahirwe yose bafite mu gutanga umusanzu mu rugamba rusange rwo kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus kuri uyu mugabane.
Avuga ko bashaka gukoresha imiyoboro yabo yose y’itangazamakuru mu gusangira amakuru n’uburyo bwo kurwanya Coronavirus, ku bw’inyungu z’abanyafurika.

Title: Iminsi icumi irashize! Dusubize amaso inyuma ku rugendo rwagejeje ku ihagarikwa ry’imirimo kubera Coronavirus
Body:
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa 21 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente, yatangaje ko kubera intera icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze gufata, imipaka yose ifunzwe, ko abadafite ibikorwa byihutirwa bagomba kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri gishobora kongerwa, mu gukumira ikwirakwira ryacyo.
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa 21 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente, yatangaje ko kubera intera icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze gufata, imipaka yose ifunzwe, ko abadafite ibikorwa byihutirwa bagomba kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri gishobora kongerwa, mu gukumira ikwirakwira ryacyo.
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Kabiri, iminsi icumi muri cumi n’ine yemejwe iruzuye, imibare igaragaza ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus nayo ikomeje kuzamuka, ariko itanga icyizere. Nta bwandu burahererekanywa hagati mu gihugu.
Ni ngombwa gusubiza amaso inyuma ku ngamba zagiye zifatwa, zitumye igihugu gikomeje kwihagararaho magingo aya ku cyorezo cyashegeshe ibihugu bikomeye.
Ni icyorezo cyakwirakwiye bwangu
Kuwa 31 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo u Bushinwa byamenyesheje Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OMS) ko hari icyorezo cyateye mu baturage, mu mujyi wa Wuhan. Cyahereye mu bacuruzaga ibikomoka mu mazi mu isoko rya Huanan, bituma kuwa 1 Mutarama 2020 rifungwa.
Ku wa 7 Mutarama inzego z’ubuzima zemeje ko virusi irimo kwanduza abantu itandukanye n’izisanzwe, ariko yo mu muryango wa za coronavirus. Niyo mpamvu mu kuyandika hazaho “novel”, iza guhabwa izina rya 2019-nCoV.
Ku wa 11 Mutarama nibwo u Bushinwa bwatangaje ko umuntu wa mbere yishwe n’iyi virusi (yapfuye kuwa 9 Mutarama).
Iyo virusi yaje gusohoka mu gihugu, ku wa 13 Mutarama 2019 byemezwa ko umuntu wa mbere hanze y’u Bushinwa yayanduye muri Thailand, umugore wari uvuye muri Wuhan.
Ku wa 20 Mutarama 2020, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zemeje ko umuntu wa mbere yanduye Coronavirus, ku wa 24 Mutarama u Bufaransa bwemeza ko abantu babiri bayisanzwemo, baba aba mbere igaragayeho ku mugabane w’u Burayi.
Ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2020 Misiri yabaye igihugu cya mbere muri Afurika cyagezemo indwara ya COVID-19, naho u Bufaransa butangaza ko umuntu wa mbere muri icyo gihugu yahitanwe n’icyo cyorezo.
Indwara iterwa n’iyo virus byaje kwemezwa ko ari Covid-19 (Coronavirus Disease 2019) ndetse itangazwa ko ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi yose (Pandémie).
Kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura iyi virus barenga ibihumbi 750, ndetse abo imaze guhitana hirya no hino barenga ibihugu 34. Abamaze kuyikira ni ibihumbi 156.
U Rwanda rwagize amakenga hakiri kare
Mbere y’uko iki cyorezo kigera mu Rwanda, rwakomeje gufata ingamba zo kwirinda, hashyirwaho itsinda ry’abaganga bahoraho ku kibuga cy’indege,ngo bapime umuriro buri muntu wese winjira mu gihugu, nka kimwe mu bimenyetso by’ibanze bya Coronavirus.
Kutajenjekera uburyo bwo kwitegura guhangana na Coronavirus, byatumye Perezida Paul Kagame yeguza uwari Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Diane Gashumba.
Ubwo yari mu mwiherero uheruka w’abayobozi, Perezida Kagame yahishuye ko Dr Gashumba yavugaga ko igihugu gifite ibikoresho 3500 byakwifashishwa mu gusuzuma Coronavirus, nyuma mu gukurikirana basanga hari “ibintu bishobora gukora ku bantu 95” gusa.
Hatangiye gutegurwa ahantu uwatahurwaho Coronavirus yavurirwa n’ibikoresho byakenerwa, cyangwa abashyirwa mu kato aho bajya.
Hateguwe ibyumba 25 ku bitaro bya Gisirikare i Kanombe, ibitaro bya Kabgayi bitegura ibyumba 120, ahahoze ikigo nderabuzima cya Kanyinya hategurwa ibyumba 50, ibindi bitaro 80 mu gihugu biteganya ibyumba bibiri bibiri.
Na mbere y’uko umuntu wa mbere mu Rwanda atahurwaho Coronavirus, Guverinoma yakajije ingamba zo kwirinda, hanashyirwaho uburyo bw’isuku butuma umuntu akaraba amazi meza n’isabune, cyangwa agakoresha alcool yica udukoko.
Ubwo Coronavirus yari ikomeje kwinjira mu bihugu binyuranye bya Afurika, Umujyi wa Kigali wahagaritse ibitaramo n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza abantu benshi.
Mu itangazo wasohoye ku wa 8 Werurwe wagize uti "Tuributsa abafite ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi nk’insengero, ubukwe, utubari, hoteli, restaurant, utubyiniro, ahakorerwa siporo (gym) n’ahandi, gukaza ingamba z’isuku bashyiraho uburyo bwo gukaraba cyangwa se umuti wabugenewe wica mikorobe.”
Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA, rwatanze amabwiriza ko ahategerwa imodoka rusange hose hagomba gushyirwa ibikoresho by’isuku kandi ikagera no mu modoka imbere.
Umurwayi wa mbere atahuwe ibintu byarahindutse
Ku wa 14 Werurwe nibwo Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yemeje ko Umuhinde wageze mu Rwanda ku wa 8 Werurwe 2020 avuye i Mumbai, yatahuweho icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Yagaragaje ibimenyetso ku wa 12 Werurwe, arakorora, agira ikibazo cyo guhumeka nabi, no gucika intege. Yahise ajya kwivuza ku bitaro bya Kibagabaga, akekwaho Coronavirus afatwa ibipimo, ibisubizo bigaragaza ko yayanduye.
Mu kwemeza ko uyu muntu yanduye, hongerewe imbaraga mu gushaka abantu bose baba barahuye nawe kugira ngo nabo bapimwe ndetse babe bashyizwe mu kato, nk’uko bigenda no ku bandi.
Ni igikorwa kigirwamo uruhare n’itsinda ry’abantu bagera kuri 220 bakurikirana umuntu wese wahuye n’uwanduye, kandi rigizwe n’abantu bo mu nzego zinyuranye baba mu nzego z’ubuzima n’abamenyereye guperereza nko mu nzego Polisi n’Ingabo.
Hahise hafatwa ibyemezo bikarishye birimo gufunga amashuri abakozi basabwa gutangira gukorera mu rugo aho bishoboka.
Byarubahirijwe kuko ku munsi wakurikiyeho Minisiteri y’Uburezi yatangiye gucyura abanyeshuri bose kandi yishingira ikiguzi cyabyo, kugeza ubwo n’Abarundi batinye gusubira iwabo bahawe icumbi ry’ubuntu, bahabwa ibyo bakeneye byose.
Muri ibyo byemezo byagombaga kumara ibyumweru bibiri harimo ko n’insengero zifungwa, kugeza n’uyu munsi amateraniro abera kuri radiyo na televiziyo.
Harimo ko “amahuriro y’abantu benshi nk’imikino ndetse n’ubukwe bibaye bisubitswe. Abitabira imihango yo gushyingura nabo barasabwa kujyayo ari bake. Ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi na za resitora bizakomeza gukorwa hashishikarizwa ko hashyirwa intera ya metero byibuze imwe hagati y’abantu."
Utubari n’abamotari byatwawe gahoro. Bwa mbere abamotari bemerewe gukomeza gukora, ariko basabwa kwitwararika kuko basabwe kuvanaho ikirahuri cy’imbere ku ngofero y’umugenzi, n’abagenzi bashishikarizwa kuyambarira ku gitambaro cyangwa ingofero.
Bidateye kabiri, Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu (Minaloc) yatangaje ko guhera ku wa 20 Werurwe 2020 utubari two mu mujyi wa Kigali n’indi mijyi tuzajya dufunga saa tatu z’ijoro naho utwo mu cyaro tugafunga saa moya zuzuye.
Icyo gihe imibare yerekanaga ko abamaze kwandura Coronavirus ari abantu 11, kandi mu matangazo yose yatangaga, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yateguzaga ko igihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri byo gufunga ibikorwa gishobora kongerwa ndetse kigashyirwa ku rundi rwego, bitewe n’aho ibintu bigana.
Ingamba zashyizwe ku rundi rwego
Imibare y’abanduye Coronavirus yakomeje kuzamuka gahoro gahoro, ariko ahanini bakaba abantu bayiturukanye mu mahanga, nubwo hataburaaga na bake cyane bo mu gihugu bahuye nabo.
Ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente ari nawe ukuriye itsinda rishinzwe gukurikiranira hafi icyorezo cya Coronavirus, yatanze amabwiriza mashya. Icyo gihe umubare w’abanduye Coronavirus wari ugeze kuri 17.
Iryo tangazo ryagiraga riti "Gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa birabujijwe, keretse abajya gutanga no gushaka serivisi z’ingenzi harimo kwivuza, guhaha, serivizi za banki n’izindi."
Hemejwe ko imipaka yose ifunzwe, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha ndetse n’abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe n’amategeko, abo bose bashyirirwaho akato k’ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijwe. Ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu ntabwo zemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwa.
Ubucuruzi bwose bwarahagaritswe, hasigara za farumasi, abatanga serivisi z’itumanaho, iza banki (kandi zigabanya umubare w’amashami) n’abacuruza ibiribwa.
Abapolisi kuva ku w’ipeti rito kugeza ku wo hejuru, bamanutse mu mihanda ku buryo nta muntu utambuka adasobanuye impamvu imugenza, ngo humvwe niba yihutirwa.
Abo imirimo yabo yahagaze kandi barakoraga kuko baciye inshuro, bakomeje kwitabwaho na leta hamwe n’abaturanyi babo.
U Rwanda rwabaye urwa mbere muri Afurika mu gufunga ibikorwa hafi ya byose hagamijwe gukumira Coronavirus, mu gihe atari rwo iyi ndwara yagezemo mbere.
Ni ingamba u Rwanda rwashimiwe, kuko kugeza ubu ibihugu byinshi byibasiwe cyane na coronavirus, ahenshi byatewe no kuzarira mu gufata ingamba zikomeye, ugasanga ingendo mu bihugu zirakomeje, ufite virus agakomeza kuyikwirakwiza, cyane ko ashobora kwanduza abandi we nta n’ikimenyetso aragaragaza, indwara yagera ku w’amagara make ikamuhitabna.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, avuga ko kuba imibare y’abantu bandura ikomeje kuzamuka, nta we bikwiye gukura umutima. Abanduye bose ubu bameze neza.
Yakomeje ati “Icyagakuye abantu umutima ni ukuba nta we tubona kandi harabayeho guhura n’abantu banduye. Twebwe rero iyo tumubonye biradushimisha kuko iyo virus ivuye mu baturage yari gukwoirakwira.”
“Iyo imibare ibonetse ari myinshi mu gihe gito, ni ukuvuga ngo ikibazo twakivanye aho cyari kiri, hanyuma ejo, ejobundi, ubuzima bugakomeza nta Coronavirus ihari. Imibare ntikwiye gukura bantu umutima, ahubwo bikwiye kuvuga ngo ibikorwa byacu birimo gutanga umusaruro.”

Title: Uburyo Uganda ikomeje kwimakaza ikinyoma ihohotera abanyarwanda ibashinja kubanduza COVID-19
Body:
Abanyarwanda batari bake bakomeje guhohoterwa n’ubutegetsi bwa Uganda, bashinjwa koherezwa n’u Rwanda kugira ngo bakwirakwizeyo icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Abanyarwanda batari bake bakomeje guhohoterwa n’ubutegetsi bwa Uganda, bashinjwa koherezwa n’u Rwanda kugira ngo bakwirakwizeyo icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Kugeza ubu bamwe muri aba banyarwanda barwariye mu bitaro bya Byumba mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, aho bakubiswe mu buryo bukomeye n’igisirikare cya Uganda.
Tariki 22 Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri Uganda yemeje ko umuntu wa mbere muri icyo gihugu yasanzwemo indwara ya Coronavirus.
Uyu yari umunya-Uganda w’imyaka 36 wageze mu gihugu cye aturutse i Dubai. Kugeza ubu abantu 33 nibo bafite ubu bwandu muri Uganda.
Nubwo uwadukanye iki cyorezo ari umunya-Uganda, iki gihugu gikomeje kwibasira abanyarwanda kivuga ko aribo barimo kukibateza.
Nambajimana Emmanuel ubu urimo kuvurirwa mu bitaro bya Byumba, yageze mu Rwanda tariki 29 uku kwezi nyuma yo kujugunywa ku mupaka n’igisirikare cya Uganda.
Yahageze ari kumwe na mugenzi we Nshimyumukza Michael, bari bamaze imyaka ibiri mu gace ka Jinja, ni mu Burasirazuba bwa Uganda aho bakoraga ubucuruzi bw’ubuki.
Nambajimana avuga ko nyuma y’aho iki cyorezo cyadutse muri Uganda, ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi byahagaze bahitamo gusubira mu gihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Ubwo twari mu modoka, twafashwe n’inzego za Polisi za Uganda zidushinja kuba ngo turi abantu boherejwe n’u Rwanda ngo dukwirakwize icyorezo cya Covid-19 muri Uganda.”
Yakomeje avuga ko yakubiswe mu buryo bukomeye ndetse agasigirwa ibikomere.
Ati “Twababwiye ko tumaze imyaka irenga ibiri muri Uganda, ko tudaheruka mu Rwanda, ariko ntabwo bashakaga kutwumva.”
Nambajimana avuga ko nubwo bababwiraga ko bagiye kubazana ku mupaka w’u Rwanda, babajyanye mu kigo cya gisirikare kiri hafi y’u Rwanda batangira kubakorera iyicarubozo harimo no kubakubitisha ibyuma.
Ati “Nyuma yo kutujugunya ku mupaka, abashumba bari ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda nibo batubonye, ubu niyo mpamvu twagegeze hano mu bitaro bya Byumba.”
Nshimyumukiza Michael na we wahohotewe n’igisirikare cya Uganda, ubu arwariye mu bitaro bya Byumba aho amerewe nabi.
Avuga ko nyuma yo kumuhohotera mu buryo bukomeye, yambuwe amashilingi miliyoni ebyiri n’ibindi bikoresho.
Aba banyarwanda bavuga ko hari n’abandi bagiriwe nabi muri Uganda, ku buryo batazi aho baherereye.
Mu Cyumweru gishize abandi banyarwanda 342 bashyizwe hamwe n’inzego z’ubuyobozi muri Uganda, zibajugunya ku mipaka itemewe mu Rwanda mu turere twa Burera na Gicumbi mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, nabo zibashinja ko bari gukwirakwiza Coronavirus muri Uganda.
Amakuru avuga ko kuva u Rwanda rwemeza ko rufite umurwayi wa mbere wanduye Coronavirus, Abanyarwanda bari muri Uganda batangiye guhohoterwa bashinjwa ko bagiye gukwirakwizayo iyi virusi.
Igisirikare cya Uganda ngo cyatangiye guhiga abanyarwanda bashinjwa ko bakwirakwiza Coronavirus muri iki gihugu mu gihe nta n’ikizamini na kimwe cyari cyagakozwe kugira ngo nibura bagaragaze ko banduye.
Benshi muri abo bari bamaze imyaka myinshi baba muri Uganda barimo nk’abacuruzi bakoreraga mu Karere ka Kisoro ahitwa Gahenerezo, agace gahana imbibi n’Umurenge wa Kagogo mu Karere ka Burera.
Ku cyumweru nibwo batangiye kugera mu Rwanda aho bahise bafashwa n’ubuyobozi, ubu bari kwitabwaho bari mu kato nk’uko amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima abiteganya ko umuntu wese ugeze mu Rwanda ahita ashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cy’iminsi 14 mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi JMV, yabwiye IGIHE ko abanyarwanda baba muri Uganda batangiye gushyirwa ku nkeke babwirwa ko bashobobora kwanduza abanya-Uganda Coronavirus ubwo mu Rwanda hagaragaraga umurwayi wa mbere.
Bivugwa ko ingabo za Uganda zakwirakwijwe ku mipaka guhera Cyanika kugera Kisoro babuza ko hari umunyarwanda wakwambuka ngo yinjire mu gihugu.
Guverineri Gatabazi yavuze ko bamaze kwakira abanyarwanda 342 bavuye muri Uganda bashinjwa gukwirakwiza Coronavirus.
Ati “Ni yo mayeri abayobozi ba Uganda bakoreshaga, bakabwira abaturage babo ko abanyarwanda bafite Coronavirus, ari ukubitwararikaho ntihagire umuntu uhura nabo. Bamaze kwemeza ko iwabo hari umurwayi, ibyo gukumira byarahindutse ahubwo barabirukana. Batangiye kwirukana abari hafi muri Kisoro, Kabale, bakomeza baza.”
“Hari n’abandi bari bafite utuduka hakurya hariya za Gahenerezo, babambuye ibyabo, barabacuza bataha ubusa. Twarabakiriye tubashyira mu kato, abenshi banyura mu nzira zitemewe kuko baba bababwiye ko nibanyura ku mupaka barabafata bakabafunga ahubwo bakajya kubashakira amayira ya ‘panya’.”
Muri aba bantu bashyizwe mu kato, usibye abanyarwanda bavuye muri Uganda harimo n’umunye-Congo umwe hamwe n’abanya-Uganda babiri bari bashatse kugenda n’amaguru bavuye mu Rwanda, nabo bashyizwe mu kato kugira ngo harebwe niba nta wanduye Coronavirus.
Bose bahabwa ibikoresho byose nkenerwa by’ibanze ku buryo ubuzima bwabo bumeze neza.

Title: Uburyo bwiza bwo kwigira mu rugo muri ibi bihe bya coronavirus ku banyeshuri ba Kaminuza
Body:
Twambazimana Clemence yiga ibijyanye n’ubwubatsi (Civil Engeneering) muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa gatatu. Bakibabwira ko amasomo abaye ahagaze kubera coronavirus, ntiyiyumvishaga uko azabasha kwigira mu rugo.
Twambazimana Clemence yiga ibijyanye n’ubwubatsi (Civil Engeneering) muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa gatatu. Bakibabwira ko amasomo abaye ahagaze kubera coronavirus, ntiyiyumvishaga uko azabasha kwigira mu rugo.
Yibazaga ibibazo bitandukanye ati “Twaribazaga duti nkatwe twiga ibintu bizamo kubara, ni gute uzabikora mwalimu atari kukuyobora? Biragoye ariko uragerageza. Urumva niba twaramenyereye ko mwalimu atwerekera ngo bibanza kugenda gutya na gutya, kuba ugiye kubyikoresha harimo imbogamizi.”
Uyu munsi Twambazimana yabonye ko bishoboka nubwo atarabimenyera nk’uko yari amenyereye kwigira imbere ya mwalimu.
Ni umwe mu bihumbi by’abanyeshuri biga muri Kaminuza bicaye mu ngo iwabo, bategereje aho icyorezo cya coronavirus kigana.
Amashuri atandukanye yatangiye gushyiraho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga abanyeshuri bifashisha basubiramo amasomo ariko si yose.
Internet, mudasobwa, telefone…
Dr Ismael Buchanan, umwarimu wa politiki muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda yabwiye IGIHE ko aho ikoranabuhanga rigeze, nta munyeshuri wiga muri Kaminuza ukwiriye gutaka kubura uburyo yigamo.
Muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda yigishamo, hashyizweho urubuga elearning.ur.ac.rw rubonekaho amasomo yose abanyeshuri bigamo bahabwa, hakabaho imikoro n’amashakiro y’ibitabo n’ibindi bitanga ubumenyi bwisumbuye ku byo biga.
Kubona ibitangirwa kuri urwo rubuga ni ubuntu nubwo hakiri abanyeshuri bagaragaza ko hari amasomo atarajyaho, abadafite mudasobwa zo kubireba, abatuye ahatari umuriro w’amashanyarazi n’ibindi.
Dr Buchan avuga ko n’iyo umunyeshuri yaba adafite mudasobwa cyangwa internet ihagije, hari uburyo bwinshi ashobora gukomeza kwiga kandi neza.
Ati “Na telefone wayigiraho. Nshobora gufata amasomo nkayashyira kuri Watsapp nkashinga ishuri kuko abanyeshuri baba bafite nimero za telefone. Nkaboherereza amasomo kuri Whatsapp, tugahana gahunda tukigana. Byananirana twahamagarana. Yego bizagorana kubimenyera ariko ubishaka birashoboka.”
Buchanan avuga ko ibihe nk’ibi ari isomo no kuri Kaminuza zidafite uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga abanyeshuri bashobora kwigiraho bari mu rugo, kuko aho isi igana bitagikenewe ko umunyeshuri yiga ari kumwe na mwalimu.
Kwiha gahunda
Aurore Ishimwe yiga amategeko mu mwaka wa nyuma muri Kaminuza yigenga ya Kigali. Bahagaritse amasomo arangiye kwimenyereza (Stage) asigaje kwandika igitabo gisoza icyiciro cya Kabiri cya Kaminuza.
Kugira ngo abashe kwigira mu rugo, bimusaba kwiha ingengabihe y’ibyo agomba gukora uwo munsi.
Yagize ati “Ndabyuka mu gitondo nkakora akazi gasanzwe mu rugo, nyuma nkatangira kwiga nkasoma nkageza igihe ngiye kurya , namara kurya nkaryama. Mbyuka nka saa kumi nkongera nkiga kugeza nka saa kumi n’ebyiri. Buri wese yitegura bitewe na gahunda afite.”
Ishimwe avuga ko kwigira mu rugo utabura ibikurogoya, gusa agashimangira ko iyo wihaye gahunda n’abo mu rugo bakaba bayizi, nta kabuza ubishobora.
Ati “Ntabwo abanyeshuri bakwiriye kubifata nk’igikuba cyacitse, kwigira mu rugo birashoboka icya mbere ni uko uba uzi icyo ushaka, ahubwo uyu ni umwanya wo kwiga utari ku gitutu.”
Kuruhuka
Ishimwe na Twambazimana bavuga ko muri gahunda biha, bataburamo umwanya wo kuruhuka kugira ngo kwiga bitabarambira.
Twambazimana avuga ko mu gihe amaze kuruhuka ameze neza mu mutwe, umwanya munini awuharira porogaramu (software) bifashisha mu byo biga cyane cyane izwi nka ARCHICAD.
Arayisanganye muri mudasobwa ye, icyo bimusaba ni ugukomeza kuyihuguramo ibintu bitandukanye.
Ati “Iyo ufashe umunsi wawe ukawucamo ibihe ugategura n’ibintu ugomba gukora , ukagira ibyo ushyira imbere birashoboka cyane. Keretse kwiga atari byo ushyira imbere.”
Kwaka ubufasha
Dr Buchanan avuga ko buri munyeshuri aba afite nimero n’indi myirondoro y’umwalimu umwigisha ku buryo igihe abonye ikimwisoba, ashobora kumumenyesha akamufasha.
Ibyo kandi umunyeshuri ashobora no kubisaba bagenzi be bakamusobanurira haba kuri telefone, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, ku mbuga z’ikoranabuhanga za Kaminuza n’ahandi.

Title: Iminsi icumi irashize! Dusubize amaso inyuma ku rugendo rwagejeje ku ihagarikwa ry’imirimo kubera Coronavirus
Body:
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa 21 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente, yatangaje ko kubera intera icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze gufata, imipaka yose ifunzwe, ko abadafite ibikorwa byihutirwa bagomba kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri gishobora kongerwa, mu gukumira ikwirakwira ryacyo.
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa 21 Werurwe 2020 nibwo Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente, yatangaje ko kubera intera icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze gufata, imipaka yose ifunzwe, ko abadafite ibikorwa byihutirwa bagomba kuguma mu rugo mu gihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri gishobora kongerwa, mu gukumira ikwirakwira ryacyo.
Kugeza kuri uyu wa Kabiri, iminsi icumi muri cumi n’ine yemejwe iruzuye, imibare igaragaza ubwandu bushya bwa Coronavirus nayo ikomeje kuzamuka, ariko itanga icyizere. Nta bwandu burahererekanywa hagati mu gihugu.
Ni ngombwa gusubiza amaso inyuma ku ngamba zagiye zifatwa, zitumye igihugu gikomeje kwihagararaho magingo aya ku cyorezo cyashegeshe ibihugu bikomeye.
Ni icyorezo cyakwirakwiye bwangu
Kuwa 31 Ukuboza 2019 nibwo u Bushinwa byamenyesheje Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima (OMS) ko hari icyorezo cyateye mu baturage, mu mujyi wa Wuhan. Cyahereye mu bacuruzaga ibikomoka mu mazi mu isoko rya Huanan, bituma kuwa 1 Mutarama 2020 rifungwa.
Ku wa 7 Mutarama inzego z’ubuzima zemeje ko virusi irimo kwanduza abantu itandukanye n’izisanzwe, ariko yo mu muryango wa za coronavirus. Niyo mpamvu mu kuyandika hazaho “novel”, iza guhabwa izina rya 2019-nCoV.
Ku wa 11 Mutarama nibwo u Bushinwa bwatangaje ko umuntu wa mbere yishwe n’iyi virusi (yapfuye kuwa 9 Mutarama).
Iyo virusi yaje gusohoka mu gihugu, ku wa 13 Mutarama 2019 byemezwa ko umuntu wa mbere hanze y’u Bushinwa yayanduye muri Thailand, umugore wari uvuye muri Wuhan.
Ku wa 20 Mutarama 2020, Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zemeje ko umuntu wa mbere yanduye Coronavirus, ku wa 24 Mutarama u Bufaransa bwemeza ko abantu babiri bayisanzwemo, baba aba mbere igaragayeho ku mugabane w’u Burayi.
Ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2020 Misiri yabaye igihugu cya mbere muri Afurika cyagezemo indwara ya COVID-19, naho u Bufaransa butangaza ko umuntu wa mbere muri icyo gihugu yahitanwe n’icyo cyorezo.
Indwara iterwa n’iyo virus byaje kwemezwa ko ari Covid-19 (Coronavirus Disease 2019) ndetse itangazwa ko ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi yose (Pandémie).
Kugeza ubu abamaze kwandura iyi virus barenga ibihumbi 750, ndetse abo imaze guhitana hirya no hino barenga ibihugu 34. Abamaze kuyikira ni ibihumbi 156.
U Rwanda rwagize amakenga hakiri kare
Mbere y’uko iki cyorezo kigera mu Rwanda, rwakomeje gufata ingamba zo kwirinda, hashyirwaho itsinda ry’abaganga bahoraho ku kibuga cy’indege,ngo bapime umuriro buri muntu wese winjira mu gihugu, nka kimwe mu bimenyetso by’ibanze bya Coronavirus.
Kutajenjekera uburyo bwo kwitegura guhangana na Coronavirus, byatumye Perezida Paul Kagame yeguza uwari Minisitiri w’Ubuzima Dr Diane Gashumba.
Ubwo yari mu mwiherero uheruka w’abayobozi, Perezida Kagame yahishuye ko Dr Gashumba yavugaga ko igihugu gifite ibikoresho 3500 byakwifashishwa mu gusuzuma Coronavirus, nyuma mu gukurikirana basanga hari “ibintu bishobora gukora ku bantu 95” gusa.
Hatangiye gutegurwa ahantu uwatahurwaho Coronavirus yavurirwa n’ibikoresho byakenerwa, cyangwa abashyirwa mu kato aho bajya.
Hateguwe ibyumba 25 ku bitaro bya Gisirikare i Kanombe, ibitaro bya Kabgayi bitegura ibyumba 120, ahahoze ikigo nderabuzima cya Kanyinya hategurwa ibyumba 50, ibindi bitaro 80 mu gihugu biteganya ibyumba bibiri bibiri.
Na mbere y’uko umuntu wa mbere mu Rwanda atahurwaho Coronavirus, Guverinoma yakajije ingamba zo kwirinda, hanashyirwaho uburyo bw’isuku butuma umuntu akaraba amazi meza n’isabune, cyangwa agakoresha alcool yica udukoko.
Ubwo Coronavirus yari ikomeje kwinjira mu bihugu binyuranye bya Afurika, Umujyi wa Kigali wahagaritse ibitaramo n’ibindi bikorwa bihuza abantu benshi.
Mu itangazo wasohoye ku wa 8 Werurwe wagize uti "Tuributsa abafite ibikorwa bihuza abantu benshi nk’insengero, ubukwe, utubari, hoteli, restaurant, utubyiniro, ahakorerwa siporo (gym) n’ahandi, gukaza ingamba z’isuku bashyiraho uburyo bwo gukaraba cyangwa se umuti wabugenewe wica mikorobe.”
Urwego Ngenzuramikorere, RURA, rwatanze amabwiriza ko ahategerwa imodoka rusange hose hagomba gushyirwa ibikoresho by’isuku kandi ikagera no mu modoka imbere.
Umurwayi wa mbere atahuwe ibintu byarahindutse
Ku wa 14 Werurwe nibwo Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yemeje ko Umuhinde wageze mu Rwanda ku wa 8 Werurwe 2020 avuye i Mumbai, yatahuweho icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Yagaragaje ibimenyetso ku wa 12 Werurwe, arakorora, agira ikibazo cyo guhumeka nabi, no gucika intege. Yahise ajya kwivuza ku bitaro bya Kibagabaga, akekwaho Coronavirus afatwa ibipimo, ibisubizo bigaragaza ko yayanduye.

Ni igikorwa kigirwamo uruhare n’itsinda ry’abantu bagera kuri 220 bakurikirana umuntu wese wahuye n’uwanduye, kandi rigizwe n’abantu bo mu nzego zinyuranye baba mu nzego z’ubuzima n’abamenyereye guperereza nko mu nzego Polisi n’Ingabo.
Hahise hafatwa ibyemezo bikarishye birimo gufunga amashuri abakozi basabwa gutangira gukorera mu rugo aho bishoboka.
Byarubahirijwe kuko ku munsi wakurikiyeho Minisiteri y’Uburezi yatangiye gucyura abanyeshuri bose kandi yishingira ikiguzi cyabyo, kugeza ubwo n’Abarundi batinye gusubira iwabo bahawe icumbi ry’ubuntu, bahabwa ibyo bakeneye byose.
Muri ibyo byemezo byagombaga kumara ibyumweru bibiri harimo ko n’insengero zifungwa, kugeza n’uyu munsi amateraniro abera kuri radiyo na televiziyo.
Harimo ko “amahuriro y’abantu benshi nk’imikino ndetse n’ubukwe bibaye bisubitswe. Abitabira imihango yo gushyingura nabo barasabwa kujyayo ari bake. Ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi na za resitora bizakomeza gukorwa hashishikarizwa ko hashyirwa intera ya metero byibuze imwe hagati y’abantu."
Utubari n’abamotari byatwawe gahoro. Bwa mbere abamotari bemerewe gukomeza gukora, ariko basabwa kwitwararika kuko basabwe kuvanaho ikirahuri cy’imbere ku ngofero y’umugenzi, n’abagenzi bashishikarizwa kuyambarira ku gitambaro cyangwa ingofero.
Bidateye kabiri, Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu (Minaloc) yatangaje ko guhera ku wa 20 Werurwe 2020 utubari two mu mujyi wa Kigali n’indi mijyi tuzajya dufunga saa tatu z’ijoro naho utwo mu cyaro tugafunga saa moya zuzuye.
Icyo gihe imibare yerekanaga ko abamaze kwandura Coronavirus ari abantu 11, kandi mu matangazo yose yatangaga, Minisiteri y’Ubuzima yateguzaga ko igihe cy’ibyumweru bibiri byo gufunga ibikorwa gishobora kongerwa ndetse kigashyirwa ku rundi rwego, bitewe n’aho ibintu bigana.
Ingamba zashyizwe ku rundi rwego
Imibare y’abanduye Coronavirus yakomeje kuzamuka gahoro gahoro, ariko ahanini bakaba abantu bayiturukanye mu mahanga, nubwo hataburaaga na bake cyane bo mu gihugu bahuye nabo.
Ku wa 21 Werurwe 2020 Minisitiri w’Intebe Dr Edouard Ngirente ari nawe ukuriye itsinda rishinzwe gukurikiranira hafi icyorezo cya Coronavirus, yatanze amabwiriza mashya. Icyo gihe umubare w’abanduye Coronavirus wari ugeze kuri 17.
Iryo tangazo ryagiraga riti "Gusohoka mu rugo nta mpamvu zihutirwa birabujijwe, keretse abajya gutanga no gushaka serivisi z’ingenzi harimo kwivuza, guhaha, serivizi za banki n’izindi."
Hemejwe ko imipaka yose ifunzwe, keretse ku Banyarwanda bataha ndetse n’abandi batuye mu Rwanda byemewe n’amategeko, abo bose bashyirirwaho akato k’ibyumweru bibiri ahantu hateganyijwe. Ingendo hagati y’imijyi n’uturere tw’igihugu ntabwo zemewe keretse ku bajya kwivuza cyangwa abafite impamvu zihutirwa.
Ubucuruzi bwose bwarahagaritswe, hasigara za farumasi, abatanga serivisi z’itumanaho, iza banki (kandi zigabanya umubare w’amashami) n’abacuruza ibiribwa.
Abapolisi kuva ku w’ipeti rito kugeza ku wo hejuru, bamanutse mu mihanda ku buryo nta muntu utambuka adasobanuye impamvu imugenza, ngo humvwe niba yihutirwa.
Abo imirimo yabo yahagaze kandi barakoraga kuko baciye inshuro, bakomeje kwitabwaho na leta hamwe n’abaturanyi babo.
U Rwanda rwabaye urwa mbere muri Afurika mu gufunga ibikorwa hafi ya byose hagamijwe gukumira Coronavirus, mu gihe atari rwo iyi ndwara yagezemo mbere.
Ni ingamba u Rwanda rwashimiwe, kuko kugeza ubu ibihugu byinshi byibasiwe cyane na coronavirus, ahenshi byatewe no kuzarira mu gufata ingamba zikomeye, ugasanga ingendo mu bihugu zirakomeje, ufite virus agakomeza kuyikwirakwiza, cyane ko ashobora kwanduza abandi we nta n’ikimenyetso aragaragaza, indwara yagera ku w’amagara make ikamuhitabna.
Umuyobozi Mukuru w’Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’Ubuzima, Dr Nsanzimana Sabin, avuga ko kuba imibare y’abantu bandura ikomeje kuzamuka, nta we bikwiye gukura umutima. Abanduye bose ubu bameze neza.
Yakomeje ati “Icyagakuye abantu umutima ni ukuba nta we tubona kandi harabayeho guhura n’abantu banduye. Twebwe rero iyo tumubonye biradushimisha kuko iyo virus ivuye mu baturage yari gukwoirakwira.”
“Iyo imibare ibonetse ari myinshi mu gihe gito, ni ukuvuga ngo ikibazo twakivanye aho cyari kiri, hanyuma ejo, ejobundi, ubuzima bugakomeza nta Coronavirus ihari. Imibare ntikwiye gukura bantu umutima, ahubwo bikwiye kuvuga ngo ibikorwa byacu birimo gutanga umusaruro.”

Title: Uburyo Uganda ikomeje kwimakaza ikinyoma ihohotera abanyarwanda ibashinja kubanduza COVID-19
Body:
Abanyarwanda batari bake bakomeje guhohoterwa n’ubutegetsi bwa Uganda, bashinjwa koherezwa n’u Rwanda kugira ngo bakwirakwizeyo icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Abanyarwanda batari bake bakomeje guhohoterwa n’ubutegetsi bwa Uganda, bashinjwa koherezwa n’u Rwanda kugira ngo bakwirakwizeyo icyorezo cya Coronavirus cyibasiye Isi.
Kugeza ubu bamwe muri aba banyarwanda barwariye mu bitaro bya Byumba mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, aho bakubiswe mu buryo bukomeye n’igisirikare cya Uganda.
Tariki 22 Minisiteri y’Ubuzima muri Uganda yemeje ko umuntu wa mbere muri icyo gihugu yasanzwemo indwara ya Coronavirus.
Uyu yari umunya-Uganda w’imyaka 36 wageze mu gihugu cye aturutse i Dubai. Kugeza ubu abantu 33 nibo bafite ubu bwandu muri Uganda.
Nubwo uwadukanye iki cyorezo ari umunya-Uganda, iki gihugu gikomeje kwibasira abanyarwanda kivuga ko aribo barimo kukibateza.
Nambajimana Emmanuel ubu urimo kuvurirwa mu bitaro bya Byumba, yageze mu Rwanda tariki 29 uku kwezi nyuma yo kujugunywa ku mupaka n’igisirikare cya Uganda.
Yahageze ari kumwe na mugenzi we Nshimyumukza Michael, bari bamaze imyaka ibiri mu gace ka Jinja, ni mu Burasirazuba bwa Uganda aho bakoraga ubucuruzi bw’ubuki.
Nambajimana avuga ko nyuma y’aho iki cyorezo cyadutse muri Uganda, ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi byahagaze bahitamo gusubira mu gihugu cyabo.
Yagize ati “Ubwo twari mu modoka, twafashwe n’inzego za Polisi za Uganda zidushinja kuba ngo turi abantu boherejwe n’u Rwanda ngo dukwirakwize icyorezo cya Covid-19 muri Uganda.”
Yakomeje avuga ko yakubiswe mu buryo bukomeye ndetse agasigirwa ibikomere.
Ati “Twababwiye ko tumaze imyaka irenga ibiri muri Uganda, ko tudaheruka mu Rwanda, ariko ntabwo bashakaga kutwumva.”
Nambajimana avuga ko nubwo bababwiraga ko bagiye kubazana ku mupaka w’u Rwanda, babajyanye mu kigo cya gisirikare kiri hafi y’u Rwanda batangira kubakorera iyicarubozo harimo no kubakubitisha ibyuma.
Ati “Nyuma yo kutujugunya ku mupaka, abashumba bari ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda nibo batubonye, ubu niyo mpamvu twagegeze hano mu bitaro bya Byumba.”
Nshimyumukiza Michael na we wahohotewe n’igisirikare cya Uganda, ubu arwariye mu bitaro bya Byumba aho amerewe nabi.
Avuga ko nyuma yo kumuhohotera mu buryo bukomeye, yambuwe amashilingi miliyoni ebyiri n’ibindi bikoresho.
Aba banyarwanda bavuga ko hari n’abandi bagiriwe nabi muri Uganda, ku buryo batazi aho baherereye.
Mu Cyumweru gishize abandi banyarwanda 342 bashyizwe hamwe n’inzego z’ubuyobozi muri Uganda, zibajugunya ku mipaka itemewe mu Rwanda mu turere twa Burera na Gicumbi mu Ntara y’Amajyaruguru, nabo zibashinja ko bari gukwirakwiza Coronavirus muri Uganda.
Amakuru avuga ko kuva u Rwanda rwemeza ko rufite umurwayi wa mbere wanduye Coronavirus, Abanyarwanda bari muri Uganda batangiye guhohoterwa bashinjwa ko bagiye gukwirakwizayo iyi virusi.
Igisirikare cya Uganda ngo cyatangiye guhiga abanyarwanda bashinjwa ko bakwirakwiza Coronavirus muri iki gihugu mu gihe nta n’ikizamini na kimwe cyari cyagakozwe kugira ngo nibura bagaragaze ko banduye.
Benshi muri abo bari bamaze imyaka myinshi baba muri Uganda barimo nk’abacuruzi bakoreraga mu Karere ka Kisoro ahitwa Gahenerezo, agace gahana imbibi n’Umurenge wa Kagogo mu Karere ka Burera.
Ku cyumweru nibwo batangiye kugera mu Rwanda aho bahise bafashwa n’ubuyobozi, ubu bari kwitabwaho bari mu kato nk’uko amabwiriza ya Minisiteri y’Ubuzima abiteganya ko umuntu wese ugeze mu Rwanda ahita ashyirwa mu kato mu gihe cy’iminsi 14 mu kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.
Guverineri w’Intara y’Amajyaruguru, Gatabazi JMV, yabwiye IGIHE ko abanyarwanda baba muri Uganda batangiye gushyirwa ku nkeke babwirwa ko bashobobora kwanduza abanya-Uganda Coronavirus ubwo mu Rwanda hagaragaraga umurwayi wa mbere.
Bivugwa ko ingabo za Uganda zakwirakwijwe ku mipaka guhera Cyanika kugera Kisoro babuza ko hari umunyarwanda wakwambuka ngo yinjire mu gihugu.
Guverineri Gatabazi yavuze ko bamaze kwakira abanyarwanda 342 bavuye muri Uganda bashinjwa gukwirakwiza Coronavirus.
Ati “Ni yo mayeri abayobozi ba Uganda bakoreshaga, bakabwira abaturage babo ko abanyarwanda bafite Coronavirus, ari ukubitwararikaho ntihagire umuntu uhura nabo. Bamaze kwemeza ko iwabo hari umurwayi, ibyo gukumira byarahindutse ahubwo barabirukana. Batangiye kwirukana abari hafi muri Kisoro, Kabale, bakomeza baza.”
“Hari n’abandi bari bafite utuduka hakurya hariya za Gahenerezo, babambuye ibyabo, barabacuza bataha ubusa. Twarabakiriye tubashyira mu kato, abenshi banyura mu nzira zitemewe kuko baba bababwiye ko nibanyura ku mupaka barabafata bakabafunga ahubwo bakajya kubashakira amayira ya ‘panya’.”
Muri aba bantu bashyizwe mu kato, usibye abanyarwanda bavuye muri Uganda harimo n’umunye-Congo umwe hamwe n’abanya-Uganda babiri bari bashatse kugenda n’amaguru bavuye mu Rwanda, nabo bashyizwe mu kato kugira ngo harebwe niba nta wanduye Coronavirus.
Bose bahabwa ibikoresho byose nkenerwa by’ibanze ku buryo ubuzima bwabo bumeze neza.

Title: Uburyo bwiza bwo kwigira mu rugo muri ibi bihe bya coronavirus ku banyeshuri ba Kaminuza
Body:
Twambazimana Clemence yiga ibijyanye n’ubwubatsi (Civil Engeneering) muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa gatatu. Bakibabwira ko amasomo abaye ahagaze kubera coronavirus, ntiyiyumvishaga uko azabasha kwigira mu rugo.
Twambazimana Clemence yiga ibijyanye n’ubwubatsi (Civil Engeneering) muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu mwaka wa gatatu. Bakibabwira ko amasomo abaye ahagaze kubera coronavirus, ntiyiyumvishaga uko azabasha kwigira mu rugo.
Yibazaga ibibazo bitandukanye ati “Twaribazaga duti nkatwe twiga ibintu bizamo kubara, ni gute uzabikora mwalimu atari kukuyobora? Biragoye ariko uragerageza. Urumva niba twaramenyereye ko mwalimu atwerekera ngo bibanza kugenda gutya na gutya, kuba ugiye kubyikoresha harimo imbogamizi.”
Uyu munsi Twambazimana yabonye ko bishoboka nubwo atarabimenyera nk’uko yari amenyereye kwigira imbere ya mwalimu.
Ni umwe mu bihumbi by’abanyeshuri biga muri Kaminuza bicaye mu ngo iwabo, bategereje aho icyorezo cya coronavirus kigana.
Amashuri atandukanye yatangiye gushyiraho uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga abanyeshuri bifashisha basubiramo amasomo ariko si yose.
Internet, mudasobwa, telefone…
Dr Ismael Buchanan, umwarimu wa politiki muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda yabwiye IGIHE ko aho ikoranabuhanga rigeze, nta munyeshuri wiga muri Kaminuza ukwiriye gutaka kubura uburyo yigamo.
Muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda yigishamo, hashyizweho urubuga elearning.ur.ac.rw rubonekaho amasomo yose abanyeshuri bigamo bahabwa, hakabaho imikoro n’amashakiro y’ibitabo n’ibindi bitanga ubumenyi bwisumbuye ku byo biga.
Kubona ibitangirwa kuri urwo rubuga ni ubuntu nubwo hakiri abanyeshuri bagaragaza ko hari amasomo atarajyaho, abadafite mudasobwa zo kubireba, abatuye ahatari umuriro w’amashanyarazi n’ibindi.
Dr Buchan avuga ko n’iyo umunyeshuri yaba adafite mudasobwa cyangwa internet ihagije, hari uburyo bwinshi ashobora gukomeza kwiga kandi neza.
Ati “Na telefone wayigiraho. Nshobora gufata amasomo nkayashyira kuri Watsapp nkashinga ishuri kuko abanyeshuri baba bafite nimero za telefone. Nkaboherereza amasomo kuri Whatsapp, tugahana gahunda tukigana. Byananirana twahamagarana. Yego bizagorana kubimenyera ariko ubishaka birashoboka.”
Buchanan avuga ko ibihe nk’ibi ari isomo no kuri Kaminuza zidafite uburyo bw’ikoranabuhanga abanyeshuri bashobora kwigiraho bari mu rugo, kuko aho isi igana bitagikenewe ko umunyeshuri yiga ari kumwe na mwalimu.
Kwiha gahunda
Aurore Ishimwe yiga amategeko mu mwaka wa nyuma muri Kaminuza yigenga ya Kigali. Bahagaritse amasomo arangiye kwimenyereza (Stage) asigaje kwandika igitabo gisoza icyiciro cya Kabiri cya Kaminuza.
Kugira ngo abashe kwigira mu rugo, bimusaba kwiha ingengabihe y’ibyo agomba gukora uwo munsi.
Yagize ati “Ndabyuka mu gitondo nkakora akazi gasanzwe mu rugo, nyuma nkatangira kwiga nkasoma nkageza igihe ngiye kurya , namara kurya nkaryama. Mbyuka nka saa kumi nkongera nkiga kugeza nka saa kumi n’ebyiri. Buri wese yitegura bitewe na gahunda afite.”
Ishimwe avuga ko kwigira mu rugo utabura ibikurogoya, gusa agashimangira ko iyo wihaye gahunda n’abo mu rugo bakaba bayizi, nta kabuza ubishobora.
Ati “Ntabwo abanyeshuri bakwiriye kubifata nk’igikuba cyacitse, kwigira mu rugo birashoboka icya mbere ni uko uba uzi icyo ushaka, ahubwo uyu ni umwanya wo kwiga utari ku gitutu.”
Kuruhuka
Ishimwe na Twambazimana bavuga ko muri gahunda biha, bataburamo umwanya wo kuruhuka kugira ngo kwiga bitabarambira.
Twambazimana avuga ko mu gihe amaze kuruhuka ameze neza mu mutwe, umwanya munini awuharira porogaramu (software) bifashisha mu byo biga cyane cyane izwi nka ARCHICAD.
Arayisanganye muri mudasobwa ye, icyo bimusaba ni ugukomeza kuyihuguramo ibintu bitandukanye.
Ati “Iyo ufashe umunsi wawe ukawucamo ibihe ugategura n’ibintu ugomba gukora , ukagira ibyo ushyira imbere birashoboka cyane. Keretse kwiga atari byo ushyira imbere.”
Kwaka ubufasha
Dr Buchanan avuga ko buri munyeshuri aba afite nimero n’indi myirondoro y’umwalimu umwigisha ku buryo igihe abonye ikimwisoba, ashobora kumumenyesha akamufasha.
Ibyo kandi umunyeshuri ashobora no kubisaba bagenzi be bakamusobanurira haba kuri telefone, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, ku mbuga z’ikoranabuhanga za Kaminuza n’ahandi.
